original: RV_07.001.01.1{23} agniṃ naro dīdhitibhiraraṇyorhastacyutī janayanta praśastam
analyzed: agnim naraḥ dīdhitibhiḥ araṇyoḥ hasta cyutī janayanta praśastam

original: RV_07.001.01.2{23} dūredṛśaṃ gṛhapatimatharyum
analyzed: dūredṛśam gṛhapatim atharyum

original: RV_07.001.02.1{23} tamagnimaste vasavo ny ṛṇvan supraticakṣamavase kutaścit
analyzed: tam agnim aste vasavaḥ ni ṛṇvan supraticakṣam avase kutaścid

original: RV_07.001.02.2{23} dakṣāyyo yo dama āsa nityaḥ
analyzed: dakṣāyyaḥ yaḥ dame āsa nityaḥ

original: RV_07.001.03.1{23} preddho agne dīdihi puro no 'jasrayā sūrmyā yaviṣṭha
analyzed: preddhaḥ agne dīdihi puras naḥ jasrayā sūrmyā yaviṣṭha

original: RV_07.001.03.2{23} tvāṃ śaśvanta upa yanti vājāḥ
analyzed: tvām śaśvantaḥ upa yanti vājāḥ

original: RV_07.001.04.1{23} pra te agnayo 'gnibhyo varaṃ niḥ suvīrāsaḥ śośucanta dyumantaḥ
analyzed: pra te agnayaḥ gnibhyaḥ varam niḥ su vīrāsaḥ śośucanta dyumantaḥ

original: RV_07.001.04.2{23} yatrā naraḥ samāsate sujātāḥ
analyzed: yatrā naraḥ samāsate sujātāḥ

original: RV_07.001.05.1{23} dā no agne dhiyā rayiṃ suvīraṃ svapatyaṃ sahasya praśastam
analyzed: dāḥ naḥ agne dhiyā rayim su vīram su apatyam sahasya praśastam

original: RV_07.001.05.2{23} na yaṃ yāvā tarati yātumāvān
analyzed: na yam yāvā tarati yātumāvān

original: RV_07.001.06.1{24} upa yameti yuvatiḥ sudakṣaṃ doṣā vastorhaviṣmatī ghṛtācī
analyzed: upa yam iti yuvatiḥ su dakṣam doṣā vastoḥ haviṣmatī ghṛtācī

original: RV_07.001.06.2{24} upa svainamaramatirvasūyuḥ
analyzed: upa svā enam aramatiḥ vasūyuḥ

original: RV_07.001.07.1{24} viśvā agne 'pa dahārātīryebhistapobhiradaho jarūtham
analyzed: viśvāḥ agne daha arātīryebhiḥ tapobhiḥ adahaḥ jarūtham

original: RV_07.001.07.2{24} pra nisvaraṃ cātayasvāmīvām
analyzed: pra nisvaram cātayasva amīvām

original: RV_07.001.08.1{24} ā yaste agna idhate anīkaṃ vasiṣṭha śukra dīdivaḥ pāvaka
analyzed: ā yaḥ te agne idhate anīkam vasiṣṭha śukra dīdivas pāvaka

original: RV_07.001.08.2{24} uto na ebhi stavathairiha syāḥ
analyzed: uta u naḥ ebhiḥ stavathaiḥ iha syāḥ

original: RV_07.001.09.1{24} vi ye te agne bhejire anīkaṃ martā naraḥ pitryāsaḥ purutrā
analyzed: vi ye te agne bhejire anīkam martāḥ naraḥ pitryāsaḥ purutrā

original: RV_07.001.09.2{24} uto na ebhiḥ sumanā iha syāḥ
analyzed: uta u naḥ ebhiḥ sumanāḥ iha syāḥ

original: RV_07.001.10.1{24} ime naro vṛtrahatyeṣu śūrā viśvā adevīrabhi santu māyāḥ
analyzed: ime naraḥ vṛtra hatyeṣu śūrāḥ viśvāḥ adevīḥ abhi santu māyāḥ

original: RV_07.001.10.2{24} ye me dhiyaṃ panayanta praśastām
analyzed: ye me dhiyam panayanta praśastām

original: RV_07.001.11.1{25} mā śūne agne ni ṣadāma nṛṇāṃ māśeṣaso 'vīratā paritvā
analyzed: mā śūne agne ni sadāma nṛṇām mā a śeṣasaḥ vīra tā paritvā

original: RV_07.001.11.2{25} prajāvatīṣu duryāsu durya
analyzed: prajāvatīṣu duryāsu durya

original: RV_07.001.12.1{25} yamaśvī nityamupayāti yajñaṃ prajāvantaṃ svapatyaṃ kṣayaṃ naḥ
analyzed: yam aśvī nityam upayāti yajñam prajāvantam su apatyam kṣayam naḥ

original: RV_07.001.12.2{25} svajanmanā śeṣasā vāvṛdhānam
analyzed: sva janmanā śeṣasā vāvṛdhānam

original: RV_07.001.13.1{25} pāhi no agne rakṣaso ajuṣṭāt pāhi dhūrterararuṣo aghāyoḥ
analyzed: pāhi naḥ agne rakṣasaḥ ajuṣṭāt pāhi dhūrteḥ a raruṣaḥ aghāyoḥ

original: RV_07.001.13.2{25} tvā yujā pṛtanāyūnrabhi ṣyām
analyzed: tvā yujā pṛtanāyūn abhi syām

original: RV_07.001.14.1{25} sedagniragnīnratyastvanyān yatra vājī tanayo vīḷupāṇiḥ
analyzed: sa id agniḥ agnīn ratyaḥ tu anyān yatra vājī tanayaḥ vīḍu pāṇiḥ

original: RV_07.001.14.2{25} sahasrapāthā akṣarā sameti
analyzed: sahasra pāthāḥ akṣarā sameti

original: RV_07.001.15.1{25} sedagniryo vanuṣyato nipāti sameddhāramaṃhasa uruṣyāt
analyzed: sa id agniḥ yaḥ vanuṣyataḥ nipāti sameddhāram aṃhasaḥ uruṣyāt

original: RV_07.001.15.2{25} sujātāsaḥ pari caranti vīrāḥ
analyzed: sujātāsaḥ pari caranti vīrāḥ

original: RV_07.001.16.1{26} ayaṃ so agnirāhutaḥ purutrā yamīśānaḥ samidindhehaviṣmān
analyzed: ayam saḥ agniḥ āhutaḥ purutrā yam īśānaḥ samidh indhe haviṣmān

original: RV_07.001.16.2{26} pari yametyadhvareṣu hotā
analyzed: pari yamā iti adhvareṣu hotā

original: RV_07.001.17.1{26} tve agna āhavanāni bhūrīśānāsa ā juhuyāma nityā
analyzed: tve agne āhavanāni bhūrī īśānāsaḥ ā juhuyāma nityā

original: RV_07.001.17.2{26} ubhā kṛṇvanto vahatū miyedhe
analyzed: ubhā kṛṇvantaḥ vahatū miyedhe

original: RV_07.001.18.1{26} imo agne vītatamāni havyājasro vakṣi devatātimacha
analyzed: imā u agne vītatamāni havyā ajasraḥ vakṣi devatātimacha

original: RV_07.001.18.2{26} pratina īṃ surabhīṇi vyantu
analyzed: pratinaḥ īm surabhīṇi vyantu

original: RV_07.001.19.1{26} mā no agne 'vīrate parā dā durvāsase 'mataye mā no asyai
analyzed: mā naḥ agne vīra te parā dāḥ durvāsase mataye mā naḥ asyai

original: RV_07.001.19.2{26} mā naḥ kṣudhe mā rakṣasa ṛtāvo mā no dame mā vana ā juhūrthāḥ
analyzed: mā naḥ kṣudhe mā rakṣase ṛtāvaḥ mā naḥ dame mā vane ā juhūrthāḥ

original: RV_07.001.20.1{26} nū me brahmāṇyagna ucchaśādhi tvaṃ deva maghavadbhyaḥ suṣūdaḥ
analyzed: nu me brahmāṇi agne ucchaśādhi tvam deva maghavadbhyaḥ suṣūdaḥ

original: RV_07.001.20.2{26} rātau syāmobhayāsa ā te yūyaṃ pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
analyzed: rātau syāma ubhayāsaḥ ā te yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_07.001.21.1{27} tvamagne suhavo raṇvasandṛk sudītī sūno sahaso didīhi
analyzed: tvam agne su havaḥ raṇva sandṛś su dītī sūno sahasaḥ didīhi

original: RV_07.001.21.2{27} mā tve sacā tanaye nitya ā dhaṃ mā vīro asman naryo vi dāsīt
analyzed: mā tve sacā tanaye nitye ā dham mā vīraḥ asmat naryaḥ vi dāsīt

original: RV_07.001.22.1{27} mā no agne durbhṛtaye sacaiṣu deveddheṣvagniṣu pra vocaḥ
analyzed: mā naḥ agne durbhṛtaye sacā eṣu deva iddheṣu agniṣu pra vocaḥ

original: RV_07.001.22.2{27} mā te asmān durmatayo bhṛmāccid devasya sūno sahaso naśanta
analyzed: mā te asmān durmatayaḥ bhṛmāt cit devasya sūno sahasaḥ naśanta

original: RV_07.001.23.1{27} sa marto agne svanīka revānamartye ya ājuhoti havyam
analyzed: sa martaḥ agne su anīka revān amartye yaḥ ājuhoti havyam

original: RV_07.001.23.2{27} sadevatā vasuvaniṃ dadhāti yaṃ sūrirarthī pṛchamāna eti
analyzed: sa devatāḥ vasu vanim dadhāti yam sūriḥ arthī pṛcchamānaḥ eti

original: RV_07.001.24.1{27} maho no agne suvitasya vidvān rayiṃ sūribhya ā vahā bṛhantam
analyzed: mahaḥ naḥ agne suvitasya vidvān rayim sūribhyaḥ ā vaha bṛhantam

original: RV_07.001.24.2{27} yena vayaṃ sahasāvan mademāvikṣitāsa āyuṣā suvīrāḥ
analyzed: yena vayam sahasāvat madema a vikṣitāsaḥ āyuṣā su vīrāḥ

original: RV_07.001.25.1{27} nū me brahmāṇyagna ...
analyzed: nu me brahmāṇi agne

original: RV_07.002.01.1{01} juṣasva naḥ samidhamagne adya śocā bṛhad yajataṃ dhūmamṛṇvan
analyzed: juṣasva naḥ samidham agne adya śoca bṛhat yajatam dhūmam ṛṇvan

original: RV_07.002.01.2{01} upa spṛśa divyaṃ sānu stūpaiḥ saṃ raśmibhistatanaḥ sūryasya
analyzed: upa spṛśa divyam sānu stūpaiḥ sam raśmibhiḥ tatanaḥ sūryasya

original: RV_07.002.02.1{01} narāśaṃsasya mahimānameṣāmupa stoṣāma yajatasya yajñaiḥ
analyzed: narāśaṃsasya mahimānam eṣām upa stoṣāma yajatasya yajñaiḥ

original: RV_07.002.02.2{01} ye sukratavaḥ śucayo dhiyandhāḥ svadanti devā ubhayāni havyā
analyzed: ye su kratavaḥ śucayaḥ dhiyandhāḥ svadanti devāḥ ubhayāni havyā

original: RV_07.002.03.1{01} īḷenyaṃ vo asuraṃ sudakṣamantardūtaṃ rodasī satyavācam
analyzed: īḍenyam vaḥ asuram su dakṣam antar dūtam rodasī satya vācam

original: RV_07.002.03.2{01} manuṣvadagniṃ manunā samiddhaṃ samadhvarāya sadamin mahema
analyzed: manuṣvat agnim manunā samiddham sam adhvarāya sadamin mahema

original: RV_07.002.04.1{01} saparyavo bharamāṇā abhijñu pra vṛñjate namasā barhiragnau
analyzed: saparyavaḥ bharamāṇāḥ abhijñu pra vṛñjate namasā barhiḥ agnau

original: RV_07.002.04.2{01} ājuhvānā ghṛtapṛṣṭhaṃ pṛṣadvadadhvaryavo haviṣā marjayadhvam
analyzed: ājuhvānāḥ ghṛta pṛṣṭham pṛṣadvat adhvaryavaḥ haviṣā marjayadhvam

original: RV_07.002.05.1{01} svādhyo vi duro devayanto 'śiśrayū rathayurdevatātā
analyzed: su ādhyaḥ vi duraḥ devayantaḥ śiśrayuḥ rathayuḥ devatātā

original: RV_07.002.05.2{01} pūrvī śiśuṃ na mātarā rihāṇe samagruvo na samaneṣvañjan
analyzed: pūrvī śiśum na mātarā rihāṇe samagruvaḥ na samaneṣu añjan

original: RV_07.002.06.1{02} uta yoṣaṇe divye mahī na uṣāsānaktā sudugheva dhenuḥ
analyzed: uta yoṣaṇe divye mahī naḥ uṣāsānaktā sudughā iva dhenuḥ

original: RV_07.002.06.2{02} barhiṣadā puruhūte maghonī ā yajñiye suvitāya śrayetām
analyzed: barhiṣadā puruhūte maghonī ā yajñiye suvitāya śrayetām

original: RV_07.002.07.1{02} viprā yajñeṣu mānuṣeṣu kārū manye vāṃ jātavedasā yajadhyai
analyzed: viprā yajñeṣu mānuṣeṣu kārū manye vām jātavedasā yajadhyai

original: RV_07.002.07.2{02} ūrdhvaṃ no adhvaraṃ kṛtaṃ haveṣu tā deveṣu vanatho vāryāṇi
analyzed: ūrdhvam naḥ adhvaram kṛtam haveṣu tā deveṣu vanathaḥ vāryāṇi

original: RV_07.002.08.1{02} ā bhāratī bhāratībhiḥ ...
analyzed: ā bhāratī bhāratībhiḥ

original: RV_07.002.09.1{02} tan nasturīpaṃ ...
analyzed: tat nasturīpam
vanaspate va
ā yāhi agne

original: RV_07.003.01.1{03} agniṃ vo devamagnibhiḥ sajoṣā yajiṣṭhaṃ dūtamadhvarekṛṇudhvam
analyzed: agnim vaḥ devam agnibhiḥ sajoṣāḥ yajiṣṭham dūtam adhvarekṛṇudhvam

original: RV_07.003.01.2{03} yo martyeṣu nidhruvir{ṛ}tāvā tapurmūrdhā ghṛtānnaḥ pāvakaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ martyeṣu nidhruviḥ ṛtāvā tapuḥ mūrdhā ghṛta annaḥ pāvakaḥ

original: RV_07.003.02.1{03} prothadaśvo na yavase 'viṣyan yadā mahaḥ saṃvaraṇād vyasthāt
analyzed: prothat aśvaḥ na yavase viṣyan yadā mahaḥ saṃvaraṇāt vyasthāt

original: RV_07.003.02.2{03} ādasya vāto anu vāti śociradha sma te vrajanaṃ kṛṣṇamasti
analyzed: āt asya vātaḥ anu vāti śociḥ adha sma te vrajanam kṛṣṇam asti

original: RV_07.003.03.1{03} ud yasya te navajātasya vṛṣṇo 'gne carantyajarā idhānāḥ
analyzed: ud yasya te nava jātasya vṛṣṇaḥ gne caranti ajarāḥ idhānāḥ

original: RV_07.003.03.2{03} achā dyāmaruṣo dhūma eti saṃ dūto agna īyase hi devān
analyzed: achā dyām aruṣaḥ dhūmaḥ eti sam dūtaḥ agne īyase hi devān

original: RV_07.003.04.1{03} vi yasya te pṛthivyāṃ pājo aśret tṛṣu yadannā samavṛktajambhaiḥ
analyzed: vi yasya te pṛthivyām pājaḥ aśret tṛṣu yat annā samavṛkta jambhaiḥ

original: RV_07.003.04.2{03} seneva sṛṣṭā prasitiṣ ṭa eti yavaṃ na dasma juhvā vivekṣi
analyzed: senā iva sṛṣṭā prasitiḥ te eti yavam na dasma juhvā vivekṣi

original: RV_07.003.05.1{03} tamid doṣā tamuṣasi yaviṣṭhamagnimatyaṃ na marjayanta naraḥ
analyzed: tam id doṣā tam uṣasi yaviṣṭham agnimatyam na marjayanta naraḥ

original: RV_07.003.05.2{03} niśiśānā atithimasya yonau dīdāya śocirāhutasya vṛṣṇaḥ
analyzed: niśiśānā atithimasya yonau dīdāya śociḥ āhutasya vṛṣṇaḥ

original: RV_07.003.06.1{04} susandṛk te svanīka pratīkaṃ vi yad rukmo na rocasa upāke
analyzed: su sandṛś te su anīka pratīkam vi yat rukmaḥ na rocase upāke

original: RV_07.003.06.2{04} divo na te tanyatureti śuṣmaścitro na sūraḥ prati cakṣi bhānum
analyzed: divaḥ na te tanyatuḥ eti śuṣmaḥ citraḥ na sūraḥ prati cakṣi bhānum

original: RV_07.003.07.1{04} yathā vaḥ svāhāgnaye dāśema parīḷābhirghṛtavadbhiśca havyaiḥ
analyzed: yathā vaḥ svāhā agnaye dāśema parīḍābhiḥ ghṛtavadbhiḥ ca havyaiḥ

original: RV_07.003.07.2{04} tebhirno agne amitairmahobhiḥ śataṃ pūrbhirāyasībhirni pāhi
analyzed: tebhiḥ naḥ agne amitaiḥ mahobhiḥ śatam pūrbhiḥ āyasībhiḥ ni pāhi

original: RV_07.003.08.1{04} yā vā te santi dāśuṣe adhṛṣṭā giro vā yābhirnṛvatīruruṣyāḥ
analyzed: yāḥ vā te santi dāśuṣe adhṛṣṭāḥ giraḥ vā yābhiḥ nṛvatīḥ uruṣyāḥ

original: RV_07.003.08.2{04} tābhirnaḥ sūno sahaso ni pāhi smat sūrīñ jaritṝñ jātavedaḥ
analyzed: tābhiḥ naḥ sūno sahasaḥ ni pāhi smat sūrīm jaritṝm jātavedaḥ

original: RV_07.003.09.1{04} niryat pūteva svadhitiḥ śucirgāt svayā kṛpā tanvā rocamānaḥ
analyzed: niryat pūtā iva svadhitiḥ śuciḥ gāt svayā kṛpā tanvā rocamānaḥ

original: RV_07.003.09.2{04} ā yo mātroruśenyo janiṣṭa devayajyāya sukratuḥ pāvakaḥ
analyzed: ā yaḥ mātrā uru śenyaḥ janiṣṭa deva yajyāya su kratuḥ pāvakaḥ

original: RV_07.003.10.1{04} etā no agne saubhagā didīhyapi kratuṃ sucetasaṃ vatema
analyzed: etā naḥ agne saubhagā didīhi api kratum su cetasam vatema

original: RV_07.003.10.2{04} viśvā stotṛbhyo gṛṇate ca santu yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: viśvā stotṛbhyaḥ gṛṇate ca santu yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.004.01.1{05} pra vaḥ śukrāya bhānave bharadhvaṃ havyaṃ matiṃ cāgnaye supūtam
analyzed: pra vaḥ śukrāya bhānave bharadhvam havyam matim ca agnaye su pūtam

original: RV_07.004.01.2{05} yo daivyāni mānuṣā janūṃṣyantarviśvāni vidmanā jigāti
analyzed: yaḥ daivyāni mānuṣā janūṃṣi antar viśvāni vidmanā jigāti

original: RV_07.004.02.1{05} sa gṛtso agnistaruṇaścidastu yato yaviṣṭho ajaniṣṭa mātuḥ
analyzed: sa gṛtsaḥ agniḥ taruṇaḥ cit astu yatas yaviṣṭhaḥ ajaniṣṭa mātuḥ

original: RV_07.004.02.2{05} saṃ yo vanā yuvate śucidan bhūri cidannā samidatti sadyaḥ
analyzed: sam yaḥ vanā yuvate śucidan bhūri cit annā samidh atti sadyas

original: RV_07.004.03.1{05} asya devasya saṃsadyanīke yaṃ martāsaḥ śyetaṃ jagṛbhre
analyzed: asya devasya saṃsadi anīke yam martāsaḥ śyetam jagṛbhre

original: RV_07.004.03.2{05} ni yo gṛbhaṃ pauruṣeyīmuvoca durokamagnirāyave śuśoca
analyzed: ni yaḥ gṛbham pauruṣeyīm uvoca durokam agniḥ āyave śuśoca

original: RV_07.004.04.1{05} ayaṃ kavirakaviṣu pracetā marteṣvagniramṛto ni dhāyi
analyzed: ayam kaviḥ akaviṣu pracetāḥ marteṣu agniḥ amṛtaḥ ni dhāyi

original: RV_07.004.04.2{05} sa mā no atra juhuraḥ sahasvaḥ sadā tve sumanasaḥ syāma
analyzed: sa mā naḥ atra juhuraḥ sahasvas sadā tve sumanasaḥ syāma

original: RV_07.004.05.1{05} ā yo yoniṃ devakṛtaṃ sasāda kratvā hyagniramṛtānatārīt
analyzed: ā yaḥ yonim deva kṛtam sasāda kratvā hi agniḥ amṛtān atārīt

original: RV_07.004.05.2{05} tamoṣadhīśca vaninaśca garbhaṃ bhūmiśca viśvadhāyasaṃ bibharti
analyzed: tam oṣadhīḥ ca vaninaḥ ca garbham bhūmiḥ ca viśva dhāyasam bibharti

original: RV_07.004.06.1{06} īśe hyagniramṛtasya bhūrerīśe rāyaḥ suvīryasya dātoḥ
analyzed: īśe hi agniḥ amṛtasya bhūreḥ īśe rāyaḥ su vīryasya dātoḥ

original: RV_07.004.06.2{06} mā tvā vayaṃ sahasāvannavīrā māpsavaḥ pari ṣadāma māduvaḥ
analyzed: mā tvā vayam sahasāvan vīrāḥ mā apsavaḥ pari sadāma mā a duvaḥ

original: RV_07.004.07.1{06} pariṣadyaṃ hyaraṇasya rekṇo nityasya rāyaḥ patayaḥ syāma
analyzed: pariṣadyam hi araṇasya rekṇaḥ nityasya rāyaḥ patayaḥ syāma

original: RV_07.004.07.2{06} na śeṣo agne anyajātamastyacetānasya mā patho vi dukṣaḥ
analyzed: na śeṣaḥ agne anya jātam asti acetānasya mā pathaḥ vi dukṣaḥ

original: RV_07.004.08.1{06} nahi grabhāyāraṇaḥ suśevo 'nyodaryo manasā mantavā u
analyzed: nahi grabhāya araṇaḥ su śevaḥ nyodaryaḥ manasā mantavai u

original: RV_07.004.08.2{06} adhā cidokaḥ punarit sa etyā no vājyabhīṣāḷ etu navyaḥ
analyzed: adhā cit okaḥ punar id saḥ etya ā naḥ vājī abhīṣāh etu navyaḥ

original: RV_07.004.09.1{06} tvamagne vanuṣyato ...
analyzed: tvam agne vanuṣyataḥ

original: RV_07.004.10.1{06} etā no agne saubhagā ...
analyzed: etā naḥ agne saubhagā

original: RV_07.005.01.1{07} prāgnaye tavase bharadhvaṃ giraṃ divo arataye pṛthivyāḥ
analyzed: pra agnaye tavase bharadhvam giram divaḥ arataye pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_07.005.01.2{07} yo viśveṣāmamṛtānāmupasthe vaiśvānaro vāvṛdhe jāgṛvadbhiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ viśveṣām amṛtānām upasthe vaiśvānaraḥ vāvṛdhe jāgṛvadbhiḥ

original: RV_07.005.02.1{07} pṛṣṭo divi dhāyyagniḥ pṛthivyāṃ netā sindhūnāṃ vṛṣabha stiyānām
analyzed: pṛṣṭaḥ divi dhāyī agniḥ pṛthivyām netā sindhūnām vṛṣabhaḥ stiyānām

original: RV_07.005.02.2{07} sa mānuṣīrabhi viśo vi bhāti vaiśvānaro vāvṛdhāno vareṇa
analyzed: sa mānuṣīḥ abhi viśaḥ vi bhāti vaiśvānaraḥ vāvṛdhānaḥ vareṇa

original: RV_07.005.03.1{07} tvad bhiyā viśa āyannasiknīrasamanā jahatīrbhojanāni
analyzed: tvat bhiyā viśaḥ āyan asiknīḥ asamanāḥ jahatīḥ bhojanāni

original: RV_07.005.03.2{07} vaiśvānara pūrave śośucānaḥ puro yadagne darayannadīdeḥ
analyzed: vaiśvānara pūrave śośucānaḥ puraḥ yat agne darayan adīdeḥ

original: RV_07.005.04.1{07} tava tridhātu pṛthivī uta dyaurvaiśvānara vratamagne sacanta
analyzed: tava tri dhātu pṛthivī uta dyauḥ vaiśvānara vratam agne sacanta

original: RV_07.005.04.2{07} tvaṃ bhāsā rodasī ā tatanthājasreṇa śociṣā śośucānaḥ
analyzed: tvam bhāsā rodasī ā tatantha ajasreṇa śociṣā śośucānaḥ

original: RV_07.005.05.1{07} tvāmagne harito vāvaśānā giraḥ sacante dhunayo ghṛtācīḥ
analyzed: tvām agne haritaḥ vāvaśānāḥ giraḥ sacante dhunayaḥ ghṛtācīḥ

original: RV_07.005.05.2{07} patiṃ kṛṣṭīnāṃ rathyaṃ rayīṇāṃ vaiśvānaramuṣasāṃ ketumahnām
analyzed: patim kṛṣṭīnām rathyam rayīṇām vaiśvānaram uṣasām ketum ahnām

original: RV_07.005.06.1{08} tve asuryaṃ vasavo ny ṛṇvan kratuṃ hi te mitramaho juṣanta
analyzed: tve asuryam vasavaḥ ni ṛṇvan kratum hi te mitra mahas juṣanta

original: RV_07.005.06.2{08} tvaṃ dasyūnrokaso agna āja uru jyotirjanayannāryāya
analyzed: tvam dasyūn rokasaḥ agne ājaḥ uru jyotiḥ janayan āryāya

original: RV_07.005.07.1{08} sa jāyamānaḥ parame vyoman vāyurna pāthaḥ pari pāsi sadyaḥ
analyzed: sa jāyamānaḥ parame vyoman vāyuḥ na pāthaḥ pari pāsi sadyas

original: RV_07.005.07.2{08} tvaṃ bhuvanā janayannabhi krannapatyāya jātavedo daśasyan
analyzed: tvam bhuvanā janayan abhi kran apatyāya jātavedaḥ daśasyan

original: RV_07.005.08.1{08} tāmagne asme iṣamerayasva vaiśvānara dyumatīṃ jātavedaḥ
analyzed: tām agne asme iṣam erayasva vaiśvānara dyumatīm jātavedaḥ

original: RV_07.005.08.2{08} yayā rādhaḥ pinvasi viśvavāra pṛthu śravo dāśuṣe martyāya
analyzed: yayā rādhaḥ pinvasi viśva vāra pṛthu śravaḥ dāśuṣe martyāya

original: RV_07.005.09.1{08} taṃ no agne maghavadbhyaḥ purukṣuṃ rayiṃ ni vājaṃ śrutyaṃ yuvasva
analyzed: tam naḥ agne maghavadbhyaḥ purukṣum rayim ni vājam śrutyam yuvasva

original: RV_07.005.09.2{08} vaiśvānara mahi naḥ śarma yacha rudrebhiragne vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ
analyzed: vaiśvānara mahi naḥ śarma yaccha rudrebhiḥ agne vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_07.006.01.1{09} pra samrājo asurasya praśastiṃ puṃsaḥ kṛṣṭīnāmanumādyasya
analyzed: pra samrājaḥ asurasya praśastim puṃsaḥ kṛṣṭīnām anumādyasya

original: RV_07.006.01.2{09} indrasyeva pra tavasas kṛtāni vande dāruṃ vandamānovivakmi
analyzed: indrasya iva pra tavasaḥ kṛtāni vande dārum

original: RV_07.006.02.1{09} kaviṃ ketuṃ dhāsiṃ bhānumadrerhinvanti śaṃ rājyaṃ rodasyoḥ
analyzed: kavim ketum dhāsim bhānum adreḥ hinvanti śam rājyam rodasyoḥ

original: RV_07.006.02.2{09} purandarasya gīrbhirā vivāse 'gnervratāni pūrvyā mahāni
analyzed: purandarasya gīrbhiḥ ā vivāse gneḥ vratāni pūrvyā mahāni

original: RV_07.006.03.1{09} nyakratūn grathino mṛdhravācaḥ paṇīnraśraddhānavṛdhānayajñān
analyzed: nyakratūn grathinaḥ mṛdhravācaḥ paṇīn raśraddhān avṛdhān ayajñān

original: RV_07.006.03.2{09} pra-pra tān dasyūnragnirvivāya pūrvaścakārāparānayajyūn
analyzed: pra pra tān dasyūn ragniḥ vivāya pūrvaḥ cakāra aparān ayajyūn

original: RV_07.006.04.1{09} yo apācīne tamasi madantīḥ prācīścakāra nṛtamaḥ śacībhiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ apācīne tamasi madantīḥ prācīḥ cakāra nṛtamaḥ śacībhiḥ

original: RV_07.006.04.2{09} tamīśānaṃ vasvo agniṃ gṛṇīṣe 'nānataṃ damayantaṃ pṛtanyūn
analyzed: tam īśānam vasvaḥ agnim gṛṇīṣe nānatam damayantam pṛtanyūn

original: RV_07.006.05.1{09} yo dehyo anamayad vadhasnairyo aryapatnīruṣasaścakāra
analyzed: yaḥ dehyaḥ anamayat vadhasnaiḥ yaḥ arya patnīḥ uṣasaḥ cakāra

original: RV_07.006.05.2{09} sa nirudhyā nahuṣo yajvo agnirviśaścakre balihṛtaḥ sahobhiḥ
analyzed: sa nirudhya nahuṣaḥ yajvaḥ agniḥ viśaḥ cakre bali hṛtaḥ sahobhiḥ

original: RV_07.006.06.1{09} yasya śarmannupa viśve janāsa evaistasthuḥ sumatiṃ bhikṣamāṇāḥ
analyzed: yasya śarman upa viśve janāsaḥ evaiḥ tasthuḥ sumatim bhikṣamāṇāḥ

original: RV_07.006.06.2{09} vaiśvānaro varamā rodasyorāgniḥ sasāda pitrorupastham
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ varamāḥ rodasyoḥ ā agniḥ sasāda pitroḥ upastham

original: RV_07.006.07.1{09} ā devo dade budhnyā vasūni vaiśvānara uditā sūryasya
analyzed: ā devaḥ dade budhnyā vasūni vaiśvānaraḥ uditā sūryasya

original: RV_07.006.07.2{09} ā samudrādavarādā parasmādāgnirdade diva ā pṛthivyāḥ
analyzed: ā samudrāt avarāt ā parasmāt ā agniḥ dade divaḥ ā pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_07.007.01.1{10} pra vo devaṃ cit sahasānamagnimaśvaṃ na vājinaṃ hiṣe namobhiḥ
analyzed: pra vaḥ devam cit sahasānam agnim aśvam na vājinam hiṣe namobhiḥ

original: RV_07.007.01.2{10} bhavā no dūto adhvarasya vidvān tmanā deveṣu vivide mitadruḥ
analyzed: bhava naḥ dūtaḥ adhvarasya vidvān tmanā deveṣu vivide mitadruḥ

original: RV_07.007.02.1{10} ā yāhyagne pathyā anu svā mandro devānāṃ sakhyaṃ juṣāṇaḥ
analyzed: ā yāhi agne pathyāḥ anu svāḥ mandraḥ devānām sakhyam juṣāṇaḥ

original: RV_07.007.02.2{10} ā sānu śuṣmairnadayan pṛthivyā jambhebhirviśvamuśadhag vanāni
analyzed: ā sānu śuṣmaiḥ nadayan pṛthivyāḥ jambhebhiḥ viśvam uśadhak vanāni

original: RV_07.007.03.1{10} prācīno yajñaḥ sudhitaṃ hi barhiḥ prīṇīte agnirīḷito na hotā
analyzed: prācīnaḥ yajñaḥ sudhitam hi barhiḥ prīṇīte agniḥ īḍitaḥ na hotā

original: RV_07.007.03.2{10} ā mātarā viśvavāre huvāno yato yaviṣṭha jajñiṣe suśevaḥ
analyzed: ā mātarā viśva vāre huvānaḥ yatas yaviṣṭha jajñiṣe su śevaḥ

original: RV_07.007.04.1{10} sadyo adhvare rathiraṃ jananta mānuṣāso vicetaso ya eṣām
analyzed: sadyas adhvare rathiram jananta mānuṣāsaḥ vicetasaḥ yaḥ eṣām

original: RV_07.007.04.2{10} viśāmadhāyi viśpatirduroṇe 'gnirmandro madhuvacā ṛtāvā
analyzed: viśām adhāyi viśpatiḥ duroṇe gniḥ mandraḥ madhu vacāḥ ṛtāvā

original: RV_07.007.05.1{10} asādi vṛto vahnirājaganvānagnirbrahmā nṛṣadane vidhartā
analyzed: asādi vṛtaḥ vahniḥ ājaganvān agniḥ brahmā nṛṣadane vidhartā

original: RV_07.007.05.2{10} dyauśca yaṃ pṛthivī vāvṛdhāte ā yaṃ hotā yajati viśvavāram
analyzed: dyauḥ ca yam pṛthivī vāvṛdhāte ā yam hotā yajati viśva vāram

original: RV_07.007.06.1{10} ete dyumnebhirviśvamātiranta mantraṃ ye vāraṃ naryā atakṣan
analyzed: ete dyumnebhiḥ viśvam ātiranta mantram ye vāram naryāḥ atakṣan

original: RV_07.007.06.2{10} pra ye viśastiranta śroṣamāṇā ā ye me asya dīdhayannṛtasya
analyzed: pra ye śroṣamāṇāḥ ā ye me asya dīdhayan ṛtasya

original: RV_07.007.07.1{10} nū tvāmagna īmahe vasiṣṭhā īśānaṃ sūno sahaso vasūnām
analyzed: nu tvām agne īmahe vasiṣṭhāḥ īśānam sūno sahasaḥ vasūnām

original: RV_07.007.07.2{10} iṣaṃ stotṛbhyo maghavadbhya ānaḍ yūyaṃ pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
analyzed: iṣam stotṛbhyaḥ maghavadbhyaḥ ānaṭ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_07.008.01.1{11} indhe rājā samaryo namobhiryasya pratīkamāhutaṃ ghṛtena
analyzed: indhe rājā samaryaḥ namobhiḥ yasya pratīkam āhutam ghṛtena

original: RV_07.008.01.2{11} naro havyebhirīḷate sabādha āgniragra uṣasāmaśoci
analyzed: naraḥ havyebhiḥ īḍate sabādhaḥ ā agniḥ agre uṣasām aśoci

original: RV_07.008.02.1{11} ayamu ṣya sumahānavedi hotā mandro manuṣo yajvo agniḥ
analyzed: ayam u sya su mahān avedi hotā mandraḥ manuṣaḥ yajvaḥ agniḥ

original: RV_07.008.02.2{11} vi bhā akaḥ sasṛjānaḥ pṛthivyāṃ kṛṣṇapaviroṣadhībhirvavakṣe
analyzed: vi bhās akaḥ sasṛjānaḥ pṛthivyām kṛṣṇa paviḥ oṣadhībhiḥ vavakṣe

original: RV_07.008.03.1{11} kayā no agne vi vasaḥ suvṛktiṃ kāmu svadhām ṛṇavaḥ śasyamānaḥ
analyzed: kayā naḥ agne vi vasaḥ suvṛktim kāmu svadhām ṛṇavaḥ śasyamānaḥ

original: RV_07.008.03.2{11} kadā bhavema patayah sudatra rāyo vantāro duṣṭarasya sādhoḥ
analyzed: kadā bhavema patayah su datra rāyaḥ vantāraḥ duṣṭarasya sādhoḥ

original: RV_07.008.04.1{11} pra-prāyamagnirbharatasya śṛṇve vi yat sūryo na rocatebṛhad bhāḥ
analyzed: pra pra ayam agniḥ bharatasya śṛṇve vi yat sūryaḥ na rocate bṛhat bhās

original: RV_07.008.04.2{11} abhi yaḥ pūruṃ pṛtanāsu tasthau dyutāno daivyo atithiḥ śuśoca
analyzed: abhi yaḥ pūrum pṛtanāsu tasthau dyutānaḥ daivyaḥ atithiḥ śuśoca

original: RV_07.008.05.1{11} asannit tve āhavanāni bhūri bhuvo viśvebhiḥ sumanā anīkaiḥ
analyzed: asan id tve āhavanāni bhūri bhuvaḥ viśvebhiḥ sumanāḥ anīkaiḥ

original: RV_07.008.05.2{11} stutaścidagne śṛṇviṣe gṛṇānaḥ svayaṃ vardhasva tanvaṃ sujāta
analyzed: stutaḥ cit agne śṛṇviṣe gṛṇānaḥ svayam vardhasva tanvam su jāta

original: RV_07.008.06.1{11} idaṃ vacaḥ śatasāḥ saṃsahasramudagnaye janiṣīṣṭa dvibarhāḥ
analyzed: idam vacaḥ śata sāḥ saṃsahasram udagnaye janiṣīṣṭa dvibarhāḥ

original: RV_07.008.06.2{11} śaṃ yat stotṛbhya āpaye bhavāti dyumadamīvacātanaṃ rakṣohā
analyzed: śam yat stotṛbhyaḥ āpaye bhavāti dyumat amīva cātanam rakṣaḥ hā

original: RV_07.008.07.1{11} nū tvāmagna īmahe ...
analyzed: nu tvām agne īmahe

original: RV_07.009.01.1{12} abodhi jāra uṣasāmupasthād dhotā mandraḥ kavitamaḥ pāvakaḥ
analyzed: abodhi jāraḥ uṣasām upasthāt hotā mandraḥ kavitamaḥ pāvakaḥ

original: RV_07.009.01.2{12} dadhāti ketumubhayasya jantorhavyā deveṣu draviṇaṃ sukṛtsu
analyzed: dadhāti ketum ubhayasya jantoḥ havyā deveṣu draviṇam sukṛtsu

original: RV_07.009.02.1{12} sa sukraturyo vi duraḥ paṇīnāṃ punāno arkaṃ purubhojasaṃ naḥ
analyzed: sa su kratuḥ yaḥ vi duraḥ paṇīnām punānaḥ arkam puru bhojasam naḥ

original: RV_07.009.02.2{12} hotā mandro viśāṃ damūnāstirastamo dadṛśe rāmyāṇām
analyzed: hotā mandraḥ viśām damūnāḥ tirastamaḥ dadṛśe rāmyāṇām

original: RV_07.009.03.1{12} amūraḥ kaviraditirvivasvān susaṃsan mitro atithiḥ śivonaḥ
analyzed: amūraḥ kaviḥ aditiḥ vivasvān su saṃsad mitraḥ atithiḥ śiva ūnaḥ

original: RV_07.009.03.2{12} citrabhānuruṣasāṃ bhātyagre 'pāṃ garbhaḥ prasvaā viveśa
analyzed: citra bhānuḥ uṣasām bhāti agre pām garbhaḥ viveśa

original: RV_07.009.04.1{12} īḷenyo vo manuṣo yugeṣu samanagā aśucajjātavedāḥ
analyzed: īḍenyaḥ vaḥ manuṣaḥ yugeṣu samana gāḥ aśucat jātavedāḥ

original: RV_07.009.04.2{12} susandṛśā bhānunā yo vibhāti prati gāvaḥ samidhānaṃ budhanta
analyzed: su sandṛśā bhānunā yaḥ vibhāti prati gāvaḥ samidhānam budhanta

original: RV_07.009.05.1{12} agne yāhi dūtyaṃ mā riṣaṇyo devānachā brahmakṛtā gaṇena
analyzed: agne yāhi dūtyam mā riṣaṇyaḥ devān achā brahma kṛtā gaṇena

original: RV_07.009.05.2{12} sarasvatīṃ maruto aśvināpo yakṣi devān ratnadheyāyaviśvān
analyzed: sarasvatīm marutaḥ aśvinā apaḥ yakṣi devān ratna dheyāya viśvān

original: RV_07.009.06.1{12} tvāmagne samidhāno vasiṣṭho jarūthaṃ han yakṣi rāye purandhim
analyzed: tvām agne samidhānaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ jarūtham han yakṣi rāye purandhim

original: RV_07.009.06.2{12} puruṇīthā jātavedo jarasva yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: puruṇīthā jātavedaḥ jarasva yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.010.01.1{13} uṣo na jāraḥ pṛthu pājo aśred davidyutad dīdyacchośucānaḥ
analyzed: uṣaḥ na jāraḥ pṛthu pājaḥ aśret davidyutat dīdyat śośucānaḥ

original: RV_07.010.01.2{13} vṛṣā hariḥ śucirā bhāti bhāsā dhiyo hinvāna uśatīrajīgaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣā hariḥ śuciḥ ā bhāti bhāsā dhiyaḥ hinvānaḥ uśatīḥ ajīgaḥ

original: RV_07.010.02.1{13} svarṇa vastoruṣasāmaroci yajñaṃ tanvānā uśijo na manma
analyzed: svarṇa vastoḥ uṣasām aroci yajñam tanvānāḥ uśijaḥ na manma

original: RV_07.010.02.2{13} agnirjanmāni deva ā vi vidvān dravad dūto devayāvā vaniṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: agniḥ janmāni devaḥ ā vi vidvān dravat dūtaḥ deva yāvā vaniṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_07.010.03.1{13} achā giro matayo devayantīragniṃ yanti draviṇaṃ bhikṣamāṇāḥ
analyzed: achā giraḥ matayaḥ devayantīḥ agnim yanti draviṇam bhikṣamāṇāḥ

original: RV_07.010.03.2{13} susandṛśaṃ supratīkaṃ svañcaṃ havyavāhamaratimmānuṣāṇām
analyzed: su sandṛśam su pratīkam svañcam havyavāham aratim mānuṣāṇām

original: RV_07.010.04.1{13} indraṃ no agne vasubhiḥ sajoṣā rudraṃ rudrebhirā vahā bṛhantam
analyzed: indram naḥ agne vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ rudram rudrebhiḥ ā vaha bṛhantam

original: RV_07.010.04.2{13} ādityebhiraditiṃ viśvajanyāṃ bṛhaspatim ṛkvabhirviśvavāram
analyzed: ādityebhiḥ aditim viśvajanyām bṛhaspatim ṛkvabhiḥ viśva vāram

original: RV_07.010.05.1{13} mandraṃ hotāramuśijo yaviṣṭhamagniṃ viśa īḷate adhvareṣu
analyzed: mandram hotāram uśijaḥ yaviṣṭham agnim viśaḥ īḍate adhvareṣu

original: RV_07.010.05.2{13} sa hi kṣapāvānabhavad rayīṇāmatandro dūto yajathāya devān
analyzed: sa hi kṣapāvān abhavat rayīṇām atandraḥ dūtaḥ yajathāya devān

original: RV_07.011.01.1{14} mahānasyadhvarasya praketo na ṛte tvadamṛtā mādayante
analyzed: mahān asi adhvarasya praketaḥ na ṛte tvat amṛtāḥ mādayante

original: RV_07.011.01.2{14} ā viśvebhiḥ sarathaṃ yāhi devairnyagne hotā prathamaḥ sadeha
analyzed: ā viśvebhiḥ sa ratham yāhi devaiḥ nyagne hotā prathamaḥ sadā iha

original: RV_07.011.02.1{14} tvāmīḷate ajiraṃ dūtyāya haviṣmantaḥ sadamin mānuṣāsaḥ
analyzed: tvām īḍate ajiram dūtyāya haviṣmantaḥ sadamidh mānuṣāsaḥ

original: RV_07.011.02.2{14} yasya devairāsado barhiragne 'hānyasmai sudinā bhavanti
analyzed: yasya devaiḥ āsadaḥ barhiḥ agne ha anyasmai su dināḥ bhavanti

original: RV_07.011.03.1{14} triścidaktoḥ pra cikiturvasūni tve antardāśuṣe martyāya
analyzed: tris cit aktoḥ pra cikituḥ vasūni tve antar dāśuṣe martyāya

original: RV_07.011.03.2{14} manuṣvadagna iha yakṣi devān bhavā no dūto adhiśastipāvā
analyzed: manuṣvat agne iha yakṣi devān bhava naḥ dūtaḥ adhiśasti pāvā

original: RV_07.011.04.1{14} agnirīśe bṛhato adhvarasyāgnirviśvasya haviṣaḥ kṛtasya
analyzed: agniḥ īśe bṛhataḥ adhvarasya agniḥ viśvasya haviṣaḥ kṛtasya

original: RV_07.011.04.2{14} kratuṃ hyasya vasavo juṣantāthā devā dadhire havyavāham
analyzed: kratum hi asya vasavaḥ juṣanta athā devāḥ dadhire havyavāham

original: RV_07.011.05.1{14} āgne vaha haviradyāya devānindrajyeṣṭhāsa iha mādayantām
analyzed: ā agne vaha haviḥ adyāya devān indra jyeṣṭhāsaḥ iha mādayantām

original: RV_07.011.05.2{14} imaṃ yajñaṃ divi deveṣu dhehi yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: imam yajñam divi deveṣu dhehi yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.012.01.1{15} aganma mahā namasā yaviṣṭhaṃ yo dīdāya samiddhaḥ sve duroṇe
analyzed: aganma mahā namasā yaviṣṭham yaḥ dīdāya samiddhaḥ sve duroṇe

original: RV_07.012.01.2{15} citrabhānuṃ rodasī antarurvī svāhutaṃ viśvataḥ pratyañcam
analyzed: citra bhānum rodasī antar urvī su āhutam viśvatas pratyañcam

original: RV_07.012.02.1{15} sa mahnā viśvā duritāni sāhvānagniḥ ṣṭave dama ā jātavedāḥ
analyzed: sa mahnā viśvā duritāni sāhvān agniḥ tave dame ā jātavedāḥ

original: RV_07.012.02.2{15} sa no rakṣiṣad duritādavadyādasmān gṛṇata uta no maghonaḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ rakṣiṣat duritāt avadyāt asmān gṛṇataḥ uta naḥ maghonaḥ

original: RV_07.012.03.1{15} tvaṃ varuṇa uta mitro agne tvāṃ vardhanti matibhirvasiṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: tvam varuṇaḥ uta mitraḥ agne tvām vardhanti matibhiḥ vasiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_07.012.03.2{15} tve vasu suṣaṇanāni santu yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: tve vasu suṣaṇanāni santu yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.013.01.1{16} prāgnaye viśvaśuce dhiyandhe 'suraghne manma dhītiṃ bharadhvam
analyzed: pra agnaye viśva śuce dhiyandhe sura ghne manma dhītim bharadhvam

original: RV_07.013.01.2{16} bhare havirna barhiṣi prīṇāno vaiśvānarāya yataye matīnām
analyzed: bhare haviḥ na barhiṣi prīṇānaḥ vaiśvānarāya yataye matīnām

original: RV_07.013.02.1{16} tvamagne śociṣā śośucāna ā rodasī apṛṇā jāyamānaḥ
analyzed: tvam agne śociṣā śośucānaḥ ā rodasī apṛṇāḥ jāyamānaḥ

original: RV_07.013.02.2{16} tvaṃ devānabhiśasteramuñco vaisvānara jātavedo mahitvā
analyzed: tvam devān abhiśasteḥ amuñcaḥ vaisvānara jātavedaḥ mahitvā

original: RV_07.013.03.1{16} jāto yadagne bhuvanā vyakhyaḥ paśūn na gopā iryaḥ parijmā
analyzed: jātaḥ yat agne bhuvanā vyakhyaḥ paśūn na gopāḥ iryaḥ parijmā

original: RV_07.013.03.2{16} vaiśvānara brahmaṇe vinda gātuṃ yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: vaiśvānara brahmaṇe vinda gātum yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.014.01.1{17} samidhā jātavedase devāya devahūtibhiḥ
analyzed: samidhā jātavedase devāya deva hūtibhiḥ

original: RV_07.014.01.2{17} havirbhiḥ śukraśociṣe namasvino vayaṃ dāśemāgnaye
analyzed: havirbhiḥ śukra śociṣe namasvinaḥ vayam dāśema agnaye

original: RV_07.014.02.1{17} vayaṃ te agne samidhā vidhema vayaṃ dāśema suṣṭutī yajatra
analyzed: vayam te agne samidhā vidhema vayam dāśema suṣṭutī yajatra

original: RV_07.014.02.2{17} vayaṃ ghṛtenādhvarasya hotarvayaṃ deva haviṣā bhadraśoce
analyzed: vayam ghṛtena adhvarasya hotar vayam deva haviṣā bhadra śoce

original: RV_07.014.03.1{17} ā no devebhirupa devahūtimagne yāhi vaṣaṭkṛtiṃ juṣāṇaḥ
analyzed: ā naḥ devebhiḥ upa deva hūtim agne yāhi vaṣaṭkṛtim juṣāṇaḥ

original: RV_07.014.03.2{17} tubhyaṃ devāya dāśataḥ syāma yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: tubhyam devāya dāśataḥ syāma yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.015.01.1{18} upasadyāya mīḷhuṣa āsye juhutā haviḥ
analyzed: upasadyāya mīḍhuṣe āsye juhuta haviḥ

original: RV_07.015.01.2{18} yo no nediṣṭhamāpyam
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ nediṣṭham āpyam

original: RV_07.015.02.1{18} yaḥ pañca carṣaṇīrabhi niṣasāda dame-dame
analyzed: yaḥ pañca carṣaṇīḥ abhi niṣasāda damedame

original: RV_07.015.02.2{18} kavirgṛhapatiryuvā
analyzed: kaviḥ gṛhapatiḥ yuvā

original: RV_07.015.03.1{18} sa no vedo amātyamagnī rakṣatu viśvataḥ
analyzed: sa naḥ vedaḥ amātyam agniḥ rakṣatu viśvatas

original: RV_07.015.03.2{18} utāsmān pātvaṃhasaḥ
analyzed: uta asmān pātu aṃhasaḥ

original: RV_07.015.04.1{18} navaṃ nu stomamagnaye divaḥ śyenāya jījanam
analyzed: navam nu stomam agnaye divaḥ śyenāya jījanam

original: RV_07.015.04.2{18} vasvaḥ kuvid vanāti naḥ
analyzed: vasvaḥ kuvid vanāti naḥ

original: RV_07.015.05.1{18} spārhā yasya śriyo dṛśe rayirvīravato yathā
analyzed: spārhāḥ yasya śriyaḥ dṛśe rayiḥ vīravataḥ yathā

original: RV_07.015.05.2{18} agre yajñasya śocataḥ
analyzed: agre yajñasya śocataḥ

original: RV_07.015.06.1{19} semāṃ vetu vaṣaṭkṛtimagnirjuṣata no giraḥ
analyzed: sā imām vetu vaṣaṭkṛtim agniḥ juṣata naḥ giraḥ

original: RV_07.015.06.2{19} yajiṣṭho havyavāhanaḥ
analyzed: yajiṣṭhaḥ havyavāhanaḥ

original: RV_07.015.07.1{19} ni tvā nakṣya viśpate dyumantaṃ deva dhīmahi
analyzed: ni tvā nakṣya viśpate dyumantam deva dhīmahi

original: RV_07.015.07.2{19} suvīramagna āhuta
analyzed: su vīram agne āhuta

original: RV_07.015.08.1{19} kṣapa usraśca dīdihi svagnayastvayā vayam
analyzed: kṣapaḥ usraḥ ca dīdihi su agnayaḥ tvayā vayam

original: RV_07.015.08.2{19} suvīrastvamasmayuḥ
analyzed: su vīraḥ tvam asmayuḥ

original: RV_07.015.09.1{19} upa tvā sātaye naro viprāso yanti dhītibhiḥ
analyzed: upa tvā sātaye naraḥ viprāsaḥ yanti dhītibhiḥ

original: RV_07.015.09.2{19} upākṣarāsahasriṇī
analyzed: upa akṣarā sahasriṇī

original: RV_07.015.10.1{19} agnī rakṣāṃsi sedhati śukraśociramartyaḥ
analyzed: agniḥ rakṣāṃsi sedhati śukra śociḥ amartyaḥ

original: RV_07.015.10.2{19} śuciḥ pāvaka īḍyaḥ
analyzed: śuciḥ pāvakaḥ īḍyaḥ

original: RV_07.015.11.1{20} sa no rādhāṃsyā bhareśānaḥ sahaso yaho
analyzed: sa naḥ rādhāṃsyā bhara īśānaḥ sahasaḥ yaho

original: RV_07.015.11.2{20} bhagaśca dātuvāryam
analyzed: bhagaḥ ca dātu vāryam

original: RV_07.015.12.1{20} tvamagne vīravad yaśo devaśca savitā bhagaḥ
analyzed: tvam agne vīravat yaśaḥ devaḥ ca savitā bhagaḥ

original: RV_07.015.12.2{20} ditiścadāti vāryam
analyzed: ditiḥ cadāti vāryam

original: RV_07.015.13.1{20} agne rakṣā ṇo aṃhasaḥ prati ṣma deva rīṣataḥ
analyzed: agne rakṣa naḥ aṃhasaḥ prati sma deva rīṣataḥ

original: RV_07.015.13.2{20} tapiṣṭhairajaro daha
analyzed: tapiṣṭhaiḥ ajaraḥ daha

original: RV_07.015.14.1{20} adhā mahī na āyasyanādhṛṣṭo nṛpītaye
analyzed: adhā mahī naḥ āyasī anādhṛṣṭaḥ nṛ pītaye

original: RV_07.015.14.2{20} pūrbhavā śatabhujiḥ
analyzed: pūrbhavā śata bhujiḥ

original: RV_07.015.15.1{20} tvaṃ naḥ pāhyaṃhaso doṣāvastaraghāyataḥ
analyzed: tvam naḥ pāhi aṃhasaḥ doṣā vastara ghāyataḥ

original: RV_07.015.15.2{20} divā naktamadābhya
analyzed: divā

original: RV_07.016.01.1{21} enā vo agniṃ namasorjo napātamā huve
analyzed: enā vaḥ agnim namasā ūrjaḥ napātam ā huve

original: RV_07.016.01.2{21} priyaṃ cetiṣṭhamaratiṃ svadhvaraṃ viśvasya dūtamamṛtam
analyzed: priyam cetiṣṭham aratim su adhvaram viśvasya dūtam amṛtam

original: RV_07.016.02.1{21} sa yojate aruṣā viśvabhojasā sa dudravat svāhutaḥ
analyzed: sa yojate aruṣā viśva bhojasā sa dudravat su āhutaḥ

original: RV_07.016.02.2{21} subrahmā yajñaḥ suśamī vasūnāṃ devaṃ rādho janānām
analyzed: su brahmā yajñaḥ suśamī vasūnām devam rādhaḥ janānām

original: RV_07.016.03.1{21} udasya śocirasthādājuhvānasya mīḷhuṣaḥ
analyzed: udasya śociḥ asthāt ājuhvānasya mīḷhuṣaḥ

original: RV_07.016.03.2{21} ud dhūmāsoaruṣāso divispṛśaḥ samagnimindhate naraḥ
analyzed: ud dhūmāsaḥ aruṣāsaḥ divispṛśaḥ sam agnim indhate naraḥ

original: RV_07.016.04.1{21} taṃ tvā dūtaṃ kṛṇmahe yaśastamaṃ devānā vītaye vaha
analyzed: tam tvā dūtam kṛṇmahe yaśastamam devānā vītaye vaha

original: RV_07.016.04.2{21} viśvā sūno sahaso martabhojanā rāsva tad yat tvemahe
analyzed: viśvā sūno sahasaḥ marta bhojanā rāsva tat yat tvā īmahe

original: RV_07.016.05.1{21} tvamagne gṛhapatistvaṃ hotā no adhvare
analyzed: tvam agne gṛhapatiḥ tvam hotā naḥ adhvare

original: RV_07.016.05.2{21} tvaṃ potā viśvavāra pracetā yakṣi veṣi ca vāryam
analyzed: tvam potā viśva vāra pracetāḥ yakṣi veṣi ca vāryam

original: RV_07.016.06.1{21} kṛdhi ratnaṃ yajamānāya sukrato tvaṃ hi ratnadhā asi
analyzed: kṛdhi ratnam yajamānāya su krato tvam hi ratna dhāḥ asi

original: RV_07.016.06.2{21} āna ṛte śiśīhi viśvam ṛtvijaṃ suśaṃso yaśca dakṣate
analyzed: ānaḥ ṛte śiśīhi viśvam ṛtvijam su śaṃsaḥ yaḥ ca dakṣate

original: RV_07.016.07.1{22} tve agne svāhuta priyāsaḥ santu sūrayaḥ
analyzed: tve agne su āhuta priyāsaḥ santu sūrayaḥ

original: RV_07.016.07.2{22} yantāro ye maghavāno janānāmūrvān dayanta gonām
analyzed: yantāraḥ ye maghavānaḥ janānām ūrvān dayanta gonām

original: RV_07.016.08.1{22} yeṣāmiḷā ghṛtahastā duroṇa ānapi prātā niṣīdati
analyzed: yeṣām iḍā ghṛta hastā duroṇe ān api prātā niṣīdati

original: RV_07.016.08.2{22} tāṃstrāyasva sahasya druho nido yachā naḥ śarma dīrghaśrut
analyzed: tān trāyasva sahasya druhaḥ nidaḥ yaccha naḥ śarma dīrgha śrut

original: RV_07.016.09.1{22} sa mandrayā ca jihvayā vahnirāsā viduṣṭaraḥ
analyzed: sa mandrayā ca jihvayā vahni rāsā viduṣṭaraḥ

original: RV_07.016.09.2{22} agne rayiṃ maghavadbhyo na ā vaha havyadātiṃ ca sūdaya
analyzed: agne rayim maghavadbhyaḥ naḥ ā vaha havya dātim ca sūdaya

original: RV_07.016.10.1{22} ye rādhāṃsi dadatyaśvyā maghā kāmena śravaso mahaḥ
analyzed: ye rādhāṃsi dadati aśvyā maghā kāmena śravasaḥ mahaḥ

original: RV_07.016.10.2{22} tānaṃhasaḥ pipṛhi partṛbhiṣ ṭvaṃ śataṃ pūrbhiryaviṣṭhya
analyzed: tān aṃhasaḥ pipṛhi partṛbhiḥ tvam śatam pūrbhiḥ yaviṣṭhya

original: RV_07.016.11.1{22} devo vo draviṇodāḥ pūrṇāṃ vivaṣṭyāsicam
analyzed: devaḥ vaḥ draviṇaḥ dāḥ pūrṇām vivaṣṭi āsicam

original: RV_07.016.11.2{22} ud vā siñcadhvamupa vā pṛṇadhvamādid vo deva ohate
analyzed: ud vā siñcadhvam upa vā pṛṇadhvam āt id vaḥ devaḥ ohate

original: RV_07.016.12.1{22} taṃ hotāramadhvarasya pracetasaṃ vahniṃ devā akṛṇvata
analyzed: tam hotāram adhvarasya pracetasam vahnim devāḥ akṛṇvata

original: RV_07.016.12.2{22} dadhāti ratnaṃ vidhate suvīryamagnirjanāya dāśuṣe
analyzed: dadhāti ratnam vidhate su vīryam agniḥ janāya dāśuṣe

original: RV_07.017.01.1{23} agne bhava suṣamidhā samiddha uta barhirurviyā vi stṛṇītām
analyzed: agne bhava suṣamidhā samiddhaḥ uta barhiḥ urviyā vi stṛṇītām

original: RV_07.017.02.1{23} uta dvāra uśatīrvi śrayantāmuta devānuśata ā vaheha
analyzed: uta dvāraḥ uśatīḥ vi śrayantām uta devān uśataḥ ā vaha iha

original: RV_07.017.03.1{23} agne vīhi haviṣā vakṣi devān svadhvarā kṛṇuhi jātavedaḥ
analyzed: agne vīhi haviṣā vakṣi devān su adhvarā kṛṇuhi jātavedaḥ

original: RV_07.017.04.1{23} svadhvarā karati jātavedā yakṣad devānamṛtān piprayacca
analyzed: su adhvarā karati jātavedāḥ yakṣat devān amṛtān piprayat ca

original: RV_07.017.05.1{23} vaṃsva viśvā vāryāṇi pracetaḥ satyā bhavantvāśiṣo noadya
analyzed: vaṃsva viśvā vāryāṇi pracetaḥ satyāḥ bhavantu āśiṣaḥ naḥ adya

original: RV_07.017.06.1{23} tvāmu te dadhire havyavāhaṃ devāso agna ūrja ā napātam
analyzed: tvām u te dadhire havyavāham devāsaḥ agne ūrjaḥ ā napātam

original: RV_07.017.07.1{23} te te devāya dāśataḥ syāma maho no ratnā vi dadha iyānaḥ
analyzed: te te devāya dāśataḥ syāma mahaḥ naḥ ratnā vi dadhe iyānaḥ

original: RV_07.018.01.1{24} tve ha yat pitaraścin na indra viśvā vāmā jaritāro asanvan
analyzed: tve ha yat pitaraḥ cit naḥ indra viśvā vāmā jaritāraḥ asanvan

original: RV_07.018.01.2{24} tve gāvaḥ sudughāstve hyaśvāstvaṃ vasu devayatevaniṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: tve gāvaḥ su dughāḥ tve hi aśvāḥ tvam vasu devayatevaniṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_07.018.02.1{24} rājeva hi janibhiḥ kṣeṣyevāva dyubhirabhi viduṣ kaviḥ san
analyzed: rājā iva hi janibhiḥ kṣeṣyā iva ava dyubhiḥ abhi viduṣ kaviḥ san

original: RV_07.018.02.2{24} piśā giro maghavan gobhiraśvaistvāyataḥ śiśīhirāye asmān
analyzed: piśa giraḥ maghavan gobhiḥ aśvaiḥ tvāyataḥ śiśīhiḥ āye asmān

original: RV_07.018.03.1{24} imā u tvā paspṛdhānāso atra mandrā giro devayantīrupa sthuḥ
analyzed: imāḥ u tvā paspṛdhānāsaḥ atra mandrāḥ giraḥ devayantīḥ upa sthuḥ

original: RV_07.018.03.2{24} arvācī te pathyā rāya etu syāma te sumatāvindra śarman
analyzed: arvācī te pathyā rāyaḥ etu syāma te sumatau indra śarman

original: RV_07.018.04.1{24} dhenuṃ na tvā sūyavase dudukṣannupa brahmāṇi sasṛje vasiṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: dhenum na tvā sūyavase dudukṣan upa brahmāṇi sasṛje vasiṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_07.018.04.2{24} tvāmin me gopatiṃ viśva āhā na indraḥ sumatiṃ gantvacha
analyzed: tvāmid me gopatim viśve āha ā naḥ indraḥ sumatim gantu acha

original: RV_07.018.05.1{24} arṇāṃsi cit paprathānā sudāsa indro gādhānyakṛṇot supārā
analyzed: arṇāṃsi cit paprathānā sudāse indraḥ gādhāni akṛṇot su pārā

original: RV_07.018.05.2{24} śardhantaṃ śimyumucathasya navyaḥ śāpaṃ sindhūnāmakṛṇodaśastīḥ
analyzed: śardhantam śimyum ucathasya navyaḥ śāpam sindhūnām akṛṇot aśastīḥ

original: RV_07.018.06.1{25} puroḷā it turvaśo yakṣurāsīd rāye matsyāso niśitā apīva
analyzed: puroḷās id turvaśaḥ yakṣuḥ āsīt rāye matsyāsaḥ niśitāḥ api iva

original: RV_07.018.06.2{25} śruṣṭiṃ cakrurbhṛgavo druhyavaśca sakhā sakhāyamatarad viṣūcoḥ
analyzed: śruṣṭim cakruḥ bhṛgavaḥ druhyavaḥ ca sakhā sakhāyam atarat viṣūcoḥ

original: RV_07.018.07.1{25} ā pakthāso bhalānaso bhanantālināso viṣāṇinaḥ śivāsaḥ
analyzed: ā pakthāsaḥ bhalānasaḥ viṣāṇinaḥ śivāsaḥ

original: RV_07.018.07.2{25} ā yo 'nayat sadhamā āryasya gavyā tṛtsubhyo ajagan yudhā nṛn
analyzed: ā yaḥ nayat sadhamāḥ āryasya gavyā tṛtsubhyaḥ ajagan yudhā nṛn

original: RV_07.018.08.1{25} durādhyo aditiṃ srevayanto 'cetaso vi jagṛbhre paruṣṇīm
analyzed: durādhyaḥ aditim srevayantaḥ cetasaḥ vi jagṛbhre paruṣṇīm

original: RV_07.018.08.2{25} mahnāvivyak pṛthivīṃ patyamānaḥ paśuṣ kaviraśayaccāyamānaḥ
analyzed: mahnā avivyak pṛthivīm patyamānaḥ paśuḥ kaviḥ aśayat cāyamānaḥ

original: RV_07.018.09.1{25} īyurarthaṃ na nyarthaṃ paruṣṇīmāśuścanedabhipitvaṃ jagāma
analyzed: īyuḥ artham na nyartham paruṣṇīm āśuḥ cana id abhipitvam jagāma

original: RV_07.018.09.2{25} sudāsa indraḥ sutukānamitrānarandhayan mānuṣe vadhrivācaḥ
analyzed: sudāse indraḥ sutukān amitrān arandhayat mānuṣe vadhri vācaḥ

original: RV_07.018.10.1{25} īyurgāvo na yavasādagopā yathākṛtamabhi mitraṃ citāsaḥ
analyzed: īyuḥ gāvaḥ na yavasāda gopāḥ yathākṛtam abhi mitram citāsaḥ

original: RV_07.018.10.2{25} pṛśnigāvaḥ pṛśninipreṣitāsaḥ śruṣṭiṃ cakrurniyuto rantayaśca
analyzed: pṛśni gāvaḥ pṛśni nipreṣitāsaḥ śruṣṭim cakruḥ niyutaḥ rantayaḥ ca

original: RV_07.018.11.1{26} ekaṃ ca yo viṃśatiṃ ca śravasyā vaikarṇayorjanān rājā nyastaḥ
analyzed: ekam ca yaḥ viṃśatim ca śravasyāḥ vaikarṇayoḥ janān rājā nyastaḥ

original: RV_07.018.11.2{26} dasmo na sadman ni śiśāti barhiḥ śūraḥ sargamakṛṇodindra eṣām
analyzed: dasmaḥ na sadman ni śiśāti barhiḥ śūraḥ sargam akṛṇot indraḥ eṣām

original: RV_07.018.12.1{26} adha śrutaṃ kavaṣaṃ vṛddhamapsvanu druhyuṃ ni vṛṇag vajrabāhuḥ
analyzed: adha śrutam kavaṣam vṛddham apsu anu druhyum ni vṛṇak vajra bāhuḥ

original: RV_07.018.12.2{26} vṛṇānā atra sakhyāya sakhyaṃ tvāyanto ye amadannanu tvā
analyzed: vṛṇānāḥ atra sakhyāya sakhyam tvāyantaḥ ye amadan anu tvā

original: RV_07.018.13.1{26} vi sadyo viśvā dṛṃhitānyeṣāmindraḥ puraḥ sahasā sapta dardaḥ
analyzed: vi sadyas viśvā dṛṃhitāni eṣām indraḥ puraḥ sahasā sapta dardar

original: RV_07.018.13.2{26} vyānavasya tṛtsave gayaṃ bhāg jeṣma pūruṃ vidathe mṛdhravācam
analyzed: vyānavasya tṛtsave gayam bhāk jeṣma pūrum vidathe mṛdhra vācam

original: RV_07.018.14.1{26} ni gavyavo 'navo druhyavaśca ṣaṣṭiḥ śatā suṣupuḥ ṣaṭ sahasrā
analyzed: ni gavyavaḥ navaḥ druhyavaḥ ca ṣaṣṭiḥ śatā suṣupuḥ ṣaḍ sahasrā

original: RV_07.018.14.2{26} ṣaṣṭirvīrāso adhi ṣaḍ duvoyu viśvedindrasya vīryā kṛtāni
analyzed: ṣaṣṭiḥ vīrāsaḥ adhi ṣaḍ duvoyu viśvā id indrasya vīryā kṛtāni

original: RV_07.018.15.1{26} indreṇaite tṛtsavo veviṣāṇā āpo na sṛṣṭā adhavanta nīcīḥ
analyzed: indreṇa ete tṛtsavaḥ veviṣāṇāḥ āpaḥ na sṛṣṭāḥ adhavanta nīcīḥ

original: RV_07.018.15.2{26} durmitrāsaḥ prakalavin mimānā jahurviśvāni bhojanā sudāse
analyzed: durmitrāsaḥ prakala vid mimānāḥ jahuḥ viśvāni bhojanā sudāse

original: RV_07.018.16.1{27} ardhaṃ vīrasya śṛtapāmanindraṃ parā śardhantaṃ nunude abhi kṣām
analyzed: ardham vīrasya śṛta pāman indram parā śardhantam nunude abhi kṣām

original: RV_07.018.16.2{27} indro manyuṃ manyumyo mimāya bheje patho vartanimpatyamānaḥ
analyzed: indraḥ manyum manyumyaḥ mimāya bheje pathaḥ vartanimpatyamānaḥ

original: RV_07.018.17.1{27} ādhreṇa cit tad vekaṃ cakāra siṃhyaṃ cit petvenā jaghāna
analyzed: ādhreṇa cit tat vekam cakāra siṃhyam cit petvena ā jaghāna

original: RV_07.018.17.2{27} ava sraktīrveśyāvṛścadindraḥ prāyachad viśvā bhojanā sudāse
analyzed: ava sraktīḥ veśyā avṛścat indraḥ prāyacchat viśvā bhojanā sudāse

original: RV_07.018.18.1{27} śaśvanto hi śatravo rāradhuṣ ṭe bhedasya cicchardhato vinda randhim
analyzed: śaśvantaḥ hi śatravaḥ rāradhuḥ ṭe bhedasya cit śardhataḥ vinda randhim

original: RV_07.018.18.2{27} martānena stuvato yaḥ kṛṇoti tigmaṃ tasmin ni jahi vajramindra
analyzed: martā anena stuvataḥ yaḥ kṛṇoti tigmam tasmin ni jahi vajram indra

original: RV_07.018.19.1{27} āvadindraṃ yamunā tṛtsavaśca prātra bhedaṃ sarvatātāmuṣāyat
analyzed: āvat indram yamunā tṛtsavaḥ ca pra atra bhedam sarvatātāmuṣāyat

original: RV_07.018.19.2{27} ajāsaśca śigravo yakṣavaśca baliṃ śīrṣāṇi jabhruraśvyāni
analyzed: ajāsaḥ ca śigravaḥ yakṣavaḥ ca balim śīrṣāṇi jabhruḥ aśvyāni

original: RV_07.018.20.1{27} na ta indra sumatayo na rāyaḥ saṃcakṣe pūrvā uṣaso na nūtnāḥ
analyzed: na te indra sumatayaḥ na rāyaḥ saṃcakṣe pūrvāḥ uṣasaḥ na nūtnāḥ

original: RV_07.018.20.2{27} devakaṃ cin mānyamānaṃ jaghanthāva tmanā bṛhataḥ śambaraṃ bhet
analyzed: devakam cit mānyamānam jaghanthāva tmanā bṛhataḥ śambaram bhet

original: RV_07.018.21.1{28} pra ye gṛhādamamadustvāyā parāśaraḥ śatayāturvasiṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: pra ye parāśaraḥ śatayātuḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_07.018.21.2{28} na te bhojasya sakhyaṃ mṛṣantādhā sūribhyaḥ sudinā vyuchān
analyzed: na te bhojasya sakhyam mṛṣanta adhā sūribhyaḥ su dinā vyuchān

original: RV_07.018.22.1{28} dve napturdevavataḥ śate gordvā rathā vadhūmantā sudāsaḥ
analyzed: dve naptuḥ devavataḥ śate goḥ dvā rathā vadhūmantā sudāsaḥ

original: RV_07.018.22.2{28} arhannagne paijavanasya dānaṃ hoteva sadma paryemi rebhan
analyzed: arhan agne paijavanasya dānam hotā iva sadma paryemi rebhan

original: RV_07.018.23.1{28} catvāro mā paijavanasya dānāḥ smaddiṣṭayaḥ kṛśanino nireke
analyzed: catvāraḥ mā paijavanasya dānāḥ smad diṣṭayaḥ kṛśaninaḥ nireke

original: RV_07.018.23.2{28} ṛjrāso mā pṛthiviṣṭhāḥ sudāsastokaṃ tokāya śravase vahanti
analyzed: ṛjrāsaḥ mā pṛthiviṣṭhāḥ sudāsaḥ tokam tokāya śravase vahanti

original: RV_07.018.24.1{28} yasya śravo rodasī antarurvī śīrṣṇe-śīrṣṇe vibabhājā vibhaktā
analyzed: yasya śravaḥ rodasī antar urvī śīrṣṇe śīrṣṇe vibabhājā vibhaktā

original: RV_07.018.24.2{28} saptedindraṃ na sravato gṛṇanti ni yudhyāmadhimaśiśādabhīke
analyzed: sapta id indram na sravataḥ gṛṇanti ni yudhyām adhim aśiśāt abhīke

original: RV_07.018.25.1{28} imaṃ naro marutaḥ saścatānu divodāsaṃ na pitaraṃ sudāsaḥ
analyzed: imam naraḥ marutaḥ saścata anu divodāsam na pitaram sudāsaḥ

original: RV_07.018.25.2{28} aviṣṭanā paijavanasya ketaṃ dūṇāśaṃ kṣatramajaraṃ duvoyu
analyzed: aviṣṭanā paijavanasya ketam dūṇāśam kṣatram ajaram duvoyu

original: RV_07.019.01.1{29} yastigmaśṛṅgo vṛṣabho na bhīma ekaḥ kṛṣṭīścyāvayati pra viśvāḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tigma śṛṅgaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ na bhīmaḥ ekaḥ kṛṣṭīḥ cyāvayati pra viśvāḥ

original: RV_07.019.01.2{29} yaḥ śaśvato adāśuṣo gayasya prayantāsisuṣvitarāya vedaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ śaśvataḥ a dāśuṣaḥ gayasya prayantā asi suṣvitarāya vedaḥ

original: RV_07.019.02.1{29} tvaṃ ha tyadindra kutsamāvaḥ śuśrūṣamāṇastanvā samarye
analyzed: tvam ha tyad indra kutsamāvaḥ śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ tanvā samarye

original: RV_07.019.02.2{29} dāsaṃ yacchuṣṇaṃ kuyavaṃ nyasmā arandhaya ārjuneyāya śikṣan
analyzed: dāsam yat śuṣṇam kuyavam ni asmai arandhayaḥ ārjuneyāya śikṣan

original: RV_07.019.03.1{29} tvaṃ dhṛṣṇo dhṛṣatā vītahavyaṃ prāvo viśvābhirūtibhiḥ sudāsam
analyzed: tvam dhṛṣṇo dhṛṣatā vītahavyam prāvaḥ viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ sudāsam

original: RV_07.019.03.2{29} pra paurukutsiṃ trasadasyumāvaḥ kṣetrasātā vṛtrahatyeṣu pūrum
analyzed: pra paurukutsim trasadasyum āvaḥ kṣetra sātā vṛtra hatyeṣu pūrum

original: RV_07.019.04.1{29} tvaṃ nṛbhirnṛmaṇo devavītau bhūrīṇi vṛtrā haryaśva haṃsi
analyzed: tvam nṛbhiḥ nṛmaṇaḥ deva vītau bhūrīṇi vṛtrā haryaśva haṃsi

original: RV_07.019.04.2{29} tvaṃ ni dasyuṃ cumuriṃ dhuniṃ cāsvāpayo dabhītaye suhantu
analyzed: tvam ni dasyum cumurim dhunim ca asvāpayaḥ dabhītaye su hantu

original: RV_07.019.05.1{29} tava cyautnāni vajrahasta tāni nava yat puro navatiṃ ca sadyaḥ
analyzed: tava cyautnāni vajrahasta tāni nava yat puras navatim ca sadyas

original: RV_07.019.05.2{29} niveśane śatatamāviveṣīrahañca vṛtraṃ namucimutāhan
analyzed: niveśane śatatamā aviveṣīḥ aham ca vṛtram namucim uta ahan

original: RV_07.019.06.1{30} sanā tā ta indra bhojanāni rātahavyāya dāśuṣe sudāse
analyzed: sanā tā te indra bhojanāni rāta havyāya dāśuṣe sudāse

original: RV_07.019.06.2{30} vṛṣṇe te harī vṛṣaṇā yunajmi vyantu brahmāṇi puruśāka vājam
analyzed: vṛṣṇe te harī vṛṣaṇā yunajmi vyantu brahmāṇi puruśāka vājam

original: RV_07.019.07.1{30} mā te asyāṃ sahasāvan pariṣṭāvaghāya bhūma harivaḥ parādai
analyzed: mā te asyām sahasāvan bhūma harivas parādai

original: RV_07.019.07.2{30} trāyasva no 'vṛkebhirvarūthaistava priyāsaḥ sūriṣu syāma
analyzed: trāyasva naḥ vṛkebhiḥ varūthaiḥ tava priyāsaḥ sūriṣu syāma

original: RV_07.019.08.1{30} priyāsa it te maghavannabhiṣṭau naro madema śaraṇe sakhāyaḥ
analyzed: priyāsaḥ id te maghavan abhiṣṭau naraḥ madema śaraṇe sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_07.019.08.2{30} ni turvaśaṃ ni yādvaṃ śiśīhyatithigvāya śaṃsyaṃ kariṣyan
analyzed: ni turvaśam ni yādvam śiśīhi atithigvāya śaṃsyam kariṣyan

original: RV_07.019.09.1{30} sadyaścin nu te maghavannabhiṣṭau naraḥ śaṃsantyukthaśāsa ukthā
analyzed: sadyaścit nu te maghavan abhiṣṭau naraḥ śaṃsanti uktha śāsaḥ ukthā

original: RV_07.019.09.2{30} ye te havebhirvi paṇīnradāśannasmān vṛṇīṣva yujyāya tasmai
analyzed: ye te havebhiḥ vi paṇīn radāśan asmān vṛṇīṣva yujyāya tasmai

original: RV_07.019.10.1{30} ete stomā narāṃ nṛtama tubhyamasmadryañco dadato maghāni
analyzed: ete stomāḥ narām nṛtama tubhyam asmadryañcaḥ dadataḥ maghāni

original: RV_07.019.10.2{30} teṣāmindra vṛtrahatye śivo bhūḥ sakhā ca śūro 'vitāca nṛṇām
analyzed: teṣām indra vṛtra hatye śivaḥ bhūḥ sakhā ca śūraḥ vitāca nṛṇām

original: RV_07.019.11.1{30} nū indra śūra stavamāna ūtī brahmajūtastanvā vāvṛdhasva
analyzed: nu indra śūra stavamānaḥ ūtī brahma jūtaḥ tanvā vāvṛdhasva

original: RV_07.019.11.2{30} upa no vājān mimīhyupa stīn yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: upa naḥ vājān mimīhi upa stīn yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.020.01.1{01} ugro jajñe vīryāya svadhāvāñcakrirapo naryo yat kariṣyan
analyzed: ugraḥ jajñe vīryāya svadhāvān cakriḥ apaḥ naryaḥ yat kariṣyan

original: RV_07.020.01.2{01} jagmiryuvā nṛṣadanamavobhistrātā na indra enaso mahaścit
analyzed: jagmiḥ yuvā nṛṣadanam avobhiḥ trātā naḥ indraḥ enasaḥ mahaḥ cit

original: RV_07.020.02.1{01} hanta vṛtramindraḥ śūśuvānaḥ prāvīn nu vīro jaritāramūtī
analyzed: hanta vṛtram indraḥ śūśuvānaḥ prāvīt nu vīraḥ jaritāram ūtī

original: RV_07.020.02.2{01} kartā sudāse aha vā u lokaṃ dātā vasu muhurā dāśuṣe bhūt
analyzed: kartā sudāse aha vai u lokam dātā vasu muhurā dāśuṣe bhūt

original: RV_07.020.03.1{01} yudhmo anarvā khajakṛt samadvā śūraḥ satrāṣāḍ januṣemaṣāḷhaḥ
analyzed: yudhmaḥ anarvā khaja kṛt samadvā śūraḥ satrāṣāh januṣemaṣāḷhaḥ

original: RV_07.020.03.2{01} vyāsa indraḥ pṛtanāḥ svojā adhā viśvaṃśatrūyantaṃ jaghāna
analyzed: vyāsaḥ indraḥ pṛtanāḥ sva ojāḥ adhā viśvam śatrūyantam jaghāna

original: RV_07.020.04.1{01} ubhe cidindra rodasī mahitvā paprātha taviṣībhistuviṣmaḥ
analyzed: ubhe cit indra rodasī mahitvā paprātha taviṣībhiḥ tuviṣmas

original: RV_07.020.04.2{01} ni vajramindro harivān mimikṣan samandhasā madeṣu vāuvoca
analyzed: ni vajram indraḥ harivān mimikṣan sam andhasā madeṣu vā auvoca

original: RV_07.020.05.1{01} vṛṣā jajāna vṛṣaṇaṃ raṇāya tamu cin nārī naryaṃ sasūva
analyzed: vṛṣā jajāna vṛṣaṇam raṇāya tamu cit nārī naryam sasūva

original: RV_07.020.05.2{01} pra yaḥ senānīradha nṛbhyo astīnaḥ satvā gaveṣaṇaḥ sa dhṛṣṇuḥ
analyzed: pra yaḥ senā nīḥ adha nṛbhyaḥ astīnaḥ satvā gaveṣaṇaḥ sa dhṛṣṇuḥ

original: RV_07.020.06.1{02} nū cit sa bhreṣate jano na reṣan mano yo asya ghoramāvivāsāt
analyzed: nu cit sa bhreṣate janaḥ na reṣat manaḥ yaḥ asya ghoram āvivāsāt

original: RV_07.020.06.2{02} yajñairya indre dadhate duvāṃsi kṣayat sa rāya ṛtapā ṛtejāḥ
analyzed: yajñaiḥ yaḥ indre dadhate duvāṃsi kṣayat sa rāyaḥ ṛta pāḥ ṛtejāḥ

original: RV_07.020.07.1{02} yadindra pūrvo aparāya śikṣannayajjyāyān kanīyaso deṣṇam
analyzed: yat indra pūrvaḥ aparāya śikṣan ayat jyāyān kanīyasaḥ deṣṇam

original: RV_07.020.07.2{02} amṛta it paryāsīta dūramā citra citryaṃ bharā rayiṃ naḥ
analyzed: amṛte id paryāsīta dūram ā citra citryam bhara rayim naḥ

original: RV_07.020.08.1{02} yasta indra priyo jano dadāśadasan nireke adrivaḥ sakhā te
analyzed: yaḥ te indra priyaḥ janaḥ dadāśat asat nireke adrivas sakhā te

original: RV_07.020.08.2{02} vayaṃ te asyāṃ sumatau caniṣṭhāḥ syāma varūthe aghnato nṛpītau
analyzed: vayam te asyām sumatau caniṣṭhāḥ syāma varūthe a ghnataḥ nṛ pītau

original: RV_07.020.09.1{02} eṣa stomo acikradad vṛṣā ta uta stāmurmaghavannakrapiṣṭa
analyzed: eṣa stomaḥ acikradat vṛṣā te uta stāmuḥ maghavan akrapiṣṭa

original: RV_07.020.09.2{02} rāyas kāmo jaritāraṃ ta āgan tvamaṅga śakra vasva āśako naḥ
analyzed: rāyaḥ kāmaḥ jaritāram te āgan tvam aṅga śakra vasvaḥ āśakaḥ naḥ

original: RV_07.020.10.1{02} sa na indra tvayatāyā iṣe dhāstmanā ca ye maghavāno junanti
analyzed: sa naḥ indra tvayatāyai iṣe dhāḥ tmanā ca ye maghavānaḥ junanti

original: RV_07.020.10.2{02} vasvī ṣu te jaritre astu śaktiryūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: vasvī su te jaritre astu śaktiḥ yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.021.01.1{03} asāvi devaṃ goṛjīkamandho nyasminnindro januṣemuvoca
analyzed: asāvi devam goṛjīkam andhaḥ ni asmin indraḥ januṣā īm uvoca

original: RV_07.021.01.2{03} bodhāmasi tvā haryaśva yajñairbodhā na stomamandhaso madeṣu
analyzed: bodhāmasi tvā hari aśva yajñaiḥ bodha naḥ stomam andhasaḥ madeṣu

original: RV_07.021.02.1{03} pra yanti yajñaṃ vipayanti barhiḥ somamādo vidathe dudhravācaḥ
analyzed: pra yanti yajñam vipayanti barhiḥ somamādaḥ vidathe dudhra vācaḥ

original: RV_07.021.02.2{03} nyu bhriyante yaśaso gṛbhādā dūra upabdo vṛṣaṇonṛṣācaḥ
analyzed: niḥ bhriyante yaśasaḥ gṛbhādāḥ dūre upabdaḥ vṛṣaṇā unṛṣācaḥ

original: RV_07.021.03.1{03} tvamindra sravitavā apas kaḥ pariṣṭhitā ahinā śūra pūrvīḥ
analyzed: tvam indra sravitavai apaḥ kaḥ pariṣṭhitāḥ ahinā śūra pūrvīḥ

original: RV_07.021.03.2{03} tvad vāvakre rathyo na dhenā rejante viśvā kṛtrimāṇi bhīṣā
analyzed: tvat vāvakre rathyaḥ na dhenāḥ rejante viśvā kṛtrimāṇi bhīṣā

original: RV_07.021.04.1{03} bhīmo viveṣāyudhebhireṣāmapāṃsi viśvā naryāṇi vidvān
analyzed: bhīmaḥ viveṣa āyudhebhiḥ eṣām apāṃsi viśvā naryāṇi vidvān

original: RV_07.021.04.2{03} indraḥ puro jarhṛṣāṇo vi dūdhod vi vajrahasto mahinājaghāna
analyzed: indraḥ puraḥ jarhṛṣāṇaḥ vi dūdhot vi vajra hastaḥ mahinā ājaghāna

original: RV_07.021.05.1{03} na yātava indra jūjuvurno na vandanā śaviṣṭha vedyābhiḥ
analyzed: na yātavaḥ indra jūjuvuḥ naḥ na vandanāḥ śaviṣṭha vedyābhiḥ

original: RV_07.021.05.2{03} sa śardhadaryo viṣuṇasya jantormā śiśnadevā api gur{ṛ}taṃ naḥ
analyzed: sa śardha daryaḥ viṣuṇasya jantoḥ mā śiśna devāḥ api gurṛtam naḥ

original: RV_07.021.06.1{04} abhi kratvendra bhūradha jman na te vivyaṃ mahimānaṃ rajāṃsi
analyzed: abhi kratvā indra bhūradha jman na te vivyam mahimānam rajāṃsi

original: RV_07.021.06.2{04} svenā hi vṛtraṃ śavasā jaghantha na śatrurantaṃvividad yudhā te
analyzed: svena hi vṛtram śavasā jaghantha na śatruḥ antaṃvividat yudhā te

original: RV_07.021.07.1{04} devāścit te asuryāya pūrve 'nu kṣatrāya mamire sahāṃsi
analyzed: devāḥ cit te asuryāya pūrve nu kṣatrāya mamire sahāṃsi

original: RV_07.021.07.2{04} indro maghāni dayate viṣahyendraṃ vājasya johuvanta sātau
analyzed: indraḥ maghāni dayate viṣahya indram vājasya johuvanta sātau

original: RV_07.021.08.1{04} kīriścid dhi tvāmavase juhāveśānamindra saubhagasya bhūreḥ
analyzed: kīriḥ cit hi tvām avase juhāva īśānam indra saubhagasya bhūreḥ

original: RV_07.021.08.2{04} avo babhūtha śatamūte asme abhikṣattustvāvato varūtā
analyzed: avas babhūtha śatamūte asme abhikṣattuḥ tvāvataḥ varūtā

original: RV_07.021.09.1{04} sakhāyasta indra viśvaha syāma namovṛdhāso mahinā tarutra
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ te indra viśvaha syāma namaḥ vṛdhāsaḥ mahinā tarutra

original: RV_07.021.09.2{04} vanvantu smā te 'vasā samīke 'bhītimaryo vanuṣāṃ śavāṃsi
analyzed: vanvantu smā te vasā samīke bhītimaryaḥ vanuṣām śavāṃsi

original: RV_07.021.10.1{04} sa na indra tvayatāyā ...
analyzed: sa naḥ indra tvayatāya

original: RV_07.022.01.1{05} pibā somamindra mandatu tvā yaṃ te suṣāva haryaśvādriḥ
analyzed: pibā somam indra mandatu tvā yam te suṣāva haryaśva adriḥ

original: RV_07.022.01.2{05} soturbāhubhyāṃ suyato nārvā
analyzed: sotuḥ bāhubhyām su yataḥ na arvā

original: RV_07.022.02.1{05} yaste mado yujyaścārurasti yena vṛtrāṇi haryaśva haṃsi
analyzed: yaḥ te madaḥ yujyaḥ cāruḥ asti yena vṛtrāṇi haryaśva haṃsi

original: RV_07.022.02.2{05} sa tvāmindra prabhūvaso mamattu
analyzed: sa tvām indra prabhūvaso mamattu

original: RV_07.022.03.1{05} bodhā su me maghavan vācamemāṃ yāṃ te vasiṣṭho arcatipraśastim
analyzed: bodha su me maghavan vācam ā imām yām te vasiṣṭhaḥ arcati praśastim

original: RV_07.022.03.2{05} imā brahma sadhamāde juṣasva
analyzed: imā brahma sadhamāde juṣasva

original: RV_07.022.04.1{05} śrudhī havaṃ vipipānasyādrerbodhā viprasyārcato manīṣām
analyzed: śrudhi havam vipipānasya adreḥ bodha viprasya arcataḥ manīṣām

original: RV_07.022.04.2{05} kṛṣvā duvāṃsyantamā sacemā
analyzed: kṛṣva duvāṃsi antamā sacā imā

original: RV_07.022.05.1{05} na te giro api mṛṣye turasya na suṣṭutimasuryasya vidvān
analyzed: na te giraḥ api mṛṣye turasya na suṣṭutim asuryasya vidvān

original: RV_07.022.05.2{05} sadā te nāma svayaśo vivakmi
analyzed: sadā te nāma sva yaśaḥ vivakmi

original: RV_07.022.06.1{06} bhūri hi te savanā mānuṣeṣu bhūri manīṣī havate tvāmit
analyzed: bhūri hi te savanā mānuṣeṣu bhūri manīṣī havate tvām id

original: RV_07.022.06.2{06} māre asman maghavañ jyok kaḥ
analyzed: mā āre asmat maghavan jyok kaḥ

original: RV_07.022.07.1{06} tubhyedimā savanā śūra viśvā tubhyaṃ brahmāṇi vardhanā kṛṇomi
analyzed: tubhya id imā savanā śūra viśvā tubhyam brahmāṇi vardhanā kṛṇomi

original: RV_07.022.07.2{06} tvaṃ nṛbhirhavyo viśvadhāsi
analyzed: tvam nṛbhiḥ havyaḥ viśvadha asi

original: RV_07.022.08.1{06} nū cin nu te manyamānasya dasmodaśnuvanti mahimānamugra
analyzed: nu cit nu te manyamānasya dasma udaśnuvanti mahimānam ugra

original: RV_07.022.08.2{06} na vīryamindra te na rādhaḥ
analyzed: na vīryam indra te na rādhaḥ

original: RV_07.022.09.1{06} ye ca pūrva ṛṣayo ye ca nūtnā indra brahmāṇi janayanta viprāḥ
analyzed: ye ca pūrve ṛṣayaḥ ye ca nūtnāḥ indra brahmāṇi janayanta viprāḥ

original: RV_07.022.09.2{06} asme te santu sakhyā śivāni yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: asme te santu sakhyā śivāni yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.023.01.1{07} udu brahmāṇyairata śravasyendraṃ samarye mahayā vasiṣṭha
analyzed: udu brahmāṇi airata śravasyā indram samarye mahaya vasiṣṭha

original: RV_07.023.01.2{07} ā yo viśvāni śavasā tatānopaśrotā ma īvato vacāṃsi
analyzed: ā yaḥ viśvāni śavasā tatāna upaśrotā me īvataḥ vacāṃsi

original: RV_07.023.02.1{07} ayāmi ghoṣa indra devajāmirirajyanta yacchurudho vivāci
analyzed: ayāmi ghoṣaḥ indra deva jāmiḥ irajyanta yat śurudhaḥ vivāci

original: RV_07.023.02.2{07} nahi svamāyuścikite janeṣu tānīdaṃhāṃsyati parṣyasmān
analyzed: nahi svam āyuḥ cikite janeṣu tāni id aṃhāṃsi ati parṣi asmān

original: RV_07.023.03.1{07} yuje rathaṃ gaveṣaṇaṃ haribhyāmupa brahmāṇi jujuṣāṇamasthuḥ
analyzed: yuje ratham gaveṣaṇam haribhyām upa brahmāṇi jujuṣāṇam asthuḥ

original: RV_07.023.03.2{07} vi bādhiṣṭa sya rodasī mahitvendro vṛtrāṇyapratī jaghanvān
analyzed: vi bādhiṣṭa sya rodasī mahitvā indraḥ vṛtrāṇi apratī jaghanvān

original: RV_07.023.04.1{07} āpaścit pipyu staryo na gāvo nakṣannṛtaṃ jaritārasta indra
analyzed: āpaḥ cit pipyuḥ staryaḥ na gāvaḥ nakṣan ṛtam jaritāraḥ te indra

original: RV_07.023.04.2{07} yāhi vāyurna niyuto na achā tvaṃ hi dhībhirdayase vi vājān
analyzed: yāhi vāyuḥ na niyutaḥ na achā tvam hi dhībhiḥ dayase vi vājān

original: RV_07.023.05.1{07} te tvā madā indra mādayantu śuṣmiṇaṃ tuvirādhasaṃ jaritre
analyzed: te tvā madāḥ indra mādayantu śuṣmiṇam tuvi rādhasam jaritre

original: RV_07.023.05.2{07} eko devatrā dayase hi martānasmiñchūra savane mādayasva
analyzed: ekaḥ devatrā dayase hi martān asmin śūra savane mādayasva

original: RV_07.023.06.1{07} evedindraṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vajrabāhuṃ vasiṣṭhāso abhyarcantyarkaiḥ
analyzed: eva id indram vṛṣaṇam vajra bāhum vasiṣṭhāsaḥ abhyarcanti arkaiḥ

original: RV_07.023.06.2{07} sa na stuto vīravat pātu gomad yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: sa naḥ stutaḥ vīravat pātu gomat yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.024.01.1{08} yoniṣ ṭa indra sadane akāri tamā nṛbhiḥ puruhūta pra yāhi
analyzed: yoniḥ te indra sadane akāri tamā nṛbhiḥ puruhūta pra yāhi

original: RV_07.024.01.2{08} aso yathā no 'vitā vṛdhe ca dado vasūni mamadaśca somaiḥ
analyzed: asaḥ yathā naḥ vitā vṛdhe ca dadaḥ vasūni mamadaḥ ca somaiḥ

original: RV_07.024.02.1{08} gṛbhītaṃ te mana indra dvibarhāḥ sutaḥ somaḥ pariṣiktā madhūni
analyzed: gṛbhītam te manaḥ indra dvibarhāḥ sutaḥ somaḥ pariṣiktā madhūni

original: RV_07.024.02.2{08} visṛṣṭadhenā bharate suvṛktiriyamindraṃ johuvatī manīṣā
analyzed: visṛṣṭa dhenāḥ bharate suvṛktiḥ iyam indram johuvatī manīṣā

original: RV_07.024.03.1{08} ā no diva ā pṛthivyā ṛjīṣinnidaṃ barhiḥ somapeyāya yāhi
analyzed: ā naḥ divaḥ ā pṛthivyāḥ ṛjīṣin idam barhiḥ soma peyāya yāhi

original: RV_07.024.03.2{08} vahantu tvā harayo madryañcamāṅgūṣamachā tavasaṃ madāya
analyzed: vahantu tvā harayaḥ madryañcam āṅgūṣam achā tavasam madāya

original: RV_07.024.04.1{08} ā no viśvābhirūtibhiḥ sajoṣā brahma juṣāṇo haryaśvayāhi
analyzed: ā naḥ viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ sajoṣāḥ brahma juṣāṇaḥ haryaśva yāhi

original: RV_07.024.04.2{08} varīvṛjat sthavirebhiḥ suśiprāsme dadhad vṛṣaṇaṃ śuṣmamindra
analyzed: varīvṛjat sthavirebhiḥ su śiprā asme dadhat vṛṣaṇam śuṣmam indra

original: RV_07.024.05.1{08} eṣa stomo maha ugrāya vāhe dhurīvātyo na vājayannadhāyi
analyzed: eṣa stomaḥ mahe ugrāya vāhe dhuri iva atyaḥ na vājayan adhāyi

original: RV_07.024.05.2{08} indra tvāyamarka īṭṭe vasūnāṃ divīva dyāmadhi naḥ śromataṃ dhāḥ
analyzed: indra tvā ayam arkaḥ īṭṭe vasūnām divi iva dyām adhi naḥ śromatam dhāḥ

original: RV_07.024.06.1{08} evā na indra vāryasya pūrdhi pra te mahīṃ sumatiṃ vevidāma
analyzed: eva naḥ indra vāryasya pūrdhi pra te mahīm sumatim vevidāma

original: RV_07.024.06.2{08} iṣaṃ pinva maghavadbhyaḥ suvīrāṃ yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: iṣam pinva maghavadbhyaḥ su vīrām yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.025.01.1{09} ā te maha indro:
analyzed: ā te mahaḥ indraḥ

original: tyugra samanyavo yat samaranta senāḥ
analyzed: ti ugra samanyavaḥ yat samaranta senāḥ

original: RV_07.025.01.2{09} patāti didyun naryasya bāhvormā te mano viṣvadryag vi cārīt
analyzed: patāti didyut naryasya bāhvoḥ mā te manaḥ viṣvadryak vi cārīt

original: RV_07.025.02.1{09} ni durga indra śnathihyamitrānabhi ye no martāso amanti
analyzed: ni durge indra śnathihi amitrān abhi ye naḥ martāsaḥ amanti

original: RV_07.025.02.2{09} āre taṃ śaṃsaṃ kṛṇuhi ninitsorā no bhara sambharaṇaṃ vasūnām
analyzed: āre tam śaṃsam kṛṇuhi ninitsoḥ ā naḥ bhara sambharaṇam vasūnām

original: RV_07.025.03.1{09} śataṃ te śiprinnūtayaḥ sudāse sahasraṃ śaṃsā uta rātirastu
analyzed: śatam te śiprin ūtayaḥ sudāse sahasram śaṃsāḥ uta rātiḥ astu

original: RV_07.025.03.2{09} jahi vadharvanuṣo martyasyāsme dyumnamadhi ratnaṃ ca dhehi
analyzed: jahi vadharvanuṣaḥ martyasya asme dyumnam adhi ratnam ca dhehi

original: RV_07.025.04.1{09} tvāvato hīndra kratve asmi tvāvato 'vituḥ śūra rātau
analyzed: tvāvataḥ hi indra kratve asmi tvāvataḥ vituḥ śūra rātau

original: RV_07.025.04.2{09} viśvedahāni taviṣīva ugranokaḥ kṛṇuṣva harivo na mardhīḥ
analyzed: viśvedahāni taviṣīvas ugra nokaḥ kṛṇuṣva harivas na mardhīḥ

original: RV_07.025.05.1{09} kutsā ete haryaśvāya śūṣamindre saho devajūtamiyānāḥ
analyzed: kutsāḥ ete haryaśvāya śūṣam indre sahaḥ deva jūtam iyānāḥ

original: RV_07.025.05.2{09} satrā kṛdhi suhanā śūra vṛtrā vayaṃ tarutrāḥ sanuyāma vājam
analyzed: satrā kṛdhi su hanā śūra vṛtrā vayam tarutrāḥ sanuyāma vājam

original: RV_07.025.06.1{09} evā na indra vāryasya ...
analyzed: eva naḥ indra vāryasya

original: RV_07.026.01.1{10} na soma indramasuto mamāda nābrahmāṇo maghavānaṃ sutāsaḥ
analyzed: na somaḥ indram a sutaḥ mamāda na abrahmāṇaḥ maghavānam sutāsaḥ

original: RV_07.026.01.2{10} tasmā ukthaṃ janaye yajjujoṣan nṛvan navīyaḥ śṛṇavad yathā naḥ
analyzed: tasmai uktham janaye yat jujoṣat nṛvat navīyaḥ śṛṇavat yathā naḥ

original: RV_07.026.02.1{10} uktha-ukthe soma indraṃ mamāda nīthe-nīthe maghavānaṃ sutāsaḥ
analyzed: uktha aukthe somaḥ indram mamāda nīthenīthe maghavānam sutāsaḥ

original: RV_07.026.02.2{10} yadīṃ sabādhaḥ pitaraṃ na putrāḥ samānadakṣā avase havante
analyzed: yadi īm sabādhaḥ pitaram na putrāḥ samāna dakṣāḥ avase havante

original: RV_07.026.03.1{10} cakāra tā kṛṇavan nūnamanyā yāni bruvanti vedhasaḥ suteṣu
analyzed: cakāra tā kṛṇavat nūnam anyā yāni bruvanti vedhasaḥ suteṣu

original: RV_07.026.03.2{10} janīriva patirekaḥ samāno ni māmṛje pura indraḥsu sarvāḥ
analyzed: janīḥ iva patiḥ ekaḥ samānaḥ ni māmṛje puraḥ indraḥsu sarvāḥ

original: RV_07.026.04.1{10} evā tamāhuruta śṛṇva indra eko vibhaktā taraṇirmaghānām
analyzed: eva tam āhuḥ uta śṛṇve indraḥ ekaḥ vibhaktā taraṇiḥ maghānām

original: RV_07.026.04.2{10} mithastura ūtayo yasya pūrvīrasme bhadrāṇi saścatapriyāṇi
analyzed: mithasturaḥ ūtayaḥ yasya pūrvīḥ asme bhadrāṇi saścata priyāṇi

original: RV_07.026.05.1{10} evā vasiṣṭha indramūtaye nṝn kṛṣṭīnāṃ vṛṣabhaṃ sute gṛṇāti
analyzed: eva vasiṣṭhaḥ indram ūtaye nṝn kṛṣṭīnām vṛṣabham sute gṛṇāti

original: RV_07.026.05.2{10} sahasriṇa upa no māhi vājān yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: sahasriṇaḥ upa naḥ māhi vājān yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.027.01.1{11} indraṃ naro nemadhitā havante yat pāryā yunajate dhiyastāḥ
analyzed: indram naraḥ nemadhitā havante yat pāryā yunajate dhiyaḥ tāḥ

original: RV_07.027.01.2{11} śūro nṛṣātā śavasaścakāna ā gomati vraje bhajātvaṃ naḥ
analyzed: śūraḥ nṛṣātā śavasaḥ cakānaḥ ā gomati vraje bhajātvam naḥ

original: RV_07.027.02.1{11} ya indra śuṣmo maghavan te asti śikṣā sakhibhyaḥ puruhūtanṛbhyaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ indra śuṣmaḥ maghavan te asti śikṣā sakhibhyaḥ puruhūta nṛbhyaḥ

original: RV_07.027.02.2{11} tvaṃ hi dṛḷhā maghavan vicetā apā vṛdhi parivṛtaṃ na rādhaḥ
analyzed: tvam hi dṛḍhā maghavan vicetāḥ apa ā vṛdhi parivṛtam na rādhaḥ

original: RV_07.027.03.1{11} indro rājā jagataścarṣaṇīnāmadhi kṣami viṣurūpaṃ yadasti
analyzed: indraḥ rājā jagataḥ carṣaṇīnām adhi kṣami viṣurūpam yat asti

original: RV_07.027.03.2{11} tato dadāti dāśuṣe vasūni codad rādha upastutaścidarvāk
analyzed: tatas dadāti dāśuṣe vasūni codat rādhaḥ upastutaḥ cit arvāk

original: RV_07.027.04.1{11} nū cin na indro maghavā sahūtī dāno vājaṃ ni yamate na ūtī
analyzed: nu cit naḥ indraḥ maghavā sahūtī dānaḥ vājam ni yamate naḥ ūtī

original: RV_07.027.04.2{11} anūnā yasya dakṣiṇā pīpāya vāmaṃ nṛbhyo abhivītā sakhibhyaḥ
analyzed: anūnā yasya dakṣiṇā pīpāya vāmam nṛbhyaḥ abhivītā sakhibhyaḥ

original: RV_07.027.05.1{11} nū indra rāye varivas kṛdhī na ā te mano vavṛtyāma maghāya
analyzed: nu indra rāye varivaḥ kṛdhī naḥ ā te manaḥ vavṛtyāma maghāya

original: RV_07.027.05.2{11} gomadaśvāvad rathavad vyanto yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: gomat aśvāvat rathavat vyantaḥ yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.028.01.1{12} brahmā ṇa indropa yāhi vidvānarvāñcaste harayaḥ santu yuktāḥ
analyzed: brahmā naḥ indra upa yāhi vidvān arvāñcaḥ te harayaḥ santu yuktāḥ

original: RV_07.028.01.2{12} viśve cid dhi tvā vihavanta martā asmākamicchṛṇuhi viśvaminva
analyzed: viśve cit hi tvā vihavanta martāḥ asmākam id śṛṇuhi viśvaminva

original: RV_07.028.02.1{12} havaṃ ta indra mahimā vyānaḍ brahma yat pāsi śavasinnṛṣīṇām
analyzed: havam te indra mahimā vyānaṭ brahma yat pāsi śavasin ṛṣīṇām

original: RV_07.028.02.2{12} ā yad vajraṃ dadhiṣe hasta ugra ghoraḥ san kratvā janiṣṭhā aṣāḷaḥ
analyzed: ā yat vajram dadhiṣe haste ugra ghoraḥ san kratvā janiṣṭhāḥ aṣāḍaḥ

original: RV_07.028.03.1{12} tava praṇītīndra johuvānān saṃ yan nṝn na rodasī ninetha
analyzed: tava praṇītī indra johuvānān sam yat nṝn na rodasī ninetha

original: RV_07.028.03.2{12} mahe kṣatrāya śavase hi jajñe 'tūtujiṃ cit tūtujiraśiśnat
analyzed: mahe kṣatrāya śavase hi jajñe tūtujim cit tūtujiḥ aśiśnat

original: RV_07.028.04.1{12} ebhirna indrāhabhirdaśasya durmitrāso hi kṣitayaḥ pavante
analyzed: ebhiḥ naḥ indra ahabhiḥ daśasya durmitrāsaḥ hi kṣitayaḥ pavante

original: RV_07.028.04.2{12} prati yaccaṣṭe anṛtamanenā ava dvitā varuṇo māyīnaḥ sāt
analyzed: prati yat caṣṭe anṛtam anenāḥ ava dvitā varuṇaḥ māyīnaḥ sāt

original: RV_07.028.05.1{12} vocemedindraṃ maghavānamenaṃ maho rāyo rādhaso yad dadannaḥ
analyzed: vocema id indram maghavānam enam mahaḥ rāyaḥ rādhasaḥ yat dadan naḥ

original: RV_07.028.05.2{12} yo arcato brahmakṛtimaviṣṭho yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: yaḥ arcataḥ brahmakṛtim aviṣṭhaḥ yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.029.01.1{13} ayaṃ soma indra tubhyaṃ sunva ā tu pra yāhi harivastadokāḥ
analyzed: ayam somaḥ indra tubhyam sunve ā tu pra yāhi harivasta dokāḥ

original: RV_07.029.01.2{13} pibā tvasya suṣutasya cārordado maghāni maghavanniyānaḥ
analyzed: pibā tvasya suṣutasya cāroḥ dadaḥ maghāni maghavan niyānaḥ

original: RV_07.029.02.1{13} brahman vīra brahmakṛtiṃ juṣāṇo 'rvācīno haribhiryāhi tūyam
analyzed: brahman vīra brahmakṛtim juṣāṇaḥ rvācīnaḥ haribhiḥ yāhi tūyam

original: RV_07.029.02.2{13} asminnū ṣu savane mādayasvopa brahmāṇi śṛṇava imā naḥ
analyzed: asmin u su savane mādayasva upa brahmāṇi śṛṇavaḥ imā naḥ

original: RV_07.029.03.1{13} kā te astyaraṃkṛtiḥ sūktaiḥ kadā nūnaṃ te maghavan dāśema
analyzed: kā te asti araṃkṛtiḥ sūktaiḥ kadā nūnam te maghavan dāśema

original: RV_07.029.03.2{13} viśvā matīrā tatane tvāyādhā ma indra śṛṇavo havemā
analyzed: viśvāḥ matīḥ ā tatane tvāyā adhā me indra śṛṇavaḥ havā imā

original: RV_07.029.04.1{13} uto ghā te puruṣyā idāsan yeṣāṃ pūrveṣāmaśṛṇor{ṛ}ṣīṇām
analyzed: uta u gha te puruṣyāḥ id āsan yeṣām pūrveṣām aśṛṇoḥ ṛṣīṇām

original: RV_07.029.04.2{13} adhāhaṃ tvā maghavañ johavīmi tvaṃ na indrāsi pramatiḥ piteva
analyzed: adha aham tvā maghavam johavīmi tvam naḥ indra asi pramatiḥ pitā iva

original: RV_07.029.05.1{13} vocemedindraṃ ...
analyzed: vocema id indram

original: RV_07.030.01.1{14} ā no deva śavasā yāhi śuṣmin bhavā vṛdha indra rāyo asya
analyzed: ā naḥ deva śavasā yāhi śuṣmin bhava vṛdhaḥ indra rāyaḥ asya

original: RV_07.030.01.2{14} mahe nṛmṇāya nṛpate suvajra mahi kṣatrāya pauṃsyāya śūra
analyzed: mahe nṛmṇāya nṛpate su vajra mahi kṣatrāya pauṃsyāya śūra

original: RV_07.030.02.1{14} havanta u tvā havyaṃ vivāci tanūṣu śūrāḥ sūryasya sātau
analyzed: havante u tvā havyam vivāci tanūṣu śūrāḥ sūryasya sātau

original: RV_07.030.02.2{14} tvaṃ viśveṣu senyo janeṣu tvaṃ vṛtrāṇi randhayā suhantu
analyzed: tvam viśveṣu senyaḥ janeṣu tvam vṛtrāṇi randhaya su hantu

original: RV_07.030.03.1{14} ahā yadindra sudinā vyuchān dadho yat ketumupamaṃ samatsu
analyzed: ahā yat indra su dinā vyuchān dadhaḥ yat ketum upamam samatsu

original: RV_07.030.03.2{14} nyagniḥ sīdadasuro na hotā huvāno atra subhagāya devān
analyzed: ni agniḥ sīdat asuraḥ na hotā huvānaḥ atra subhagāya devān

original: RV_07.030.04.1{14} vayaṃ te ta indra ye ca deva stavanta śūra dadato maghāni
analyzed: vayam te te indra ye ca deva stavanta śūra dadataḥ maghāni

original: RV_07.030.04.2{14} yachā sūribhya upamaṃ varūthaṃ svābhuvo jaraṇāmaśnavanta
analyzed: yat sūribhyaḥ upamam varūtham su ābhuvaḥ jaraṇām aśnavanta

original: RV_07.030.05.1{14} vocemedindraṃ ...
analyzed: vocema id indram

original: RV_07.031.01.1{15} pra va indrāya mādanaṃ haryaśvāya gāyata
analyzed: pra vaḥ indrāya mādanam haryaśvāya gāyata

original: RV_07.031.01.2{15} sakhāyaḥ somapāvne
analyzed: sakhāyaḥ soma pāvne

original: RV_07.031.02.1{15} śaṃsedukthaṃ sudānava uta dyukṣaṃ yathā naraḥ
analyzed: śaṃset uktham sudānavaḥ uta dyukṣam yathā naraḥ

original: RV_07.031.02.2{15} cakṛmā satyarādhase
analyzed: cakṛma satya rādhase

original: RV_07.031.03.1{15} tvaṃ na indra vājayustvaṃ gavyuḥ śatakrato
analyzed: tvam naḥ indra vājayuḥ tvam gavyuḥ śatakrato

original: RV_07.031.03.2{15} tvaṃ hiraṇyayurvaso
analyzed: tvam hiraṇyayuḥ vaso

original: RV_07.031.04.1{15} vayamindra tvāyavo 'bhi pra ṇonumo vṛṣan
analyzed: vayam indra tvāyavaḥ bhi pra nonumaḥ vṛṣan

original: RV_07.031.04.2{15} viddhī tvasya no vaso
analyzed: viddhi tvasya naḥ vaso

original: RV_07.031.05.1{15} mā no nide ca vaktave 'ryo randhīrarāvṇe
analyzed: mā naḥ nide ca vaktave ryaḥ randhīḥ arāvṇe

original: RV_07.031.05.2{15} tve api kraturmama
analyzed: tve api kratuḥ mama

original: RV_07.031.06.1{15} tvaṃ varmāsi saprathaḥ puroyodhaśca vṛtrahan
analyzed: tvam varmā asi saprathaḥ puras yodhaḥ ca vṛtrahan

original: RV_07.031.06.2{15} tvayā pratibruve yujā
analyzed: tvayā pratibruve yujā

original: RV_07.031.07.1{16} mahānutāsi yasya te 'nu svadhāvarī sahaḥ
analyzed: mahān utā asi yasya te nu svadhāvarī sahaḥ

original: RV_07.031.07.2{16} mamnāte indrarodasī
analyzed: mamnāte indra rodasī

original: RV_07.031.08.1{16} taṃ tvā marutvatī pari bhuvad vāṇī sayāvarī
analyzed: tam tvā marutvatī pari bhuvat vāṇī sa yāvarī

original: RV_07.031.08.2{16} nakṣamāṇā saha dyubhiḥ
analyzed: nakṣamāṇā saha dyubhiḥ

original: RV_07.031.09.1{16} ūrdhvāsastvānvindavo bhuvan dasmamupa dyavi
analyzed: ūrdhvāsaḥ tvā anvindavaḥ bhuvan dasmam upa dyavi

original: RV_07.031.09.2{16} saṃ te namanta kṛṣṭayaḥ
analyzed: sam te namanta kṛṣṭayaḥ

original: RV_07.031.10.1{16} pra vo mahe mahivṛdhe bharadhvaṃ pracetase pra sumatiṃ kṛṇudhvam
analyzed: pra vaḥ mahe mahivṛdhe bharadhvam pracetase pra sumatim kṛṇudhvam

original: RV_07.031.10.2{16} viśaḥ pūrvīḥ pra carā carṣaṇiprāḥ
analyzed: viśaḥ pūrvīḥ pra cara carṣaṇi prāḥ

original: RV_07.031.11.1{16} uruvyacase mahine suvṛktimindrāya brahma janayanta viprāḥ
analyzed: uru vyacase mahine suvṛktim indrāya brahma janayanta viprāḥ

original: RV_07.031.11.2{16} tasya vratāni na minanti dhīrāḥ
analyzed: tasya vratāni na minanti dhīrāḥ

original: RV_07.031.12.1{16} indraṃ vāṇīranuttamanyumeva satrā rājānaṃ dadhire sahadhyai
analyzed: indram vāṇīḥ anutta manyum eva satrā rājānam dadhire sahadhyai

original: RV_07.031.12.2{16} haryaśvāya barhayā samāpīn
analyzed: haryaśvāya barhayā samāpīn

original: RV_07.032.01.1{17} mo ṣu tvā vāghataścanāre asman ni rīraman
analyzed: mā u su tvā vāghataḥ cana āre asmat ni rīraman

original: RV_07.032.01.2{17} ārāttāccit sadhamādaṃ na ā gahīha vā sannupa śrudhi
analyzed: ārāttāt cit sadhamādam naḥ ā gahi iha vā san upa śrudhi

original: RV_07.032.02.1{17} ime hi te brahmakṛtaḥ sute sacā madhau na makṣa āsate
analyzed: ime hi te brahma kṛtaḥ sute sacā madhau na makṣaḥ āsate

original: RV_07.032.02.2{17} indre kāmaṃ jaritāro vasūyavo rathe na pādamā dadhuḥ
analyzed: indre kāmam jaritāraḥ vasūyavaḥ rathe na pādamāḥ dadhuḥ

original: RV_07.032.03.1{17} rāyaskāmo vajrahastaṃ sudakṣiṇaṃ putro na pitaraṃ huve
analyzed: rāyaskāmaḥ vajra hastam su dakṣiṇam putraḥ na pitaram huve

original: RV_07.032.04.1{17} ima indrāya sunvire somāso dadhyāśiraḥ
analyzed: ime indrāya sunvire somāsaḥ dadhi āśiraḥ

original: RV_07.032.04.2{17} tānā madāya vajrahasta pītaye haribhyāṃ yāhyoka ā
analyzed: tāna ā madāya vajrahasta pītaye haribhyām yāhi okaḥ ā

original: RV_07.032.05.1{17} śravacchrutkarṇa īyate vasūnāṃ nū cin no mardhiṣad giraḥ
analyzed: śravat śrutkarṇaḥ īyate vasūnām nu cit naḥ mardhiṣat giraḥ

original: RV_07.032.05.2{17} sadyaścid yaḥ sahasrāṇi śatā dadan nakirditsantamā minat
analyzed: sadyaścit yaḥ sahasrāṇi śatā dadat nakirditsantamā minat

original: RV_07.032.06.1{18} sa vīro apratiṣkuta indreṇa śūśuve nṛbhiḥ
analyzed: sa vīraḥ apratiṣkutaḥ indreṇa śūśuve nṛbhiḥ

original: RV_07.032.06.2{18} yaste gabhīrā savanāni vṛtrahan sunotyā ca dhāvati
analyzed: yaḥ te gabhīrā savanāni vṛtrahan sunotyā ca dhāvati

original: RV_07.032.07.1{18} bhavā varūthaṃ maghavan maghonāṃ yat samajāsi śardhataḥ
analyzed: bhava varūtham maghavan maghonām yat samajāsi śardhataḥ

original: RV_07.032.07.2{18} vi tvāhatasya vedanaṃ bhajemahyā dūṇāśo bharā gayam
analyzed: vi tvā āhatasya vedanam bhajemahi dūṇāśaḥ bhara gayam

original: RV_07.032.08.1{18} sunotā somapāvne somamindrāya vajriṇe
analyzed: sunota soma pāvne somam indrāya vajriṇe

original: RV_07.032.08.2{18} pacatā paktīravase kṛṇudhvamit pṛṇannit pṛṇate mayaḥ
analyzed: pacata paktīḥ avase kṛṇudhvam id pṛṇan id pṛṇate mayaḥ

original: RV_07.032.09.1{18} mā sredhata somino dakṣatā mahe kṛṇudhvaṃ rāya ātuje
analyzed: mā sredhata sominaḥ dakṣata mahe kṛṇudhvam rāyaḥ ātuje

original: RV_07.032.09.2{18} taraṇirijjayati kṣeti puṣyati na devāsaḥ kavatnave
analyzed: taraṇiḥ id jayati kṣeti puṣyati na devāsaḥ kavatnave

original: RV_07.032.10.1{18} nakiḥ sudāso rathaṃ paryāsa na rīramat
analyzed: nakir sudāsaḥ ratham paryāsa na rīramat

original: RV_07.032.10.2{18} indro yasyāvitā yasya maruto gamat sa gomati vraje
analyzed: indraḥ yasya avitā yasya marutaḥ gamat sa gomati vraje

original: RV_07.032.11.1{19} gamad vājaṃ vājayannindra martyo yasya tvamavitā bhuvaḥ
analyzed: gamat vājam vājayan indra martyaḥ yasya tvam avitā bhuvaḥ

original: RV_07.032.11.2{19} asmākaṃ bodhyavitā rathānāmasmākaṃ śūra nṛṇām
analyzed: asmākam bodhi avitā rathānām asmākam śūra nṛṇām

original: RV_07.032.12.1{19} udin nyasya ricyate 'ṃśo dhanaṃ na jigyuṣaḥ
analyzed: udit nyasya ricyate ṃśaḥ dhanam na jigyuṣaḥ

original: RV_07.032.12.2{19} ya indroharivān na dabhanti taṃ ripo dakṣaṃ dadhāti somini
analyzed: yaḥ indra ūharivān na dabhanti tam ripaḥ dakṣam dadhāti somini

original: RV_07.032.13.1{19} mantramakharvaṃ sudhitaṃ supeśasaṃ dadhāta yajñiyeṣvā
analyzed: mantram akharvam sudhitam supeśasam dadhāta yajñiya iṣvā

original: RV_07.032.13.2{19} pūrvīścana prasitayastaranti taṃ ya indre karmaṇā bhuvat
analyzed: pūrvīḥ cana prasitayaḥ taranti tam yaḥ indre karmaṇā bhuvat

original: RV_07.032.14.1{19} kastamindra tvāvasumā martyo dadharṣati
analyzed: kaḥ tam indra tvāvasumāḥ martyaḥ dadharṣati

original: RV_07.032.14.2{19} śraddhā it temaghavan pārye divi vājī vājaṃ siṣāsati
analyzed: śraddhā id te maghavan pārye divi vājī vājam siṣāsati

original: RV_07.032.15.1{19} maghonaḥ sma vṛtrahatyeṣu codaya ye dadati priyā vasu
analyzed: maghonaḥ sma vṛtra hatyeṣu codaya ye dadati priyā vasu

original: RV_07.032.15.2{19} tavapraṇītī haryaśva sūribhirviśvā tarema duritā
analyzed: tava praṇītī haryaśva sūribhiḥ viśvā tarema duritā

original: RV_07.032.16.1{20} tavedindrāvamaṃ vasu tvaṃ puṣyasi madhyamam
analyzed: tava id indra avamam vasu tvam puṣyasi madhyamam

original: RV_07.032.16.2{20} satrā viśvasya paramasya rājasi nakiṣ ṭvā goṣu vṛṇvate
analyzed: satrā viśvasya paramasya rājasi nakir tvā goṣu vṛṇvate

original: RV_07.032.17.1{20} tvaṃ viśvasya dhanadā asi śruto ya īṃ bhavantyājayaḥ
analyzed: tvam viśvasya dhana dāḥ asi śrutaḥ ye īm bhavanti ājayaḥ

original: RV_07.032.17.2{20} tavāyaṃ viśvaḥ puruhūta pārthivo 'vasyurnāma bhikṣate
analyzed: tava ayam viśvaḥ puruhūta pārthivaḥ vasyuḥ nāma bhikṣate

original: RV_07.032.18.1{20} yadindra yāvatastvametāvadahamīśīya
analyzed: yat indra yāvataḥ tvam etāvat aham īśīya

original: RV_07.032.18.2{20} stotāramid didhiṣeya radāvaso na pāpatvāya rāsīya
analyzed: stotāram id didhiṣeya radāvaso na pāpatvāya rāsīya

original: RV_07.032.19.1{20} śikṣeyamin mahayate dive-dive rāya ā kuhacidvide
