analyzed: śikṣeyam id mahayate dive dive rāyaḥ ā kuhacid vide

original: RV_07.032.19.2{20} nahi tvadanyan maghavan na āpyaṃ vasyo asti pitā cana
analyzed: nahi tvat anyat maghavan naḥ āpyam vasyaḥ asti pitā cana

original: RV_07.032.20.1{20} taraṇirit siṣāsati vājaṃ purandhyā yujā
analyzed: taraṇiḥ id siṣāsati vājam purandhyā yujā

original: RV_07.032.20.2{20} ā va indrampuruhūtaṃ name girā nemiṃ taṣṭeva sudrvam
analyzed: ā vaḥ indram puruhūtam name girā nemim taṣṭā iva su drvam

original: RV_07.032.21.1{21} na duṣṭutī martyo vindate vasu na sredhantaṃ rayirnaśat
analyzed: na duṣṭutī martyaḥ vindate vasu na sredhantam rayiḥ naśat

original: RV_07.032.21.2{21} suśaktirin maghavan tubhyaṃ māvate deṣṇaṃ yat pārye divi
analyzed: suśaktirit maghavan tubhyam māvate deṣṇam yat pārye divi

original: RV_07.032.22.1{21} abhi tvā śūra nonumo 'dugdhā iva dhenavaḥ
analyzed: abhi tvā śūra nonumaḥ dugdhāḥ iva dhenavaḥ

original: RV_07.032.22.2{21} īśānamasya jagataḥ svardṛśamīśānamindra tasthuṣaḥ
analyzed: īśānam asya jagataḥ svar dṛśam īśānam indra tasthuṣaḥ

original: RV_07.032.23.1{21} na tvāvānanyo divyo na pārthivo na jāto na janiṣyate
analyzed: na tvāvān anyaḥ divyaḥ na pārthivaḥ na jātaḥ na janiṣyate

original: RV_07.032.23.2{21} aśvāyanto maghavannindra vājino gavyantastvā havāmahe
analyzed: aśvāyantaḥ maghavan indra vājinaḥ gavyantaḥ tvā havāmahe

original: RV_07.032.24.1{21} abhī ṣatastadā bharendra jyāyaḥ kanīyasaḥ
analyzed: abhi sataḥ tadā bhara indra jyāyaḥ kanīyasaḥ

original: RV_07.032.24.2{21} purūvasurhi maghavan sanādasi bhare-bhare ca havyaḥ
analyzed: purūvasuḥ hi maghavan sanāt asi bharebhare ca havyaḥ

original: RV_07.032.25.1{21} parā ṇudasva maghavannamitrān suvedā no vasū kṛdhi
analyzed: parā nudasva maghavan amitrān su vedā naḥ vasū kṛdhi

original: RV_07.032.25.2{21} asmākaṃ bodhyavitā mahādhane bhavā vṛdhaḥ sakhīnām
analyzed: asmākam bodhyavitā mahādhane bhavā vṛdhaḥ sakhīnām

original: RV_07.032.26.1{21} indra kratuṃ na ā bhara pitā putrebhyo yathā
analyzed: indra kratum naḥ ā bhara pitā putrebhyaḥ yathā

original: RV_07.032.26.2{21} śikṣā ṇoasmin puruhūta yāmani jīvā jyotiraśīmahi
analyzed: śikṣa naḥ asmin puruhūta yāmani jīvāḥ jyotiḥ aśīmahi

original: RV_07.032.27.1{21} mā no ajñātā vṛjanā durādhyo māśivāso ava kramuḥ
analyzed: mā naḥ ajñātā vṛjanā durādhyaḥ mā aśivāsaḥ ava kramuḥ

original: RV_07.032.27.2{21} tvayā vayaṃ pravataḥ śaśvatīrapo 'ti śūra tarāmasi
analyzed: tvayā vayam pravataḥ śaśvatīḥ apaḥ ti śūra tarāmasi

original: RV_07.033.01.1{22} śvityañco mā dakṣiṇataskapardā dhiyaṃjinvāso abhi hi pramanduḥ
analyzed: śvityañcaḥ mā dakṣiṇa taskapardāḥ dhiyaṃjinvāsaḥ abhi hi pramanduḥ

original: RV_07.033.01.2{22} uttiṣṭhan voce pari barhiṣo nṝn na me dūrādavitave vasiṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: uttiṣṭhan voce pari barhiṣaḥ nṝn na me dūrāt avitave vasiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_07.033.02.1{22} dūrādindramanayannā sutena tiro vaiśantamati pāntamugram
analyzed: dūrāt indram anayat nā sutena tiras vaiśantam ati pāntam ugram

original: RV_07.033.02.2{22} pāśadyumnasya vāyatasya somāt sutādindro 'vṛṇītāvasiṣṭhān
analyzed: pāśa dyumnasya vāyatasya somāt sutāt indraḥ vṛṇīta avasiṣṭhān

original: RV_07.033.03.1{22} even nu kaṃ sindhumebhistatāreven nu kaṃ bhedamebhirjaghāna
analyzed: eva id nu kam sindhum ebhiḥ tatāra iva id nu kam bhedam ebhiḥ jaghāna

original: RV_07.033.03.2{22} even nu kaṃ dāśarājñe sudāsaṃ prāvadindro brahmaṇā vo vasiṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: eva id nu kam dāśarājñe sudāsam prāvat indraḥ brahmaṇā vaḥ vasiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_07.033.04.1{22} juṣṭī naro brahmaṇā vaḥ pitṝṇāmakṣamavyayaṃ na kilā riṣātha
analyzed: juṣṭī naraḥ brahmaṇā vaḥ pitṝṇām akṣam avyayam na kila riṣātha

original: RV_07.033.04.2{22} yacchakvarīṣu bṛhatā raveṇendre śuṣmamadadhātā vasiṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: yat śakvarīṣu bṛhatā raveṇa indre śuṣmam adadhāta vasiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_07.033.05.1{22} ud dyāmivet tṛṣṇajo nāthitāso 'dīdhayurdāśarājñe vṛtāsaḥ
analyzed: ud dyām ved tṛṣṇajaḥ nāthitāsaḥ dīdhayuḥ dāśarājñe vṛtāsaḥ

original: RV_07.033.05.2{22} vasiṣṭhasya stuvata indro aśroduruṃ tṛtsubhyo akṛṇodu lokam
analyzed: vasiṣṭhasya stuvataḥ indraḥ aśrot urum tṛtsubhyaḥ akṛṇot u lokam

original: RV_07.033.06.1{23} daṇḍā ived goajanāsa āsan parichinnā bharatā arbhakāsaḥ
analyzed: daṇḍāḥ iva id go ajanāsaḥ āsan parichinnāḥ bharatāḥ arbhakāsaḥ

original: RV_07.033.06.2{23} abhavacca puraetā vasiṣṭha ādit tṛtsūnāṃ viśo aprathanta
analyzed: abhavat ca puraetā vasiṣṭhaḥ ādit tṛtsūnām viśaḥ aprathanta

original: RV_07.033.07.1{23} trayaḥ kṛṇvanti bhuvaneṣu retastisraḥ prajā āryā jyotiragrāḥ
analyzed: trayaḥ kṛṇvanti bhuvaneṣu retaḥ tisraḥ prajāḥ āryāḥ jyotiḥ agrāḥ

original: RV_07.033.07.2{23} trayo gharmāsa uṣasaṃ sacante sarvānit tānanuvidurvasiṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: trayaḥ gharmāsaḥ uṣasam sacante sarvān id tān anuviduḥ vasiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_07.033.08.1{23} sūryasyeva vakṣatho jyotireṣāṃ samudrasyeva mahimā gabhīraḥ
analyzed: sūryasya iva vakṣathaḥ jyotiḥ eṣām samudrasya iva mahimā gabhīraḥ

original: RV_07.033.08.2{23} vātasyeva prajavo nānyena stomo vasiṣṭhā anvetave vaḥ
analyzed: vātasya iva prajavaḥ na anyena stomaḥ vasiṣṭhāḥ anvetave vaḥ

original: RV_07.033.09.1{23} ta in niṇyaṃ hṛdayasya praketaiḥ sahasravalśamabhi saṃcaranti
analyzed: te id niṇyam hṛdayasya praketaiḥ sahasra valśam abhi saṃcaranti

original: RV_07.033.09.2{23} yamena tataṃ paridhiṃ vayanto 'psarasa upa sedurvasiṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: yamena tatam paridhim vayantaḥ psarasaḥ upa seduḥ vasiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_07.033.10.1{23} vidyuto jyotiḥ pari saṃjihānaṃ mitrāvaruṇā yadapaśyatāṃ tvā
analyzed: vidyutaḥ jyotiḥ pari saṃjihānam mitrāvaruṇā yat apaśyatām tvā

original: RV_07.033.10.2{23} tat te janmotaikaṃ vasiṣṭhāgastyo yat tvā viśaājabhāra
analyzed: tat te janma uta ekam vasiṣṭha agastyaḥ yat tvā viśa ājabhāra

original: RV_07.033.11.1{24} utāsi maitrāvaruṇo vasiṣṭhorvaśyā brahman manaso 'dhi jātaḥ
analyzed: uta asi maitrāvaruṇaḥ vasiṣṭha urvaśyā brahman manasaḥ dhi jātaḥ

original: RV_07.033.11.2{24} drapsaṃ skannaṃ brahmaṇā daivyena viśve devāḥ puṣkare tvādadanta
analyzed: drapsam skannam brahmaṇā daivyena viśve devāḥ puṣkare tvā adadanta

original: RV_07.033.12.1{24} sa praketa ubhayasya pravidvān sahasradāna uta vā sadānaḥ
analyzed: sa praketaḥ ubhayasya pravidvān sahasra dānaḥ uta vā sadānaḥ

original: RV_07.033.12.2{24} yamena tataṃ paridhiṃ vayiṣyannapsarasaḥ pari jajñe vasiṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: yamena tatam paridhim vayiṣyan apsarasaḥ pari jajñe vasiṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_07.033.13.1{24} satre ha jātāviṣitā namobhiḥ kumbhe retaḥ siṣicatuḥ samānam
analyzed: satre ha jātau iṣitā namobhiḥ kumbhe retaḥ siṣicatuḥ samānam

original: RV_07.033.13.2{24} tato ha māna udiyāya madhyāt tato jātam ṛṣimāhurvasiṣṭham
analyzed: tatas ha mānaḥ udiyāya madhyāt tatas jātam ṛṣim āhuḥ vasiṣṭham

original: RV_07.033.14.1{24} ukthabhṛtaṃ sāmabhṛtaṃ bibharti grāvāṇaṃ bibhrat pra vadātyagre
analyzed: uktha bhṛtam sāma bhṛtam bibharti grāvāṇam bibhrat pra vadāti agre

original: RV_07.033.14.2{24} upainamādhvaṃ sumanasyamānā ā vo gachāti pratṛdo vasiṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: upa enam ādhvam sumanasyamānāḥ ā vaḥ gacchāti pratṛdaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_07.034.01.1{25} pra śukraitu devī manīṣā asmat sutaṣṭo ratho na vājī
analyzed: pra śukrā etu devī manīṣā asmat su taṣṭaḥ rathaḥ na vājī

original: RV_07.034.02.1{25} viduḥ pṛthivyā divo janitraṃ śṛṇvantyāpo adha kṣarantīḥ
analyzed: viduḥ pṛthivyāḥ divaḥ janitram śṛṇvanti āpaḥ adha kṣarantīḥ

original: RV_07.034.03.1{25} āpaścidasmai pinvanta pṛthvīrvṛtreṣu śūrā maṃsanta ugrāḥ
analyzed: āpaḥ cit asmai pinvanta pṛthvīḥ vṛtreṣu śūrāḥ maṃsante ugrāḥ

original: RV_07.034.04.1{25} ā dhūrṣvasmai dadhātāśvānindro na vajrī hiraṇyabāhuḥ
analyzed: ā dhūrṣu asmai dadhāta aśvān indraḥ na vajrī hiraṇya bāhuḥ

original: RV_07.034.05.1{25} abhi pra sthātāheva yajñaṃ yāteva patman tmanā hinota
analyzed: abhi pra sthāta ahā iva yajñam yāta iva patman tmanā hinota

original: RV_07.034.06.1{25} tmanā samatsu hinota yajñaṃ dadhāta ketuṃ janāya vīram
analyzed: tmanā samatsu hinota yajñam dadhāta ketum janāya vīram

original: RV_07.034.07.1{25} udasya śuṣmād bhānurnārta bibharti bhāraṃ pṛthivī nabhūma
analyzed: udasya śuṣmāt bhānuḥ na ārta bibharti bhāram pṛthivī nabhūma

original: RV_07.034.08.1{25} hvayāmi devānayāturagne sādhannṛtena dhiyaṃ dadhāmi
analyzed: hvayāmi devān ayātuḥ agne sādhan ṛtena dhiyam dadhāmi

original: RV_07.034.09.1{25} abhi vo devīṃ dhiyaṃ dadhidhvaṃ pra vo devatrā vācaṃ kṛṇudhvam
analyzed: abhi vaḥ devīm dhiyam dadhidhvam pra vaḥ devatrā vācam kṛṇudhvam

original: RV_07.034.10.1{25} ā caṣṭa āsāṃ pātho nadīnāṃ varuṇa ugraḥ sahasracakṣāḥ
analyzed: ā caṣṭe āsām pāthaḥ nadīnām varuṇaḥ ugraḥ sahasra cakṣāḥ

original: RV_07.034.11.1{26} rājā rāṣṭrānāṃ peśo nadīnāmanuttamasmai kṣatraṃ viśvāyu
analyzed: rājā rāṣṭrānām peśaḥ nadīnām anuttamasmai kṣatram viśvāyu

original: RV_07.034.12.1{26} aviṣṭo asmān viśvāsu vikṣvadyuṃ kṛṇota śaṃsaṃ ninitsoḥ
analyzed: aviṣṭaḥ asmān viśvāsu vikṣvadyum kṛṇota śaṃsam ninitsoḥ

original: RV_07.034.13.1{26} vyetu didyud dviṣāmaśevā yuyota viṣvag rapastanūnām
analyzed: vyetu didyut dviṣām aśevā yuyota viṣvak rapaḥ tanūnām

original: RV_07.034.14.1{26} avīn no agnirhavyān namobhiḥ preṣṭho asmā adhāyi stomaḥ
analyzed: avīt naḥ agniḥ havyāt namobhiḥ preṣṭhaḥ asmai adhāyi stomaḥ

original: RV_07.034.15.1{26} sajūrdevebhirapāṃ napātaṃ sakhāyaṃ kṛdhvaṃ śivo no astu
analyzed: sajūs devebhiḥ apām napātam sakhāyam kṛdhvam śivaḥ naḥ astu

original: RV_07.034.16.1{26} abjāmukthairahiṃ gṛṇīṣe budhne nadīnāṃ rajassu ṣīdan
analyzed: ap jām ukthaiḥ ahim gṛṇīṣe budhne nadīnām rajassu sīdan

original: RV_07.034.17.1{26} mā no 'hirbudhnyo riṣe dhān mā yajño asya sridhad ṛtāyoḥ
analyzed: mā naḥ hirbudhnyaḥ riṣe dhāt mā yajñaḥ asya sridhat ṛtāyoḥ

original: RV_07.034.18.1{26} uta na eṣu nṛṣu śravo dhuḥ pra rāye yantu śardhanto aryaḥ
analyzed: uta naḥ eṣu nṛṣu śravaḥ dhuḥ pra rāye yantu śardhantaḥ aryaḥ

original: RV_07.034.19.1{26} tapanti śatruṃ svarṇa bhūmā mahāsenāso amebhireṣām
analyzed: tapanti śatrum svarṇa bhūmā mahā senāsaḥ amebhiḥ eṣām

original: RV_07.034.20.1{26} ā yan naḥ patnīrgamantyachā tvaṣṭā supāṇirdadhātuvīrān
analyzed: ā yat naḥ patnīḥ gamanti achā tvaṣṭā su pāṇiḥ dadhātu vīrān

original: RV_07.034.21.1{27} prati na stomaṃ tvaṣṭā juṣeta syādasme aramatirvasūyuḥ
analyzed: prati naḥ stomam tvaṣṭā juṣeta syāt asme aramatiḥ vasūyuḥ

original: RV_07.034.22.1{27} tā no rāsan rātiṣāco vasūnyā rodasī varuṇānī śṛṇotu
analyzed: tāḥ naḥ rāsan rātiṣācaḥ vasūnyāḥ rodasī varuṇānī śṛṇotu

original: RV_07.034.22.2{27} varūtrībhiḥ suśaraṇo no astu tvaṣṭā sudatro vi dadhātu rāyaḥ
analyzed: varūtrībhiḥ su śaraṇaḥ naḥ astu tvaṣṭā su datraḥ vi dadhātu rāyaḥ

original: RV_07.034.23.1{27} tan no rāyaḥ parvatāstan na āpastad rātiṣāca oṣadhīruta dyauḥ
analyzed: tat naḥ rāyaḥ parvatāḥ tat naḥ āpaḥ tat rātiṣācaḥ oṣadhīḥ uta dyauḥ

original: RV_07.034.23.2{27} vanaspatibhiḥ pṛthivī sajoṣā ubhe rodasī pari pāsato naḥ
analyzed: vanaspatibhiḥ pṛthivī sajoṣāḥ ubhe rodasī pari pāsataḥ naḥ

original: RV_07.034.24.1{27} anu tadurvī rodasī jihātāmanu dyukṣo varuṇa indrasakhā
analyzed: anu tat urvī rodasī jihātām anu dyukṣaḥ varuṇaḥ indra sakhā

original: RV_07.034.24.2{27} anu viśve maruto ye sahāso rāyaḥ syāma dharuṇaṃ dhiyadhyai
analyzed: anu viśve marutaḥ ye sahāsaḥ rāyaḥ syāma dharuṇam dhiyadhyai

original: RV_07.034.25.1{27} tan na indro varuṇo mitro agnirāpa oṣadhīrvanino juṣanta
analyzed: tat naḥ indraḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ agniḥ āpaḥ oṣadhīḥ vaninaḥ juṣanta

original: RV_07.034.25.2{27} śarman syāma marutāmupasthe yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: śarman syāma marutām upasthe yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.035.01.1{28} śaṃ na indrāgnī bhavatāmavobhiḥ śaṃ na indrāvaruṇā rātahavyā
analyzed: śam naḥ indra agnī bhavatām avobhiḥ śam naḥ indrāvaruṇā rāta havyā

original: RV_07.035.01.2{28} śamindrāsomā suvitāya śaṃ yoḥ śaṃ na indrāpūṣaṇā vājasātau
analyzed: śam indrāsomā suvitāya śam yos śam naḥ indrāpūṣaṇā vājasātau

original: RV_07.035.02.1{28} śaṃ no bhagaḥ śamu naḥ śaṃso astu śaṃ naḥ purandhiḥśamu santu rāyaḥ
analyzed: śam naḥ bhagaḥ śamu naḥ śaṃsaḥ astu śam naḥ purandhiḥ śamu santu rāyaḥ

original: RV_07.035.02.2{28} śaṃ naḥ satyasya suyamasya śaṃsaḥśaṃ no aryamā purujāto astu
analyzed: śam naḥ satyasya su yamasya śaṃsaḥ śam naḥ aryamā puru jātaḥ astu

original: RV_07.035.03.1{28} śaṃ no dhātā śamu dhartā no astu śaṃ na urūcī bhavatusvadhābhiḥ
analyzed: śam naḥ dhātā śamu dhartā naḥ astu śam naḥ urūcī bhavatu svadhābhiḥ

original: RV_07.035.03.2{28} śaṃ rodasī bṛhatī śaṃ no adriḥ śaṃ nodevānāṃ suhavāni santu
analyzed: śam rodasī bṛhatī śam naḥ adriḥ śam naḥ devānām su havāni santu

original: RV_07.035.04.1{28} śaṃ no agnirjyotiranīko astu śaṃ no mitrāvaruṇāvaśvinā śam
analyzed: śam naḥ agniḥ jyotiḥ anīkaḥ astu śam naḥ mitrāvaruṇau aśvinā śam

original: RV_07.035.04.2{28} śaṃ naḥ sukṛtāṃ sukṛtāni santu śaṃ na iṣiroabhi vātu vātaḥ
analyzed: śam naḥ su kṛtām sukṛtāni santu śam naḥ vātu vātaḥ

original: RV_07.035.05.1{28} śaṃ no dyāvāpṛthivī pūrvahūtau śamantarikṣaṃ dṛśayeno astu
analyzed: śam naḥ dyāvāpṛthivī pūrva hūtau śam antarikṣam dṛśa yenaḥ astu

original: RV_07.035.05.2{28} śaṃ na oṣadhīrvanino bhavantu śaṃ no rajasas patirastu jiṣṇuḥ
analyzed: śam naḥ oṣadhīḥ vaninaḥ bhavantu śam naḥ rajasaḥ patiḥ astu jiṣṇuḥ

original: RV_07.035.06.1{29} śaṃ na indro vasubhirdevo astu śamādityebhirvaruṇaḥ suśaṃsaḥ
analyzed: śam naḥ indraḥ vasubhiḥ devaḥ astu śam ādityebhiḥ varuṇaḥ su śaṃsaḥ

original: RV_07.035.06.2{29} śaṃ no rudro rudrebhirjalāṣaḥ śaṃ nastvaṣṭā gnābhiriha śṛṇotu
analyzed: śam naḥ rudraḥ rudrebhiḥ jalāṣaḥ śam naḥ tvaṣṭā gnābhiḥ iha śṛṇotu

original: RV_07.035.07.1{29} śaṃ naḥ somo bhavatu brahma śaṃ naḥ śaṃ no grāvāṇaḥśamu santu yajñāḥ
analyzed: śam naḥ somaḥ bhavatu brahma śam naḥ śam naḥ grāvāṇaḥ śamu santu yajñāḥ

original: RV_07.035.07.2{29} śaṃ naḥ svarūṇāṃ mitayo bhavantu śaṃ naḥ prasvaḥ śaṃ vastu vediḥ
analyzed: śam naḥ svarūṇām mitayaḥ bhavantu śam naḥ prasvaḥ śam vastu vediḥ

original: RV_07.035.08.1{29} śaṃ naḥ sūrya urucakṣā udetu śaṃ naścatasraḥ pradiśo bhavantu
analyzed: śam naḥ sūryaḥ uru cakṣāḥ udetu śam naḥ catasraḥ pradiśaḥ bhavantu

original: RV_07.035.08.2{29} śaṃ naḥ parvatā dhruvayo bhavantu śaṃ naḥ sindhavaḥ śamu santvāpaḥ
analyzed: śam naḥ parvatāḥ dhruvayaḥ bhavantu śam naḥ sindhavaḥ śamu santu āpaḥ

original: RV_07.035.09.1{29} śaṃ no aditirbhavatu vratebhiḥ śaṃ no bhavantu marutaḥ svarkāḥ
analyzed: śam naḥ aditiḥ bhavatu vratebhiḥ śam naḥ bhavantu marutaḥ su arkāḥ

original: RV_07.035.09.2{29} śaṃ no viṣṇuḥ śaṃ u pūṣā no astu śaṃ no bhavitraṃ śaṃ vastu vāyuḥ
analyzed: śam naḥ viṣṇuḥ śam u pūṣā naḥ astu śam naḥ bhavitram śam vastu vāyuḥ

original: RV_07.035.10.1{29} śaṃ no devaḥ savitā trāyamāṇaḥ śaṃ no bhavantūṣaso vibhātīḥ
analyzed: śam naḥ devaḥ savitā trāyamāṇaḥ śam naḥ bhavantu uṣasaḥ vibhātīḥ

original: RV_07.035.10.2{29} śaṃ naḥ parjanyo bhavatu prajābhyaḥ śaṃ naḥkṣetrasya patirastu śambhuḥ
analyzed: śam naḥ parjanyaḥ bhavatu prajābhyaḥ śam naḥ kṣetrasya patiḥ astu śambhuḥ

original: RV_07.035.11.1{30} śaṃ no devā viśvadevā bhavantu śaṃ sarasvatī saha dhībhirastu
analyzed: śam naḥ devāḥ viśva devāḥ bhavantu śam sarasvatī saha dhībhiḥ astu

original: RV_07.035.11.2{30} śamabhiṣācaḥ śamu rātiṣācaḥ śaṃ no divyāḥ pārthivāḥ śaṃ no apyāḥ
analyzed: śam abhiṣācaḥ śam u rātiṣācaḥ śam naḥ divyāḥ pārthivāḥ śam naḥ apyāḥ

original: RV_07.035.12.1{30} śaṃ naḥ satyasya patayo bhavantu śaṃ no arvantaḥ śamu santu gāvaḥ
analyzed: śam naḥ satyasya patayaḥ bhavantu śam naḥ arvantaḥ śamu santu gāvaḥ

original: RV_07.035.12.2{30} śaṃ na ṛbhavaḥ sukṛtaḥ suhastāḥ śaṃ no bhavantu pitaro haveṣu
analyzed: śam naḥ ṛbhavaḥ su kṛtaḥ su hastāḥ śam naḥ bhavantu pitaraḥ haveṣu

original: RV_07.035.13.1{30} śaṃ no aja ekapād devo astu śaṃ no 'hirbudhnyaḥ śaṃ samudraḥ
analyzed: śam naḥ ajaḥ ekapād devaḥ astu śam naḥ hirbudhnyaḥ śam samudraḥ

original: RV_07.035.13.2{30} śaṃ no apāṃ napāt perurastu śaṃ naḥ pṛśnirbhavatu devagopā
analyzed: śam naḥ apām napāt peruḥ astu śam naḥ pṛśniḥ bhavatu deva gopā

original: RV_07.035.14.1{30} ādityā rudrā vasavo juṣantedaṃ brahma kriyamāṇaṃ navīyaḥ
analyzed: ādityāḥ rudrāḥ vasavaḥ juṣanta idam brahma kriyamāṇam navīyaḥ

original: RV_07.035.14.2{30} śṛṇvantu ni divyāḥ pārthivāso gojātā uta ye yajñiyāsaḥ
analyzed: śṛṇvantu ni divyāḥ pārthivāsaḥ go jātāḥ uta ye yajñiyāsaḥ

original: RV_07.035.15.1{30} ye devānāṃ yajñiyā yajñiyānāṃ manoryajatrā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ
analyzed: ye devānām yajñiyāḥ yajñiyānām manoḥ yajatrāḥ amṛtāḥ ṛta jñāḥ

original: RV_07.035.15.2{30} te no rāsantāmurugāyamadya yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: te naḥ rāsantām uru gāyam adya yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.036.01.1{01} pra brahmaitu sadanād ṛtasya vi raśmibhiḥ sasṛje sūryo gāḥ
analyzed: pra brahmā etu sadanāt ṛtasya vi raśmibhiḥ sasṛje sūryaḥ gāḥ

original: RV_07.036.01.2{01} vi sānunā pṛthivī sasra urvī pṛthu pratīkamadhyedhe agniḥ
analyzed: vi sānunā pṛthivī sasre urvī pṛthu pratīkam adhyedhe agniḥ

original: RV_07.036.02.1{01} imāṃ vāṃ mitrāvaruṇā suvṛktimiṣaṃ na kṛṇve asurā navīyaḥ
analyzed: imām vām mitrāvaruṇā suvṛk timiṣam na kṛṇve asurāḥ navīyaḥ

original: RV_07.036.02.2{01} ino vāmanyaḥ padavīradabdho janaṃ ca mitro yatati bruvāṇaḥ
analyzed: inaḥ vāmanyaḥ pada vīra dabdhaḥ janam ca mitraḥ yatati bruvāṇaḥ

original: RV_07.036.03.1{01} ā vātasya dhrajato ranta ityā apīpayanta dhenavo na sūdāḥ
analyzed: ā vātasya dhrajataḥ rante ityāḥ apīpayanta dhenavaḥ na sūdāḥ

original: RV_07.036.03.2{01} maho divaḥ sadane jāyamāno 'cikradad vṛṣabhaḥ sasminnūdhan
analyzed: mahaḥ divaḥ sadane jāyamānaḥ cikradat vṛṣabhaḥ sasmin ūdhan

original: RV_07.036.04.1{01} girā ya etā yunajad dharī ta indra priyā surathā śūra dhāyū
analyzed: girā yaḥ etā yunajat harī te indra priyā su rathā śūra dhāyū

original: RV_07.036.04.2{01} pra yo manyuṃ ririkṣato minātyā sukratumaryamaṇaṃ vavṛtyām
analyzed: pra yaḥ manyum ririkṣataḥ mināti ā sukratum aryamaṇam vavṛtyām

original: RV_07.036.05.1{01} yajante asya sakhyaṃ vayaśca namasvinaḥ sva ṛtasya dhāman
analyzed: yajante asya sakhyam vayaḥ ca namasvinaḥ sve ṛtasya dhāman

original: RV_07.036.05.2{01} vi pṛkṣo bābadhe nṛbhi stavāna idaṃ namo rudrāya preṣṭham
analyzed: vi pṛkṣaḥ bābadhe nṛbhiḥ stavānaḥ idam namaḥ rudrāya preṣṭham

original: RV_07.036.06.1{02} ā yat sākaṃ yaśaso vāvaśānāḥ sarasvatī saptathī sindhumātā
analyzed: ā yat sākam yaśasaḥ vāvaśānāḥ sarasvatī saptathī sindhu mātā

original: RV_07.036.06.2{02} yāḥ suṣvayanta sudughāḥ sudhārā abhi svena payasā pīpyānāḥ
analyzed: yāḥ su dughāḥ su dhārāḥ abhi svena payasā pīpyānāḥ

original: RV_07.036.07.1{02} uta tye no maruto mandasānā dhiyaṃ tokaṃ ca vājino 'vantu
analyzed: uta tye naḥ marutaḥ mandasānāḥ dhiyam tokam ca vājinaḥ vantu

original: RV_07.036.07.2{02} mā naḥ pari khyadakṣarā carantyavīvṛdhan yujyaṃ te rayiṃ naḥ
analyzed: mā naḥ pari khyat akṣarā carantī avīvṛdhan yujyam te rayim naḥ

original: RV_07.036.08.1{02} pra vo mahīmaramatiṃ kṛṇudhvaṃ pra pūṣaṇaṃ vidathyaṃ na vīram
analyzed: pra vaḥ mahīmaramatim kṛṇudhvam pra pūṣaṇam vidathyam na vīram

original: RV_07.036.08.2{02} bhagaṃ dhiyo 'vitāraṃ no asyāḥ sātau vājaṃ rātiṣācaṃ purandhim
analyzed: bhagam dhiyaḥ vitāram naḥ asyāḥ sātau vājam rātiṣācam purandhim

original: RV_07.036.09.1{02} achāyaṃ vo marutaḥ śloka etvachā viṣṇuṃ niṣiktapāmavobhiḥ
analyzed: acha ayam vaḥ marutaḥ ślokaḥ etu achā viṣṇum niṣikta pāmavobhiḥ

original: RV_07.036.09.2{02} uta prajāyai gṛṇate vayo dhuryūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: uta prajāyai gṛṇate vayaḥ dhuḥ yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.037.01.1{03} ā vo vāhiṣṭho vahatu stavadhyai ratho vājā ṛbhukṣaṇo amṛktaḥ
analyzed: ā vaḥ vāhiṣṭhaḥ vahatu stavadhyai rathaḥ vājāḥ ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ amṛktaḥ

original: RV_07.037.01.2{03} abhi tripṛṣṭhaiḥ savaneṣu somairmade suśiprā mahabhiḥ pṛṇadhvam
analyzed: abhi tri pṛṣṭhaiḥ savaneṣu somaiḥ made su śiprāḥ mahabhiḥ pṛṇadhvam

original: RV_07.037.02.1{03} yūyaṃ ha ratnaṃ maghavatsu dhattha svardṛśa ṛbhukṣaṇo amṛktam
analyzed: yūyam ha ratnam maghavatsu dhattha svar dṛśaḥ ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ amṛktam

original: RV_07.037.02.2{03} saṃ yajñeṣu svadhāvantaḥ pibadhvaṃ vi no rādhāṃsi matibhirdayadhvam
analyzed: sam yajñeṣu svadhāvantaḥ pibadhvam vi naḥ rādhāṃsi matibhiḥ dayadhvam

original: RV_07.037.03.1{03} uvocitha hi maghavan deṣṇaṃ maho arbhasya vasuno vibhāge
analyzed: uvocitha hi maghavan deṣṇam mahaḥ arbhasya vasunaḥ vibhāge

original: RV_07.037.03.2{03} ubhā te pūrṇā vasunā gabhastī na sūnṛtā ni yamate vasavyā
analyzed: ubhā te pūrṇā vasunā gabhastī na sūnṛtā ni yamate vasavyā

original: RV_07.037.04.1{03} tvamindra svayaśā ṛbhukṣā vājo na sādhurastameṣy ṛkvā
analyzed: tvam indra sva yaśāḥ ṛbhukṣāḥ vājaḥ na sādhuḥ astam eṣi ṛkvā

original: RV_07.037.04.2{03} vayaṃ nu te dāśvāṃsaḥ syāma brahma kṛṇvanto harivo vasiṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: vayam nu te dāśvāṃsaḥ syāma brahma kṛṇvantaḥ harivas vasiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_07.037.05.1{03} sanitāsi pravato dāśuṣe cid yābhirviveṣo haryaśva dhībhiḥ
analyzed: sanitāsi pravataḥ dāśuṣe cit yābhiḥ viveṣaḥ haryaśva dhībhiḥ

original: RV_07.037.05.2{03} vavanmā nu te yujyābhirūtī kadā na indra rāya ā daśasyeḥ
analyzed: vavanma nu te yujyā abhirūtī kadā naḥ indra rāyaḥ ā daśasyeḥ

original: RV_07.037.06.1{04} vāsayasīva vedhasastvaṃ naḥ kadā na indra vacaso bubodhaḥ
analyzed: vāsayasi iva vedhasaḥ tvam naḥ kadā naḥ indra vacasaḥ bubodhaḥ

original: RV_07.037.06.2{04} astaṃ tātyā dhiyā rayiṃ suvīraṃ pṛkṣo no arvā nyuhīta vājī
analyzed: astam tātyā dhiyā rayim su vīram pṛkṣaḥ naḥ arvā nyuhīta vājī

original: RV_07.037.07.1{04} abhi yaṃ devī nir{ṛ}tiścidīśe nakṣanta indraṃ śaradaḥsupṛkṣaḥ
analyzed: abhi yam devī nirṛtiḥ cit īśe nakṣante indram śaradaḥ su pṛkṣaḥ

original: RV_07.037.07.2{04} upa tribandhurjaradaṣṭimetyasvaveśaṃ yaṃ kṛṇavanta martāḥ
analyzed: upa tribandhuḥ jaradaṣṭim etya sva veśam yam kṛṇavanta martāḥ

original: RV_07.037.08.1{04} ā no rādhāṃsi savitaḥ stavadhyā ā rāyo yantu parvatasyarātau
analyzed: ā naḥ rādhāṃsi savitar stavadhyai ā rāyaḥ yantu parvatasya rātau

original: RV_07.037.08.2{04} sadā no divyaḥ pāyuḥ siṣaktu yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: sadā naḥ divyaḥ pāyuḥ siṣaktu yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.038.01.1{05} udu ṣya devaḥ savitā yayāma hiraṇyayīmamatiṃ yāmaśiśret
analyzed: udu sya devaḥ savitā yayāma hiraṇyayīm amatim yām aśiśret

original: RV_07.038.01.2{05} nūnaṃ bhago havyo mānuṣebhirvi yo ratnā purūvasurdadhāti
analyzed: nūnam bhagaḥ havyaḥ mānuṣebhiḥ vi yaḥ ratnā purūvasuḥ dadhāti

original: RV_07.038.02.1{05} udu tiṣṭha savitaḥ śrudhyasya hiraṇyapāṇe prabhṛtāv ṛtasya
analyzed: udu tiṣṭha savitar śrudhyasya hiraṇya pāṇe prabhṛtau ṛtasya

original: RV_07.038.02.2{05} vyurvīṃ pṛthvīmamatiṃ sṛjāna ā nṛbhyo martabhojanaṃ suvānaḥ
analyzed: vi urvīm pṛthvīm amatim sṛjānaḥ ā nṛbhyaḥ marta bhojanam suvānaḥ

original: RV_07.038.03.1{05} api ṣṭutaḥ savitā devo astu yamā cid viśve vasavo gṛṇanti
analyzed: api stutaḥ savitā devaḥ astu yamā cit viśve vasavaḥ gṛṇanti

original: RV_07.038.03.2{05} sa na stomān namasyaścano dhād viśvebhiḥ pātu pāyubhirni sūrīn
analyzed: sa naḥ stomān namasyaścanaḥ dhāt viśvebhiḥ pātu pāyubhiḥ ni sūrīn

original: RV_07.038.04.1{05} abhi yaṃ devyaditirgṛṇāti savaṃ devasya saviturjuṣāṇā
analyzed: abhi yam devī aditiḥ gṛṇāti savam devasya savituḥ juṣāṇā

original: RV_07.038.04.2{05} abhi samrājo varuṇo gṛṇantyabhi mitrāso aryamā sajoṣāḥ
analyzed: abhi samrājaḥ varuṇaḥ gṛṇanti abhi mitrāsaḥ aryamā sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_07.038.05.1{05} abhi ye mitho vanuṣaḥ sapante rātiṃ divo rātiṣācaḥ pṛthivyāḥ
analyzed: abhi ye mithas vanuṣaḥ sapante rātim divaḥ rātiṣācaḥ pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_07.038.05.2{05} ahirbudhnya uta naḥ śṛṇotu varūtryekadhenubhirni pātu
analyzed: ahirbudhnyaḥ uta naḥ śṛṇotu varūtrī ekadhenubhiḥ ni pātu

original: RV_07.038.06.1{05} anu tan no jāspatirmaṃsīṣṭa ratnaṃ devasya savituriyānaḥ
analyzed: anu tat naḥ jāspatiḥ maṃsīṣṭa ratnam devasya savituḥ iyānaḥ

original: RV_07.038.06.2{05} bhagamugro 'vase johavīti bhagamanugro adha yāti ratnam
analyzed: bhagam ugraḥ vase johavīti bhagam anugraḥ adha yāti ratnam

original: RV_07.038.07.1{05} śaṃ no bhavantu vājino haveṣu devatātā mitadravaḥ svarkāḥ
analyzed: śam naḥ bhavantu vājinaḥ haveṣu devatātā mitadravaḥ su arkāḥ

original: RV_07.038.07.2{05} jambhayanto 'hiṃ vṛkaṃ rakṣāṃsi sanemyasmad yuyavannamīvāḥ
analyzed: jambhayantaḥ him vṛkam rakṣāṃsi sanemi asmat yuyavan amīvāḥ

original: RV_07.038.08.1{05} vāje-vāje 'vata vājino no dhaneṣu viprā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ
analyzed: vājevāje vata vājinaḥ naḥ dhaneṣu viprāḥ amṛtāḥ ṛta jñāḥ

original: RV_07.038.08.2{05} asya madhvaḥ pibata mādayadhvaṃ tṛptā yāta pathibhirdevayānaiḥ
analyzed: asya madhvaḥ pibata mādayadhvam tṛptāḥ yāta pathibhiḥ deva yānaiḥ

original: RV_07.039.01.1{06} ūrdhvo agniḥ sumatiṃ vasvo aśret pratīcī jūrṇirdevatātimeti
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ agniḥ sumatim vasvaḥ aśret pratīcī jūrṇiḥ devatātim eti

original: RV_07.039.01.2{06} bhejāte adrī rathyeva panthām ṛtaṃ hotā na iṣito yajāti
analyzed: bhejāte adrī rathyā iva panthām ṛtam hotā naḥ iṣitaḥ yajāti

original: RV_07.039.02.1{06} pra vāvṛje suprayā barhireṣāmā viśpatīva bīriṭa iyāte
analyzed: pra vāvṛje su prayāḥ barhiḥ eṣāmā viśpatī iva bīriṭe iyāte

original: RV_07.039.02.2{06} viśāmaktoruṣasaḥ pūrvahūtau vāyuḥ pūṣā svastaye niyutvān
analyzed: viśām aktoḥ uṣasaḥ pūrva hūtau vāyuḥ pūṣā svastaye niyutvān

original: RV_07.039.03.1{06} jmayā atra vasavo ranta devā urāvantarikṣe marjayanta śubhrāḥ
analyzed: jma yāḥ atra vasavaḥ ranta devāḥ urau antarikṣe marjayanta śubhrāḥ

original: RV_07.039.03.2{06} arvāk patha urujrayaḥ kṛṇudhvaṃ śrotā dūtasya jagmuṣo no asya
analyzed: arvāk pathaḥ uru jrayaḥ kṛṇudhvam śrota dūtasya jagmuṣaḥ naḥ asya

original: RV_07.039.04.1{06} te hi yajñeṣu yajñiyāsa ūmāḥ sadhasthaṃ viśve abhi santi devāḥ
analyzed: te hi yajñeṣu yajñiyāsaḥ ūmāḥ sadhastham viśve abhi santi devāḥ

original: RV_07.039.04.2{06} tānadhvara uśato yakṣyagne śruṣṭī bhagaṃ nāsatyā purandhim
analyzed: tān adhvare uśataḥ yakṣi agne śruṣṭī bhagam nāsatyā purandhim

original: RV_07.039.05.1{06} āgne giro diva ā pṛthivyā mitraṃ vaha varuṇamindramagnim
analyzed: ā agne giraḥ divaḥ ā pṛthivyāḥ mitram vaha varuṇam indram agnim

original: RV_07.039.05.2{06} āryamaṇamaditiṃ viṣṇumeṣāṃ sarasvatī maruto mādayantām
analyzed: ā aryamaṇam aditim viṣṇum eṣām sarasvatī marutaḥ mādayantām

original: RV_07.039.06.1{06} rare havyaṃ matibhiryajñiyānāṃ nakṣat kāmaṃ martyānāmasinvan
analyzed: rare havyam matibhiḥ yajñiyānām nakṣat kāmam martyānām asinvan

original: RV_07.039.06.2{06} dhātā rayimavidasyaṃ sadāsāṃ sakṣīmahi yujyebhirnu devaiḥ
analyzed: dhāta rayim avidasyam sadāsām sakṣīmahi yujyebhiḥ nu devaiḥ

original: RV_07.039.07.1{06} nū rodasī abhiṣṭute vasiṣṭhair{ṛ}tāvāno varuṇo mitro agniḥ
analyzed: nu rodasī abhiṣṭute vasiṣṭhaiḥ ṛtāvānaḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ agniḥ

original: RV_07.039.07.2{06} yachantu candrā upamaṃ no arkaṃ yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: yacchantu candrāḥ upamam naḥ arkam yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.040.01.1{07} o śruṣṭirvidathyā sametu prati stomaṃ dadhīmahi turāṇām
analyzed: ā u śruṣṭiḥ vidathyā sametu prati stomam dadhīmahi turāṇām

original: RV_07.040.01.2{07} yadadya devaḥ savitā suvāti syāmāsya ratnino vibhāge
analyzed: yat adya devaḥ savitā suvāti syāma asya ratninaḥ vibhāge

original: RV_07.040.02.1{07} mitrastan no varuṇo rodasī ca dyubhaktamindro aryamā dadātu
analyzed: mitraḥ tat naḥ varuṇaḥ rodasī ca dyu bhaktam indraḥ aryamā dadātu

original: RV_07.040.02.2{07} dideṣṭu devyaditī rekṇo vāyuśca yan niyuvaite bhagaśca
analyzed: dideṣṭu devī aditiḥ rekṇaḥ vāyuḥ ca yat niyuvā ete bhagaḥ ca

original: RV_07.040.03.1{07} sedugro astu marutaḥ sa śuṣmī yaṃ martyaṃ pṛṣadaśvā avātha
analyzed: sa idugraḥ astu marutaḥ sa śuṣmī yam martyam pṛṣat aśvāḥ avātha

original: RV_07.040.03.2{07} utemagniḥ sarasvatī junanti na tasya rāyaḥ paryetāsti
analyzed: uta īm agniḥ sarasvatī junanti na tasya rāyaḥ paryetā asti

original: RV_07.040.04.1{07} ayaṃ hi netā varuṇa ṛtasya mitro rājāno aryamāpo dhuḥ
analyzed: ayam hi netā varuṇaḥ ṛtasya mitraḥ rājānaḥ aryamā apaḥ dhuḥ

original: RV_07.040.04.2{07} suhavā devyaditiranarvā te no aṃho ati parṣannariṣṭān
analyzed: su havā devī aditiḥ anarvā te naḥ aṃhaḥ ati parṣan ariṣṭān

original: RV_07.040.05.1{07} asya devasya mīḷhuṣo vayā viṣṇoreṣasya prabhṛthe havirbhiḥ
analyzed: asya devasya mīḍhuṣaḥ vayāḥ viṣṇoḥ eṣasya prabhṛthe havirbhiḥ

original: RV_07.040.05.2{07} vide hi rudro rudriyaṃ mahitvaṃ yāsiṣṭaṃ vartiraśvināvirāvat
analyzed: vide hi rudraḥ rudriyam mahi tvam yāsiṣṭam vartiḥ aśvinā virāvat

original: RV_07.040.06.1{07} mātra pūṣannāghṛṇa irasyo varūtrī yad rātiṣācaśca rāsan
analyzed: mā atra pūṣan āghṛṇaḥ irasyaḥ varūtrī yat rātiṣācaḥ ca rāsan

original: RV_07.040.06.2{07} mayobhuvo no arvanto ni pāntu vṛṣṭiṃ parijmā vāto dadātu
analyzed: mayobhuvaḥ naḥ arvantaḥ ni pāntu vṛṣṭim parijmā vātaḥ dadātu
nu rodasī

original: RV_07.041.01.1{08} prātaragniṃ prātarindraṃ havāmahe prātarmitrāvaruṇāprātaraśvinā
analyzed: prātar agnim prātar indram havāmahe prātar mitrāvaruṇā prātar aśvinā

original: RV_07.041.01.2{08} prātarbhagaṃ pūṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇas patiṃ prātaḥ somamuta rudraṃ huvema
analyzed: prātar bhagam pūṣaṇam brahmaṇaḥ patim prātar somam uta rudram huvema

original: RV_07.041.02.1{08} prātarjitaṃ bhagamugraṃ huvema vayaṃ putramaditeryo vidhartā
analyzed: prātar jitam bhagam ugram huvema vayam putram aditeḥ yaḥ vidhartā

original: RV_07.041.02.2{08} ādhraścid yaṃ manyamānasturaścid rājā cid yaṃ bhagaṃ bhakṣītyāha
analyzed: ādhraḥ cit yam manyamānaḥ turaḥ cit rājā cit yam bhagam bhakṣi iti āha

original: RV_07.041.03.1{08} bhaga praṇetarbhaga satyarādho bhagemāṃ dhiyamudavā dadan naḥ
analyzed: bhaga praṇetar bhaga satya rādhaḥ bhaga imām dhiyam udavā dadan naḥ

original: RV_07.041.03.2{08} bhaga pra ṇo janaya gobhiraśvairbhaga pra nṛbhirnṛvantaḥ syāma
analyzed: bhaga pra naḥ janaya gobhiḥ aśvaiḥ bhaga pra nṛbhiḥ nṛvantaḥ syāma

original: RV_07.041.04.1{08} utedānīṃ bhagavantaḥ syāmota prapitva uta madhye ahnām
analyzed: uta idānīm bhagavantaḥ syāma uta prapitve uta madhye ahnām

original: RV_07.041.04.2{08} utoditā maghavan sūryasya vayaṃ devānāṃ sumatau syāma
analyzed: uta uditā maghavan sūryasya vayam devānām sumatau syāma

original: RV_07.041.05.1{08} bhaga eva bhagavānastu devāstena vayaṃ bhagavantaḥ syāma
analyzed: bhagaḥ eva bhagavān astu devāḥ tena vayam bhagavantaḥ syāma

original: RV_07.041.05.2{08} taṃ tvā bhaga sarva ijjohavīti sa no bhaga puraetā bhaveha
analyzed: tam tvā bhaga sarvaḥ id johavīti sa naḥ bhaga puraetā bhava iha

original: RV_07.041.06.1{08} samadhvarāyoṣaso namanta dadhikrāveva śucaye padāya
analyzed: sam adhvarāya uṣasaḥ namanta dadhikrāvā iva śucaye padāya

original: RV_07.041.06.2{08} arvācīnaṃ vasuvidaṃ bhagaṃ no rathamivāśvā vājina ā vahantu
analyzed: arvācīnam vasu vidam bhagam naḥ ratham iva aśvāḥ vājinaḥ ā vahantu

original: RV_07.041.07.1{08} aśvāvatīrgomatīrna uṣāso vīravatīḥ sadamuchantu bhadrāḥ
analyzed: aśvāvatīḥ gomatīḥ naḥ uṣāsaḥ vīravatīḥ sadam ucchantu bhadrāḥ

original: RV_07.041.07.2{08} ghṛtaṃ duhānā viśvataḥ prapītā yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: ghṛtam duhānāḥ viśvatas prapītāḥ yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.042.01.1{09} pra brahmāṇo aṅgiraso nakṣanta pra krandanurnabhanyasya vetu
analyzed: pra brahmāṇaḥ aṅgirasaḥ nakṣanta pra krandanuḥ nabhanyasya vetu

original: RV_07.042.01.2{09} pra dhenava udapruto navanta yujyātāmadrī adhvarasya peśaḥ
analyzed: pra dhenavaḥ uda prutaḥ navanta yujyātāmadrī adhvarasya peśaḥ

original: RV_07.042.02.1{09} sugaste agne sanavitto adhvā yukṣvā sute harito rohitaśca
analyzed: sugaḥ te agne sanavittaḥ adhvā yukṣva sute haritaḥ rohitaḥ ca

original: RV_07.042.02.2{09} ye vā sadmannaruṣā vīravāho huve devānāṃ janimānisattaḥ
analyzed: ye vā sadman aruṣā vīra vāhaḥ huve devānām janimā anisattar

original: RV_07.042.03.1{09} samu vo yajñaṃ mahayan namobhiḥ pra hotā mandro ririca upāke
analyzed: samu vaḥ yajñam mahayan namobhiḥ pra hotā mandraḥ ririce upāke

original: RV_07.042.03.2{09} yajasva su purvaṇīka devānā yajñiyāmaramatiṃ vavṛtyāḥ
analyzed: yajasva su purvaṇīka devānā yajñiya amaramatim vavṛtyāḥ

original: RV_07.042.04.1{09} yadā vīrasya revato duroṇe syonaśīratithirāciketat
analyzed: yadā vīrasya revataḥ duroṇe syona śīḥ atithiḥ āciketat

original: RV_07.042.04.2{09} suprīto agniḥ sudhito dama ā sa viśe dāti vāryamiyatyai
analyzed: su prītaḥ agniḥ sudhitaḥ dame ā sa viśe dāti vāryam iyatyai

original: RV_07.042.05.1{09} imaṃ no agne adhvaraṃ juṣasva marutsvindre yaśasaṃ kṛdhī naḥ
analyzed: imam naḥ agne adhvaram juṣasva marutsu indre yaśasam kṛdhī naḥ

original: RV_07.042.05.2{09} ā naktā barhiḥ sadatāmuṣāsośantā mitrāvaruṇāyajeha
analyzed: ā naktā barhiḥ sadatām uṣāsā uśantā mitrāvaruṇā āyaja iha

original: RV_07.042.06.1{09} evāgniṃ sahasyaṃ vasiṣṭho rāyaskāmo viśvapsnyasya staut
analyzed: eva agnim sahasyam vasiṣṭhaḥ rāyaskāmaḥ viśvapsnyasya staut

original: RV_07.042.06.2{09} iṣaṃ rayiṃ paprathad vājamasme yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: iṣam rayim paprathat vājam asme yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.043.01.1{10} pra vo yajñeṣu devayanto arcan dyāvā namobhiḥ prithivī iṣadhyai
analyzed: pra vaḥ yajñeṣu devayantaḥ arcan dyāvā namobhiḥ prithivī iṣadhyai

original: RV_07.043.01.2{10} yeṣāṃ brahmāṇyasamāni viprā viṣvag viyanti vanino na śākhāḥ
analyzed: yeṣām brahmāṇi asamāni viprāḥ viṣvak viyanti vaninaḥ na śākhāḥ

original: RV_07.043.02.1{10} pra yajña etu hetvo na saptirud yachadhvaṃ samanaso ghṛtācīḥ
analyzed: pra yajñaḥ etu hetvaḥ na saptiḥ ud yacchadhvam samanasaḥ ghṛtācīḥ

original: RV_07.043.02.2{10} stṛṇīta barhiradhvarāya sādhūrdhvā śocīṃṣi devayūnyasthuḥ
analyzed: stṛṇīta barhiḥ adhvarāya sādhu ūrdhvā śocīṃṣi devayūni asthuḥ

original: RV_07.043.03.1{10} ā putrāso na mātaraṃ vibhṛtrāḥ sānau devāso barhiṣaḥsadantu
analyzed: ā putrāsaḥ na mātaram vibhṛtrāḥ sānau devāsaḥ barhiṣaḥ sadantu

original: RV_07.043.03.2{10} ā viśvācī vidathyāmanaktvagne mā no devatātā mṛdhas kaḥ
analyzed: ā viśvācī vidathyām anaktu agne mā naḥ devatātā mṛdhaḥ kaḥ

original: RV_07.043.04.1{10} te sīṣapanta joṣamā yajatrā ṛtasya dhārāḥ sudughā duhānāḥ
analyzed: te sīṣapanta joṣamāḥ yajatrāḥ ṛtasya dhārāḥ sudughāḥ duhānāḥ

original: RV_07.043.04.2{10} jyeṣṭhaṃ vo adya maha ā vasūnāmā gantana samanaso yati ṣṭha
analyzed: jyeṣṭham vaḥ adya mahaḥ ā vasū nāmā gantana samanasaḥ yati ṣṭha

original: RV_07.043.05.1{10} evā no agne vikṣvā daśasya tvayā vayaṃ sahasāvannāskrāḥ
analyzed: eva naḥ agne vikṣva daśasya tvayā vayam sahasāvan āskrāḥ

original: RV_07.043.05.2{10} rāyā yujā sadhamādo ariṣṭā yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: rāyā yujā sadhamādaḥ ariṣṭāḥ yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.044.01.1{11} dadhikrāṃ vaḥ prathamamaśvinoṣasamagniṃ samiddhaṃ bhagamūtaye huve
analyzed: dadhikrām vaḥ prathamam aśvinā uṣasam agnim samiddham bhagam ūtaye huve

original: RV_07.044.01.2{11} indraṃ viṣṇuṃ pūṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇas patimādityān dyāvāpṛthivī apaḥ svaḥ
analyzed: indram viṣṇum pūṣaṇam brahmaṇaḥ patim ādityān dyāvāpṛthivī apaḥ svar

original: RV_07.044.02.1{11} dadhikrāmu namasā bodhayanta udīrāṇā yajñamupaprayantaḥ
analyzed: dadhikrāmu namasā bodhayantaḥ udīrāṇāḥ yajñam upaprayantaḥ

original: RV_07.044.02.2{11} iḷāṃ devīṃ barhiṣi sādayanto 'śvinā viprā suhavāhuvema
analyzed: iḷām devīm barhiṣi sādayantaḥ śvinā viprā su havā ahuvema

original: RV_07.044.03.1{11} dadhikrāvāṇaṃ bubudhāno agnimupa bruva uṣasaṃ sūryaṃ gām
analyzed: dadhikrāvāṇam bubudhānaḥ agnim upa bruve uṣasam sūryam gām

original: RV_07.044.03.2{11} bradhnaṃ māṃścatorvaruṇasya babhruṃ te viśvāsmad duritā yāvayantu
analyzed: bradhnam māṃścatoḥ varuṇasya babhrum te viśvā asmat duritā yāvayantu

original: RV_07.044.04.1{11} dadhikrāvā prathamo vājyarvāgre rathānāṃ bhavati prajānan
analyzed: dadhikrāvā prathamaḥ vājī arvā agre rathānām bhavati prajānan

original: RV_07.044.04.2{11} saṃvidāna uṣasā sūryeṇādityebhirvasubhiraṅgirobhiḥ
analyzed: saṃvidānaḥ uṣasā sūryeṇa ādityebhiḥ vasubhiḥ aṅgirobhiḥ

original: RV_07.044.05.1{11} ā no dadhikrāḥ pathyāmanaktv ṛtasya panthāmanvetavā u
analyzed: ā naḥ dadhikrāḥ pathyām anaktu ṛtasya panthām anvetavai u

original: RV_07.044.05.2{11} śṛṇotu no daivyaṃ śardho agniḥ śṛṇvantu viśve mahiṣāamūrāḥ
analyzed: śṛṇotu naḥ daivyam śardhaḥ agniḥ śṛṇvantu viśve mahiṣa amūrāḥ

original: RV_07.045.01.1{12} ā devo yātu savitā suratno 'ntarikṣaprā vahamāno aśvaiḥ
analyzed: ā devaḥ yātu savitā su ratnaḥ ntarikṣa prāḥ vahamānaḥ aśvaiḥ

original: RV_07.045.01.2{12} haste dadhāno naryā purūṇi niveśayañca prasuvañca bhūma
analyzed: haste dadhānaḥ naryā purūṇi niveśayan ca prasuvan ca bhūma

original: RV_07.045.02.1{12} udasya bāhū śithirā bṛhantā hiraṇyayā divo antānanaṣṭām
analyzed: udasya bāhū śithirā bṛhantā hiraṇyayā divaḥ anta ananaṣṭām

original: RV_07.045.02.2{12} nūnaṃ so asya mahimā paniṣṭa sūraścidasmā anu dādapasyām
analyzed: nūnam saḥ asya mahimā paniṣṭa sūraḥ cit asmai anu dāt apasyām

original: RV_07.045.03.1{12} sa ghā no devaḥ savitā sahāvā sāviṣad vasupatirvasūni
analyzed: sa gha naḥ devaḥ savitā sahāvā sāviṣat vasu patiḥ vasūni

original: RV_07.045.03.2{12} viśrayamāṇo amatimurūcīṃ martabhojanamadha rāsate naḥ
analyzed: viśrayamāṇaḥ amatim urūcīm marta bhojanam adha rāsate naḥ

original: RV_07.045.04.1{12} imā giraḥ savitāraṃ sujihvaṃ pūrṇagabhastimīḷate supāṇim
analyzed: imāḥ giraḥ savitāram su jihvam pūrṇa gabhastim īḍate su pāṇim

original: RV_07.045.04.2{12} citraṃ vayo bṛhadasme dadhātu yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: citram vayaḥ bṛhat asme dadhātu yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.046.01.1{13} imā rudrāya sthiradhanvane giraḥ kṣipreṣave devāya svadhāvne
analyzed: imāḥ rudrāya sthiradhanvane giraḥ kṣipreṣave devāya svadhāvne

original: RV_07.046.01.2{13} aṣāḷhāya sahamānāya vedhase tigmāyudhāya bharatā śṛṇotu naḥ
analyzed: aṣāḷhāya sahamānāya vedhase tigma āyudhāya bharatā śṛṇotu naḥ

original: RV_07.046.02.1{13} sa hi kṣayeṇa kṣamyasya janmanaḥ sāmrājyena divyasya cetati
analyzed: sa hi kṣayeṇa kṣamyasya janmanaḥ sāmrājyena divyasya cetati

original: RV_07.046.02.2{13} avannavantīrupa no duraścarānamīvo rudra jāsu no bhava
analyzed: avan avantīḥ upa naḥ duraḥ cara anamīvaḥ rudra jāsu naḥ bhava

original: RV_07.046.03.1{13} yā te didyudavasṛṣṭā divas pari kṣmayā carati pari sāvṛṇaktu naḥ
analyzed: yā te didyut avasṛṣṭā divaḥ pari kṣmayā carati pari sā āvṛṇaktu naḥ

original: RV_07.046.03.2{13} sahasraṃ te svapivāta bheṣajā mā nastokeṣutanayeṣu rīriṣah
analyzed: sahasram te svapivāta bheṣajā mā naḥ tokeṣutanayeṣu rīriṣah

original: RV_07.046.04.1{13} mā no vadhī rudra mā parā dā mā te bhūma prasitau hīḷitasya
analyzed: mā naḥ vadhīḥ rudra mā parā dāḥ mā te bhūma prasitau hīḍitasya

original: RV_07.046.04.2{13} ā no bhaja barhiṣi jīvaśaṃse yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: ā naḥ bhaja barhiṣi jīva śaṃse yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.047.01.1{14} āpo yaṃ vaḥ prathamaṃ devayanta indrapānamūrmimakṛṇvateḷaḥ
analyzed: āpaḥ yam vaḥ prathamam devayantaḥ indra pānam ūrmim akṛṇvata iḷaḥ

original: RV_07.047.01.2{14} taṃ vo vayaṃ śucimaripramadya ghṛtapruṣaṃ madhumantaṃ vanema
analyzed: tam vaḥ vayam śucim aripram adya ghṛta pruṣam madhumantam vanema

original: RV_07.047.02.1{14} tamūrmimāpo madhumattamaṃ vo 'pāṃ napādavatvāśuhemā
analyzed: tam ūrmim āpaḥ madhumattamam vaḥ pām napāt avatu āśu hemā

original: RV_07.047.02.2{14} yasminnindro vasubhirmādayāte tamaśyāma devayanto vo adya
analyzed: yasmin indraḥ vasubhiḥ mādayāte tam aśyāma devayantaḥ vaḥ adya

original: RV_07.047.03.1{14} śatapavitrāḥ svadhayā madantīrdevīrdevānāmapi yanti pāthaḥ
analyzed: śata pavitrāḥ svadhayā madantīḥ devīḥ devānām api yanti pāthaḥ

original: RV_07.047.03.2{14} tā indrasya na minanti vratāni sindhubhyo havyaṃ ghṛtavajjuhota
analyzed: tāḥ indrasya na minanti vratāni sindhubhyaḥ havyam ghṛtavat juhota

original: RV_07.047.04.1{14} yāḥ sūryo raśmibhirātatāna yābhya indro aradad gātumūrmim
analyzed: yāḥ sūryaḥ raśmibhiḥ ātatāna yābhyaḥ indraḥ aradat gātum ūrmim

original: RV_07.047.04.2{14} te sindhavo varivo dhātanā no yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: te sindhavaḥ varivaḥ dhātana naḥ yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.048.01.1{15} ṛbhukṣaṇo vājā mādayadhvamasme naro maghavānaḥ sutasya
analyzed: ṛbhukṣaṇaḥ vājāḥ mādayadhvam asme naraḥ maghavānaḥ sutasya

original: RV_07.048.01.2{15} ā vo 'rvācaḥ kratavo na yātāṃ vibhvo rathaṃ naryaṃ vartayantu
analyzed: ā vaḥ rvācaḥ kratavaḥ na yātām vibhvaḥ ratham naryam vartayantu

original: RV_07.048.02.1{15} ṛbhur{ṛ}bhubhirabhi vaḥ syāma vibhvo vibhubhiḥ śavasā śavāṃsi
analyzed: ṛbhuḥ ṛbhubhiḥ abhi vaḥ syāma vibhvaḥ vibhubhiḥ śavasā śavāṃsi

original: RV_07.048.02.2{15} vājo asmānavatu vājasātāvindreṇa yujā taruṣemavṛtram
analyzed: vājaḥ asmān avatu vājasātau indreṇa yujā taruṣema vṛtram

original: RV_07.048.03.1{15} te cid dhi pūrvīrabhi santi śāsā viśvānarya uparatāti vanvan
analyzed: te cit hi pūrvīḥ abhi santi śāsā viśvānaryaḥ uparatāti vanvan

original: RV_07.048.03.2{15} indro vibhvān ṛbhukṣā vājo aryaḥ śatrormithatyā kṛṇavan vi nṛmṇam
analyzed: indraḥ vibhvān ṛbhukṣāḥ vājaḥ aryaḥ śatroḥ mithatyā kṛṇavan vi nṛmṇam

original: RV_07.048.04.1{15} nū devāso varivaḥ kartanā no bhūta no viśve 'vase sajoṣāḥ
analyzed: nu devāsaḥ varivaḥ kartana naḥ bhūta naḥ viśve vase sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_07.048.04.2{15} samasme iṣaṃ vasavo dadīran yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: sam asme iṣam vasavaḥ dadīran yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.049.01.1{16} samudrajyeṣṭhāḥ salilasya madhyāt punānā yantyaniviśamānāḥ
analyzed: samudra jyeṣṭhāḥ salilasya madhyāt punānāḥ yanti a niviśamānāḥ

original: RV_07.049.01.2{16} indro yā vajrī vṛṣabho rarāda tā āpo devīrihamāmavantu
analyzed: indraḥ yāḥ vajrī vṛṣabhaḥ rarāda tāḥ āpaḥ devīḥ iham āmavantu

original: RV_07.049.02.1{16} yā āpo divyā uta vā sravanti khanitrimā uta vā yāḥ svayaṃjāḥ
analyzed: yāḥ āpaḥ divyāḥ uta vā sravanti khanitrimāḥ uta vā yāḥ svayaṃjāḥ

original: RV_07.049.02.2{16} samudrārthā yāḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāstā āpo .. .
analyzed: samudra arthāḥ yāḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ tāḥ āpaḥ

original: RV_07.049.03.1{16} yāsāṃ rājā varuṇo yāti madhye satyānṛte avapaśyañ janānām
analyzed: yāsām rājā varuṇaḥ yāti madhye satya anṛte avapaśyam janānām

original: RV_07.049.03.2{16} madhuścutaḥ śucayo yāḥ pāvakāstā āpo ...
analyzed: madhuścutaḥ śucayaḥ yāḥ pāvakāḥ tāḥ āpaḥ

original: RV_07.049.04.1{16} yāsu rājā varuṇo yāsu somo viśve devā yāsūrjaṃ madanti
analyzed: yāsu rājā varuṇaḥ yāsu somaḥ viśve devāḥ yāsu ūrjam madanti

original: RV_07.049.04.2{16} vaiśvānaro yāsvagniḥ praviṣṭastā āpo ...
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ yāsu agniḥ praviṣṭaḥ tāḥ āpaḥ

original: RV_07.050.01.1{17} ā māṃ mitrāvaruṇeha rakṣataṃ kulāyayad viśvayan mā na ā gan
analyzed: ā mām mitrāvaruṇā iha rakṣatam kulāyayat viśvayat mā naḥ ā gan

original: RV_07.050.01.2{17} ajakāvaṃ durdṛśīkaṃ tiro dadhe mā māṃ padyena rapasā vidat tsaruḥ
analyzed: ajakāvam durdṛśīkam tiras dadhe mā mām padyena rapasā vidat tsaruḥ

original: RV_07.050.02.1{17} yad vijāman paruṣi vandanaṃ bhuvadaṣṭhīvantau pari kulphau ca dehat
analyzed: yat vijāman paruṣi vandanam bhuvat aṣṭhīvantau pari kulphau ca dehat

original: RV_07.050.02.2{17} agniṣ ṭacchocannapa bādhatāmito mā māmpadyena ...
analyzed: agniḥ tat śocan apa bādhatām itas mā māmpadyena

original: RV_07.050.03.1{17} yacchalmalau bhavati yan nadīṣu yadoṣadhībhyaḥ pari jāyate viṣam
analyzed: yat śalmalau bhavati yat nadīṣu yat oṣadhībhyaḥ pari jāyate viṣam

original: RV_07.050.03.2{17} viśve devā niritastat suvantu mā māṃ padyena ...
analyzed: viśve devāḥ niḥ itas tat suvantu mā mām padyena

original: RV_07.050.04.1{17} yāḥ pravato nivata udvata udanvatīranudakāśca yāḥ
analyzed: yāḥ pravataḥ nivataḥ udvataḥ udanvatīḥ anudakāḥ ca yāḥ

original: RV_07.050.04.2{17} tā asmabhyaṃ payasā pinvamānāḥ śivā devīraśipadā bhavantu sarvā nadyo aśimidā bhavantu
analyzed: tāḥ asmabhyam payasā pinvamānāḥ śivāḥ devīḥ a śipadāḥ bhavantu sarvāḥ nadyaḥ a śimidāḥ bhavantu

original: RV_07.051.01.1{18} ādityānāmavasā nūtanena sakṣīmahi śarmaṇā śantamena
analyzed: ādityānām avasā nūtanena sakṣīmahi śarmaṇā śantamena

original: RV_07.051.01.2{18} anāgāstve adititve turāsa imaṃ yajñaṃ dadhatu śroṣamāṇāḥ
analyzed: anāgāstve aditi tve turāsaḥ imam yajñam dadhatu śroṣamāṇāḥ

original: RV_07.051.02.1{18} ādityāso aditirmādayantāṃ mitro aryamā varuṇo rajiṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: ādityāsaḥ aditiḥ mādayantām mitraḥ aryamā varuṇaḥ rajiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_07.051.02.2{18} asmākaṃ santu bhuvanasya gopāḥ pibantu somamavase no adya
analyzed: asmākam santu bhuvanasya gopāḥ pibantu somam avase naḥ adya

original: RV_07.051.03.1{18} ādityā viśve marutaśca viśve devāśca viśva ṛbhavaśca viśve
analyzed: ādityāḥ viśve marutaḥ ca viśve devāḥ ca viśve ṛbhavaḥ ca viśve

original: RV_07.051.03.2{18} indro agniraśvinā tuṣṭuvānā yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: indraḥ agniḥ aśvinā tuṣṭuvānāḥ yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.052.01.1{19} ādityāso aditayaḥ syāma pūrdevatrā vasavo martyatrā
analyzed: ādityāsaḥ aditayaḥ syāma pūḥ devatrā vasavaḥ martyatrā

original: RV_07.052.01.2{19} sanema mitrāvaruṇā sananto bhavema dyāvāpṛthivī bhavantaḥ
analyzed: sanema mitrāvaruṇā sanantaḥ bhavema dyāvāpṛthivī bhavantaḥ

original: RV_07.052.02.1{19} mitrastan no varuṇo māmahanta śarma tokāya tanayāya gopāḥ
analyzed: mitraḥ tat naḥ varuṇaḥ māmahanta śarma tokāya tanayāya gopāḥ

original: RV_07.052.02.2{19} mā vo bhujemānyajātameno mā tat karma vasavo yaccayadhve
analyzed: mā vaḥ bhujema anya jāta menaḥ mā tat karma vasavaḥ yat cayadhve

original: RV_07.052.03.1{19} turaṇyavo 'ṅgiraso nakṣanta ratnaṃ devasya savituriyānāḥ
analyzed: turaṇyavaḥ ṅgirasaḥ nakṣanta ratnam devasya savituḥ iyānāḥ

original: RV_07.052.03.2{19} pitā ca tan no mahān yajatro viśve devāḥ samanaso juṣanta
analyzed: pitā ca tat naḥ mahān yajatraḥ viśve devāḥ samanasaḥ juṣanta

original: RV_07.053.01.1{20} pra dyāvā yajñaiḥ pṛthivī namobhiḥ sabādha īḷe bṛhatīyajatre
analyzed: pra dyāvā yajñaiḥ pṛthivī namobhiḥ sabādhas īḍe bṛhatī yajatre

original: RV_07.053.01.2{20} te cid dhi pūrve kavayo gṛṇantaḥ puro mahī dadhire devaputre
analyzed: te cit hi pūrve kavayaḥ gṛṇantaḥ puras mahī dadhire deva putre

original: RV_07.053.02.1{20} pra pūrvaje pitarā navyasībhirgīrbhiḥ kṛṇudhvaṃ sadane ṛtasya
analyzed: pra pūrva je pitarā navyasībhiḥ gīrbhiḥ kṛṇudhvam sadane ṛtasya

original: RV_07.053.02.2{20} ā no dyāvāpṛthivī daivyena janena yātaṃ mahi vāṃ varūtham
analyzed: ā naḥ dyāvāpṛthivī daivyena janena yātam mahi vām varūtham

original: RV_07.053.03.1{20} uto hi vāṃ ratnadheyāni santi purūṇi dyāvāpṛthivī sudāse
analyzed: uta u hi vām ratna dheyāni santi purūṇi dyāvāpṛthivī sudāse

original: RV_07.053.03.2{20} asme dhattaṃ yadasadaskṛdhoyu yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: asme dhattam yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.054.01.1{21} vāstoṣ pate prati jānīhyasmān svāveśo anamīvo bhavā naḥ
analyzed: vāstoḥ pate prati jānīhi asmān su āveśaḥ anamīvaḥ bhava naḥ

original: RV_07.054.01.2{21} yat tvemahe prati tan no juṣasva śaṃ no bhava dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade
analyzed: yat tvā īmahe prati tat naḥ juṣasva śam naḥ bhava dvipade śam catuṣpade

original: RV_07.054.02.1{21} vāstoṣ pate prataraṇo na edhi gayasphāno gobhiraśvebhirindo
analyzed: vāstoḥ pate prataraṇaḥ naḥ edhi gaya sphānaḥ gobhiḥ aśvebhiḥ indo

original: RV_07.054.02.2{21} ajarāsaste sakhye syāma piteva putrān prati no juṣasva
analyzed: ajarāsaḥ te sakhye syāma pitā iva putrān prati naḥ juṣasva

original: RV_07.054.03.1{21} vāstoṣ pate śagmayā saṃsadā te sakṣīmahi raṇvayā gātumatyā
analyzed: vāstoḥ pate śagmayā saṃsadā te sakṣīmahi raṇvayā gātumatyā

original: RV_07.054.03.2{21} pāhi kṣema uta yoge varaṃ no yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: pāhi kṣeme uta yoge varam naḥ yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.055.01.1{22} amīvahā vāstoṣ pate viśvā rūpāṇyāviśan
analyzed: amīva hā vāstoḥ pate viśvā rūpāṇi āviśan

original: RV_07.055.01.2{22} sakhā suśeva edhi naḥ
analyzed: sakhā su śevaḥ edhi naḥ

original: RV_07.055.02.1{22} yadarjuna sārameya dataḥ piśaṅga yachase
analyzed: yat arjuna sārameya dataḥ piśaṅga yacchase

original: RV_07.055.02.2{22} vīva bhrājanta ṛṣṭaya upa srakveṣu bapsato ni ṣu svapa
analyzed: vi iva bhrājante ṛṣṭayaḥ upa srakveṣu bapsataḥ ni su svapa

original: RV_07.055.03.1{22} stenaṃ rāya sārameya taskaraṃ vā punaḥsara
analyzed: stenam rāya sārameya taskaram vā punaḥsara

original: RV_07.055.03.2{22} stotṝnindrasya rāyasi kimasmān duchunāyase ni ṣu svapa
analyzed: stotṝn indrasya rāyasi kim asmān duchunāyase ni su svapa

original: RV_07.055.04.1{22} tvaṃ sūkarasya dardṛhi tava dardartu sūkaraḥ
analyzed: tvam sūkarasya dardṛhi tava dardartu sūkaraḥ

original: RV_07.055.04.2{22} stotṝnindrasya ...
analyzed: stotṝn indrasya

original: RV_07.055.05.1{22} sastu mātā sastu pitā sastu śvā sastu viśpatiḥ
analyzed: sastu mātā sastu pitā sastu śvā sastu viśpatiḥ

original: RV_07.055.05.2{22} sasantu sarve jñātayaḥ sastvayamabhito janaḥ
analyzed: sasantu sarve jñātayaḥ sastu ayam abhitas janaḥ

original: RV_07.055.06.1{22} ya āste yaśca carati yaśca paśyati no janaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ āste yaḥ ca carati yaḥ ca paśyati naḥ janaḥ

original: RV_07.055.06.2{22} teṣāṃsaṃ hanmo akṣāṇi yathedaṃ harmyaṃ tathā
analyzed: teṣām aṃsam hanmaḥ akṣāṇi yathā idam harmyam tathā

original: RV_07.055.07.1{22} sahasraśṛṅgo vṛṣabho yaḥ samudrādudācarat
analyzed: sahasra śṛṅgaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ yaḥ samudrāt udācarat

original: RV_07.055.07.2{22} tenā sahasyenā vayaṃ ni janān svāpayāmasi
analyzed: tena sahasyena vayam ni janān svāpayāmasi

original: RV_07.055.08.1{22} proṣṭhaśayā vahyeśayā nārīryāstalpaśīvarīḥ
analyzed: proṣṭhaśayāḥ vahyeśayāḥ nārīryāḥ talpa śīvarīḥ

original: RV_07.055.08.2{22} striyo yāḥ puṇyagandhāstāḥ sarvāḥ svāpayāmasi
analyzed: striyaḥ yāḥ puṇya gandhāḥ tāḥ sarvāḥ svāpayāmasi

original: RV_07.056.01.1{23} ka īṃ vyaktā naraḥ sanīḷā rudrasya maryā adha svaśvāḥ
analyzed: ke īm vyaktāḥ naraḥ sanīḍāḥ rudrasya maryāḥ adha su aśvāḥ

original: RV_07.056.02.1{23} nakirhyeṣāṃ janūṃṣi veda te aṅga vidre mitho janitram
analyzed: nakir hi eṣām janūṃṣi veda te aṅga vidre mithas janitram

original: RV_07.056.03.1{23} abhi svapūbhirmitho vapanta vātasvanasaḥ śyenā aspṛdhran
analyzed: abhi svapūbhiḥ mithas vapanta vāta svanasaḥ śyenāḥ aspṛdhran

original: RV_07.056.04.1{23} etāni dhīro niṇyā ciketa pṛśniryadūdho mahī jabhāra
analyzed: etāni dhīraḥ niṇyā ciketa pṛśniḥ yat ūdhaḥ mahī jabhāra

original: RV_07.056.05.1{23} sā viṭ suvīrā marudbhirastu sanāt sahantī puṣyantī nṛmṇam
analyzed: sā viś su vīrā marudbhiḥ astu sanāt sahantī puṣyantī nṛmṇam

original: RV_07.056.06.1{23} yāmaṃ yeṣṭhāḥ śubhā śobhiṣṭhāḥ śriyā sammiślā ojobhirugrāḥ
analyzed: yāmam yeṣṭhāḥ śubhā śobhiṣṭhāḥ śriyā sammiślāḥ ojobhiḥ ugrāḥ

original: RV_07.056.07.1{23} ugraṃ va oja sthirā śavāṃsyadhā marudbhirgaṇastuviṣmān
analyzed: ugram vaḥ ojaḥ sthirā śavāṃsi adha marudbhiḥ gaṇaḥ tuviṣmān

original: RV_07.056.08.1{23} śubhro vaḥ śuṣmaḥ krudhmī manāṃsi dhunirmuniriva śardhasya dhṛṣṇoḥ
analyzed: śubhraḥ vaḥ śuṣmaḥ krudhmī manāṃsi dhuniḥ muniḥ iva śardhasya dhṛṣṇoḥ

original: RV_07.056.09.1{23} sanemyasmad yuyota didyuṃ mā vo durmatiriha praṇaṃ naḥ
analyzed: sanemi asmat yuyota didyum mā vaḥ durmatiḥ iha naḥ

original: RV_07.056.10.1{23} priyā vo nāma huve turāṇāmā yat tṛpan maruto vāvaśānāḥ
analyzed: priyā vaḥ nāma huve turāṇām ā yat tṛpat marutaḥ vāvaśānāḥ

original: RV_07.056.11.1{24} svāyudhāsa iṣmiṇaḥ suniṣkā uta svayaṃ tanvaḥ śumbhamānāḥ
analyzed: su āyudhāsaḥ iṣmiṇaḥ su niṣkāḥ uta svayam tanvaḥ śumbhamānāḥ

original: RV_07.056.12.1{24} śucī vo havyā marutaḥ śucīnāṃ śuciṃ hinomyadhvaraṃ śucibhyaḥ
analyzed: śucī vaḥ havyā marutaḥ śucīnām śucim hinomi adhvaram śucibhyaḥ

original: RV_07.056.12.2{24} ṛtena satyam ṛtasāpa āyañchucijanmānaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ
analyzed: ṛtena satyam ṛtasāpaḥ āyan śuci janmānaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ

original: RV_07.056.13.1{24} aṃseṣvā marutaḥ khādayo vo vakṣassu rukmā upaśiśriyāṇāḥ
analyzed: aṃsa iṣvā marutaḥ kha ādayaḥ vaḥ vakṣassu rukmāḥ upaśiśriyāṇāḥ

original: RV_07.056.13.2{24} vi vidyuto na vṛṣṭibhī rucānā anu svadhāmāyudhairyachamānāḥ
analyzed: vi vidyutaḥ na vṛṣṭibhiḥ rucānāḥ anu svadhām āyudhaiḥ yacchamānāḥ

original: RV_07.056.14.1{24} pra budhnyā va īrate mahāṃsi pra nāmāni prayajyavastiradhvam
analyzed: pra budhnyā vaḥ īrate mahāṃsi pra nāmāni prayajyavaḥ tiradhvam

original: RV_07.056.14.2{24} sahasriyaṃ damyaṃ bhāgametaṃ gṛhamedhīyaṃ maruto juṣadhvam
analyzed: sahasriyam damyam bhāgam etam gṛhamedhīyam marutaḥ juṣadhvam

original: RV_07.056.15.1{24} yadi stutasya maruto adhīthetthā viprasya vājino havīman
analyzed: yadi stutasya marutaḥ adhītha itthā viprasya vājinaḥ havīman

original: RV_07.056.15.2{24} makṣū rāyaḥ suvīryasya dāta nū cid yamanya ādabhadarāvā
analyzed: makṣū rāyaḥ su vīryasya dāta nu cit yamanyaḥ ādabhada rāvā

original: RV_07.056.16.1{25} atyāso na ye marutaḥ svañco yakṣadṛśo na śubhayanta maryāḥ
analyzed: atyāsaḥ na ye marutaḥ svañcaḥ yakṣa dṛśaḥ na śubhayanta maryāḥ

original: RV_07.056.16.2{25} te harmyeṣṭhāḥ śiśavo na śubhrā vatsāso na prakrīḷinaḥ payodhāḥ
analyzed: te harmyeṣṭhāḥ śiśavaḥ na śubhrāḥ vatsāsaḥ na prakrīḍinaḥ payodhāḥ

original: RV_07.056.17.1{25} daśasyanto no maruto mṛḷantu varivasyanto rodasī sumeke
analyzed: daśasyantaḥ naḥ marutaḥ mṛḍantu varivasyantaḥ rodasī sumeke

original: RV_07.056.17.2{25} āre gohā nṛhā vadho vo astu sumnebhirasme vasavo namadhvam
analyzed: āre go hā nṛ hā vadhaḥ vaḥ astu sumnebhiḥ asme vasavaḥ namadhvam

original: RV_07.056.18.1{25} ā vo hotā johavīti sattaḥ satrācīṃ rātiṃ maruto gṛṇānaḥ
analyzed: ā vaḥ hotā johavīti sattaḥ satrācīm rātim marutaḥ gṛṇānaḥ

original: RV_07.056.18.2{25} ya īvato vṛṣaṇo asti gopāḥ so advayāvī havate va ukthaiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ īvataḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ asti gopāḥ saḥ advayāvī havate vaḥ ukthaiḥ

original: RV_07.056.19.1{25} ime turaṃ maruto rāmayantīme sahaḥ sahasa ā namanti
analyzed: ime turam marutaḥ rāmayanti ime sahaḥ sahasaḥ ā namanti

original: RV_07.056.19.2{25} imeśaṃsaṃ vanuṣyato ni pānti guru dveṣo araruṣe dadhanti
analyzed: imeśaṃsam vanuṣyataḥ ni pānti guru dveṣaḥ a raruṣe dadhanti

original: RV_07.056.20.1{25} ime radhraṃ cin maruto junanti bhṛmiṃ cid yathā vasavo juṣanta
analyzed: ime radhram cit marutaḥ junanti bhṛmim cit yathā vasavaḥ juṣanta

original: RV_07.056.20.2{25} apa bādhadhvaṃ vṛṣaṇastamāṃsi dhatta viśvaṃ tanaya
analyzed: apa bādhadhvam vṛṣaṇaḥ tamāṃsi dhatta viśvam tanaya

original: RV_07.056.20.1{25} ṃ tokamasme
analyzed: ṃ tokam asme

original: RV_07.056.21.1{26} mā vo dātrān maruto nirarāma mā paścād daghma rathyo vibhāge
analyzed: mā vaḥ dātrāt marutaḥ nirarāma mā paścāt daghma rathyaḥ vibhāge

original: RV_07.056.21.2{26} ā na spārhe bhajatanā vasavye yadīṃ sujātaṃ vṛṣaṇo vo asti
analyzed: ā naḥ spārhe bhajatana vasavye yadīm su jātam vṛṣaṇaḥ vaḥ asti

original: RV_07.056.22.1{26} saṃ yad dhananta manyubhirjanāsaḥ śūrā yahvīṣvoṣadhīṣu vikṣu
analyzed: sam yat hananta manyubhiḥ janāsaḥ śūrāḥ yahvīṣu oṣadhīṣu vikṣu

original: RV_07.056.22.2{26} adha smā no maruto rudriyāsastrātāro bhūta pṛtanāsvaryaḥ
analyzed: adha smā naḥ marutaḥ rudriyāsaḥ trātāraḥ bhūta pṛtanāsvaryaḥ

original: RV_07.056.23.1{26} bhūri cakra marutaḥ pitryāṇyukthāni yā vaḥ śasyante purā cit
analyzed: bhūri cakra marutaḥ pitryāṇi ukthāni yā vaḥ śasyante purā cit

original: RV_07.056.23.2{26} marudbhirugraḥ pṛtanāsu sāḷhā marudbhirit sanitā vājamarvā
analyzed: marudbhiḥ ugraḥ pṛtanāsu sāḷhā marudbhiḥ id sanitā vāja marvā

original: RV_07.056.24.1{26} asme vīro marutaḥ śuṣmyastu janānāṃ yo asuro vidhartā
analyzed: asme vīraḥ marutaḥ śuṣmyaḥ tu janānām yaḥ asuraḥ vidhartā

original: RV_07.056.24.2{26} apo yena sukṣitaye taremādha svamoko abhi vaḥ syāma
analyzed: apaḥ yena su kṣitaye tarema adha sva mokaḥ abhi vaḥ syāma

original: RV_07.056.25.1{26} tan na indro varuṇo mitro agnir...
analyzed: tat naḥ indraḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ agniḥ

original: RV_07.057.01.1{27} madhvo vo nāma mārutaṃ yajatrāḥ pra yajñeṣu śavasā madanti
analyzed: madhvaḥ vaḥ nāma mārutam yajatrāḥ pra yajñeṣu śavasā madanti

original: RV_07.057.01.2{27} ye rejayanti rodasī cidurvī pinvantyutsaṃ yadayāsurugrāḥ
analyzed: ye rejayanti rodasī cit urvī pinvanti utsam yat ayāsuḥ ugrāḥ

original: RV_07.057.02.1{27} nicetāro hi maruto gṛṇantaṃ praṇetāro yajamānasya manma
analyzed: nicetāraḥ hi marutaḥ gṛṇantam praṇetāraḥ yajamānasya manma

original: RV_07.057.02.2{27} asmākamadya vidatheṣu barhirā vītaye sadata pipriyāṇāḥ
analyzed: asmākam adya vidatheṣu barhiḥ ā vītaye sadata pipriyāṇāḥ

original: RV_07.057.03.1{27} naitāvadanye maruto yatheme bhrājante rukmairāyudhaistanūbhiḥ
analyzed: na etāvat anye marutaḥ yathā ime bhrājante rukmaiḥ āyudhaiḥ tanūbhiḥ

original: RV_07.057.03.2{27} ā rodasī viśvapiśaḥ piśānāḥ samānamañjyañjate śubhe kam
analyzed: ā rodasī viśva piśaḥ piśānāḥ samānam añji añjate śubhe kam

original: RV_07.057.04.1{27} ṛdhak sā vo maruto didyudastu yad va āgaḥ puruṣatā karāma
analyzed: ṛdhak sā vaḥ marutaḥ didyut astu yat vaḥ āgaḥ puruṣa tā karāma

original: RV_07.057.04.2{27} mā vastasyāmapi bhūmā yajatrā asme vo astu sumatiścaniṣṭhā
analyzed: mā vaḥ tasyām api bhūma yajatrāḥ asme vaḥ astu sumatiḥ caniṣṭhā

original: RV_07.057.05.1{27} kṛte cidatra maruto raṇantānavadyāsaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ
analyzed: kṛte cit atra marutaḥ raṇanta anavadyāsaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ

original: RV_07.057.05.2{27} pra ṇo 'vata sumatibhiryajatrāḥ pra vājebhistirata puṣyase naḥ
analyzed: pra naḥ vata sumatibhiḥ yajatrāḥ pra vājebhiḥ tirata puṣyase naḥ

original: RV_07.057.06.1{27} uta stutāso maruto vyantu viśvebhirnāmabhirnaro havīṃṣi
analyzed: uta stutāsaḥ marutaḥ vyantu viśvebhiḥ nāmabhiḥ naraḥ havīṃṣi

original: RV_07.057.06.2{27} dadāta no amṛtasya prajāyai jigṛta rāyaḥ sūnṛtā maghāni
analyzed: dadāta naḥ amṛtasya prajāyai jigṛta rāyaḥ sūnṛtāḥ maghāni

original: RV_07.057.07.1{27} ā stutāso maruto viśva ūtī achā sūrīn sarvatātā jigāta
analyzed: ā stutāsaḥ marutaḥ viśve ūtī achā sūrīn sarvatātā jigāta

original: RV_07.057.07.2{27} ye nastmanā śatino vardhayanti yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: ye naḥ tmanā śatinaḥ vardhayanti yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.058.01.1{28} pra sākamukṣe arcatā gaṇāya yo daivyasya dhāmnastuviṣmān
analyzed: pra sākamukṣe arcata gaṇāya yaḥ daivyasya dhāmnaḥ tuviṣmān

original: RV_07.058.01.2{28} uta kṣodanti rodasī mahitvā nakṣante nākaṃ nir{ṛ}teravaṃśāt
analyzed: uta kṣodanti rodasī mahitvā nakṣante nākam nirṛteḥ avaṃśāt

original: RV_07.058.02.1{28} janūścid vo marutastveṣyeṇa bhīmāsastuvimanyavo 'yāsaḥ
analyzed: janūḥ cit vaḥ marutaḥ tveṣyeṇa bhīmāsaḥ tuvi manyavaḥ yāsaḥ

original: RV_07.058.02.2{28} pra ye mahobhirojasota santi viśvo vo yāman bhayate svardṛk
analyzed: pra ye mahobhiḥ ojasā uta santi viśvaḥ vaḥ yāman bhayate svar dṛś

original: RV_07.058.03.1{28} bṛhad vayo maghavadbhyo dadhāta jujoṣannin marutaḥ suṣṭutiṃ naḥ
analyzed: bṛhat vayaḥ maghavadbhyaḥ dadhāta jujoṣan id marutaḥ suṣṭutim naḥ

original: RV_07.058.03.2{28} gato nādhvā vi tirāti jantuṃ pra ṇa spārhābhirūtibhistireta
analyzed: gataḥ na adhvā vi tirāti jantum pra naḥ spārhābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ tireta

original: RV_07.058.04.1{28} yuṣmoto vipro marutaḥ śatasvī yuṣmoto arvā sahuriḥ sahasrī
analyzed: yuṣmotaḥ vipraḥ marutaḥ śatasvī yuṣmotaḥ arvā sahuriḥ sahasrī

original: RV_07.058.04.2{28} yuṣmotaḥ samrāḷ uta hanti vṛtraṃ pra tad vo astu dhūtayo deṣṇam
analyzed: yuṣmotaḥ samrāj uta hanti vṛtram pra tat vaḥ astu dhūtayaḥ deṣṇam

original: RV_07.058.05.1{28} tānā rudrasya mīḷhuṣo vivāse kuvin naṃsante marutaḥ punarnaḥ
analyzed: tānā rudrasya mīḷhuṣaḥ vivāse kuvid naṃsante marutaḥ punar naḥ

original: RV_07.058.05.2{28} yat sasvartā jihīḷire yadāvirava tadena īmahe turāṇām
analyzed: yat sasvartā jihīḍire yat āvirava tat enaḥ īmahe turāṇām

original: RV_07.058.06.1{28} prā sā vāci suṣṭutirmaghonāmidaṃ sūktaṃ maruto juṣanta
analyzed: pra sā vāci suṣṭutiḥ maghonām idam sūktam marutaḥ juṣanta

original: RV_07.058.06.2{28} ārāccid dveṣo vṛṣaṇo yuyota yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: ārāt cit dveṣaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ yuyota yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.059.01.1{29} yaṃ trāyadhva idam-idaṃ devāso yaṃ ca nayatha
analyzed: yam trāyadhve idam idam devāsaḥ yam ca nayatha

original: RV_07.059.01.2{29} tasmā agne varuṇa mitrāryaman marutaḥ śarma yachata
analyzed: tasmai agne varuṇa mitra aryaman marutaḥ śarma yacchata

original: RV_07.059.02.1{29} yuṣmākaṃ devā avasāhani priya ījānastarati dviṣaḥ
analyzed: yuṣmākam devāḥ avasā ahani priye ījānaḥ tarati dviṣaḥ

original: RV_07.059.02.2{29} pra sa kṣayaṃ tirate vi mahīriṣo yo vo varāya dāśati
analyzed: pra sa kṣayam tirate vi mahī riṣaḥ yaḥ vaḥ varāya dāśati

original: RV_07.059.03.1{29} nahi vaścaramaṃ cana vasiṣṭhaḥ parimaṃsate
analyzed: nahi vaḥ caramam cana vasiṣṭhaḥ parimaṃsate

original: RV_07.059.03.2{29} asmākamadya marutaḥ sute sacā viśve pibata kāminaḥ
analyzed: asmākam adya marutaḥ sute sacā viśve pibata kāminaḥ

original: RV_07.059.04.1{29} nahi va ūtiḥ pṛtanāsu mardhati yasmā arādhvaṃ naraḥ
analyzed: nahi vaḥ ūtiḥ pṛtanāsu mardhati yasmai arādhvam naraḥ

original: RV_07.059.04.2{29} abhi va āvart sumatirnavīyasī tūyaṃ yāta pipīṣavaḥ
analyzed: abhi vaḥ āvart sumatiḥ navīyasī tūyam yāta pipīṣavaḥ

original: RV_07.059.05.1{29} o ṣu ghṛṣvirādhaso yātanāndhāṃsi pītaye
analyzed: ā u su ghṛṣvi rādhasaḥ yātana andhāṃsi pītaye

original: RV_07.059.05.2{29} imā vo havyā maruto rare hi kaṃ mo ṣvanyatra gantana
analyzed: imā vaḥ havyā marutaḥ rare hi kam mā u su anyatra gantana

original: RV_07.059.06.1{29} ā ca no barhiḥ sadatāvitā ca na spārhāṇi dātave vasu
analyzed: ā ca naḥ barhiḥ ca naḥ spārhāṇi dātave vasu

original: RV_07.059.06.2{29} asredhanto marutaḥ somye madhau svāheha mādayādhvai
analyzed: a sredhantaḥ marutaḥ somye madhau svāhā iha mādayādhvai

original: RV_07.059.07.1{30} sasvaścid dhi tanvaḥ śumbhamānā ā haṃsāso nīlapṛṣṭhā apaptan
analyzed: sasvaścit hi tanvaḥ śumbhamānāḥ ā haṃsāsaḥ nīla pṛṣṭhāḥ apaptan

original: RV_07.059.07.2{30} viśvaṃ śardho abhito mā ni ṣeda naro na raṇvāḥ savane madantaḥ
analyzed: viśvam śardhaḥ abhitas mā ni seda naraḥ na raṇvāḥ savane madantaḥ

original: RV_07.059.08.1{30} yo no maruto abhi durhṛṇāyustiraścittāni vasavo jighāṃsati
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ marutaḥ abhi durhṛṇāyuḥ tiras cittāni vasavaḥ jighāṃsati

original: RV_07.059.08.2{30} druhaḥ pāśān prati sa mucīṣṭa tapiṣṭhena hanmanāhantanā tam
analyzed: druhaḥ pāśān prati sa mucīṣṭa tapiṣṭhena hanmanā ahantana tam

original: RV_07.059.09.1{30} sāntapanā idaṃ havirmarutastajjujuṣṭana
analyzed: sāntapanāḥ idam haviḥ marutaḥ tat jujuṣṭana

original: RV_07.059.09.2{30} yuṣmākotīriśādasaḥ
analyzed: yuṣmākā ūtīri śādasaḥ

original: RV_07.059.10.1{30} gṛhamedhāsa ā gata maruto māpa bhūtana
analyzed: gṛha medhāsaḥ ā gata marutaḥ mā apa bhūtana

original: RV_07.059.10.2{30} yuṣmākotī sudānavaḥ
analyzed: yuṣmākā ūtī sudānavaḥ

original: RV_07.059.11.1{30} iheha vaḥ svatavasaḥ kavayaḥ sūryatvacaḥ
analyzed: iha iha vaḥ svatavasaḥ kavayaḥ sūrya tvacaḥ

original: RV_07.059.11.2{30} yajñaṃ maruta āvṛṇe
analyzed: yajñam marutaḥ āvṛṇe

original: RV_07.059.12.1{30} tryambakaṃ yajāmahe sugandhiṃ puṣṭivardhanam
analyzed: tryambakam yajāmahe sugandhim puṣṭi vardhanam

original: RV_07.059.12.2{30} urvārukamivabandhanān mṛtyormukṣīya māmṛtāt
analyzed: urvārukam iva bandhanāt mṛtyoḥ mukṣīya mā amṛtāt

original: RV_07.060.01.1{01} yadadya sūrya bravo 'nāgā udyan mitrāya varuṇāya satyam
analyzed: yat adya sūrya bravaḥ nāgāḥ udyan mitrāya varuṇāya satyam

original: RV_07.060.01.2{01} vayaṃ devatrādite syāma tava priyāso aryaman gṛṇantaḥ
analyzed: vayam devatrā adite syāma tava priyāsaḥ aryaman gṛṇantaḥ

original: RV_07.060.02.1{01} eṣa sya mitrāvaruṇā nṛcakṣā ubhe udeti sūryo abhi jman
analyzed: eṣa sya mitrāvaruṇā nṛ cakṣāḥ ubhe udeti sūryaḥ abhi jman

original: RV_07.060.02.2{01} viśvasya sthāturjagataśca gopā ṛju marteṣu vṛjinā capaśyan
analyzed: viśvasya sthātuḥ jagataḥ ca gopāḥ ṛju marteṣu vṛjinā capaśyan

original: RV_07.060.03.1{01} ayukta sapta haritaḥ sadhasthād yā īṃ vahanti sūryaṃ ghṛtācīḥ
analyzed: ayukta sapta haritaḥ sadhasthāt yāḥ īm vahanti sūryam ghṛtācīḥ

original: RV_07.060.03.2{01} dhāmāni mitrāvaruṇā yuvākuḥ saṃ yo yūtheva janimāni caṣṭe
analyzed: dhāmāni mitrāvaruṇā yuvākuḥ sam yaḥ yūthā iva janimāni caṣṭe

original: RV_07.060.04.1{01} ud vāṃ pṛkṣāso madhumanto asthurā sūryo aruhacchukramarṇaḥ
analyzed: ud vām pṛkṣāsaḥ madhumantaḥ asthuḥ ā sūryaḥ aruhat śukramarṇaḥ

original: RV_07.060.04.2{01} yasmā ādityā adhvano radanti mitro aryamā varuṇaḥsajoṣāḥ
analyzed: yasmai ādityāḥ adhvanaḥ radanti mitraḥ aryamā varuṇaḥ sajoṣāḥ

original: RV_07.060.05.1{01} ime cetāro anṛtasya bhūrermitro aryamā varuṇo hi santi
analyzed: ime cetāraḥ anṛtasya bhūreḥ mitraḥ aryamā varuṇaḥ hi santi

original: RV_07.060.05.2{01} ima ṛtasya vāvṛdhurduroṇe śagmāsaḥ putrā aditeradabdhāḥ
analyzed: ime ṛtasya vāvṛdhuḥ duroṇe śagmāsaḥ putrāḥ aditeḥ adabdhāḥ

original: RV_07.060.06.1{01} ime mitro varuṇo dūḷabhāso 'cetasaṃ ciccitayanti dakṣaiḥ
analyzed: ime mitraḥ varuṇaḥ dūḍabhāsaḥ cetasam cit citayanti dakṣaiḥ

original: RV_07.060.06.2{01} api kratuṃ sucetasaṃ vatantastiraścidaṃhaḥ supathānayanti
analyzed: api kratum su cetasam vatantaḥ tiraścit aṃhaḥ su pathā ānayanti

original: RV_07.060.07.1{02} ime divo animiṣā pṛthivyāścikitvāṃso acetasaṃ nayanti
analyzed: ime divaḥ animiṣāḥ pṛthivyāḥ cikitvāṃsaḥ acetasam nayanti

original: RV_07.060.07.2{02} pravrāje cin nadyo gādhamasti pāraṃ no asya viṣpitasya parṣan
analyzed: pravrāje cit nadyaḥ gādham asti pāram naḥ asya viṣpitasya parṣan

original: RV_07.060.08.1{02} yad gopāvadaditiḥ śarma bhadraṃ mitro yachanti varuṇaḥ sudāse
analyzed: yat gopāvat aditiḥ śarma bhadram mitraḥ yacchanti varuṇaḥ sudāse

original: RV_07.060.08.2{02} tasminnā tokaṃ tanayaṃ dadhānā mā karma devaheḷanaṃ turāsaḥ
analyzed: tasmin ā tokam tanayam dadhānāḥ mā karma deva heḍanam turāsaḥ

original: RV_07.060.09.1{02} ava vediṃ hotrābhiryajeta ripaḥ kāścid varuṇadhrutaḥ saḥ
analyzed: ava vedim hotrābhiḥ yajeta ripaḥ kāścid varuṇadhrutaḥ saḥ

original: RV_07.060.09.2{02} pari dveṣobhiraryamā vṛṇaktūruṃ sudāse vṛṣaṇā u lokam
analyzed: pari dveṣobhiḥ aryamā vṛṇaktu urum sudāse vṛṣaṇau u lokam

original: RV_07.060.10.1{02} sasvaścid dhi samṛtistveṣyeṣāmapīcyena sahasā sahante
analyzed: sasvaścit hi samṛtiḥ tveṣī eṣām apīcyena sahasā sahante

original: RV_07.060.10.2{02} yuṣmad bhiyā vṛṣaṇo rejamānā dakṣasya cin mahinā mṛḷatā naḥ
analyzed: yuṣmat bhiyā vṛṣaṇaḥ rejamānāḥ dakṣasya cit mahinā mṛḍata naḥ

original: RV_07.060.11.1{02} yo brahmaṇe sumatimāyajāte vājasya sātau paramasya rāyaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ brahmaṇe sumatim āyajāte vājasya sātau paramasya rāyaḥ

original: RV_07.060.11.2{02} sīkṣanta manyuṃ maghavāno arya uru kṣayāya cakrire sudhātu
analyzed: sīkṣanta manyum maghavānaḥ aryaḥ uru kṣayāya cakrire su dhātu

original: RV_07.060.12.1{02} iyaṃ deva purohitiryuvabhyāṃ yajñeṣu mitrāvaruṇāvakāri
analyzed: iyam deva purohitiḥ yuvabhyām yajñeṣu mitrāvaruṇau akāri

original: RV_07.060.12.2{02} viśvāni durgā pipṛtaṃ tiro no yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: viśvāni durgā pipṛtam tiras naḥ yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.061.01.1{03} ud vāṃ cakṣurvaruṇa supratīkaṃ devayoreti sūryastatanvān
analyzed: ud vām cakṣuḥ varuṇa su pratīkam devayoḥ eti sūryaḥ tatanvān

original: RV_07.061.01.2{03} abhi yo viśvā bhuvanāni caṣṭe sa manyuṃ martyeṣvā ciketa
analyzed: abhi yaḥ viśvā bhuvanāni caṣṭe sa manyum martyeṣvā ciketa

original: RV_07.061.02.1{03} pra vāṃ sa mitrāvaruṇāv ṛtāvā vipro manmāni dīrghaśrudiyarti
analyzed: pra vām sa mitrāvaruṇau ṛtāvā vipraḥ manmāni dīrgha śrut iyarti

original: RV_07.061.02.2{03} yasya brahmāṇi sukratū avātha ā yat kratvā na śaradaḥ pṛṇaithe
analyzed: yasya brahmāṇi su kratū avātha ā yat kratvā na śaradaḥ pṛṇaithe

original: RV_07.061.03.1{03} prorormitrāvaruṇā pṛthivyāḥ pra diva ṛṣvād bṛhataḥ sudānū
analyzed: pra uroḥ mitrāvaruṇā pṛthivyāḥ pra divaḥ ṛṣvāt bṛhataḥ sudānū

original: RV_07.061.03.2{03} spaśo dadhāthe oṣadhīṣu vikṣv ṛdhag yato animiṣaṃrakṣamāṇā
analyzed: spaśaḥ dadhāthe oṣadhīṣu vikṣu ṛdhak yataḥ animiṣam rakṣamāṇā

original: RV_07.061.04.1{03} śaṃsā mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma śuṣmo rodasī badbadhe mahitvā
analyzed: śaṃsā mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma śuṣmaḥ rodasī badbadhe mahitvā

original: RV_07.061.04.2{03} ayan māsā ayajvanāmavīrāḥ pra yajñamanmā vṛjanaṃ tirāte
analyzed: ayan māsāḥ ayajvanām avīrāḥ pra yajña manmā vṛjanam tirāte

original: RV_07.061.05.1{03} amūrā viśvā vṛṣaṇāvimā vāṃ na yāsu citraṃ dadṛśena yakṣam
analyzed: amūrā viśvā vṛṣaṇau imāḥ vām na yāsu citram dadṛśena yakṣam

original: RV_07.061.05.2{03} druhaḥ sacante anṛtā janānāṃ na vāṃ niṇyānyacite abhūvan
analyzed: druhaḥ sacante anṛtāḥ janānām na vām niṇyāni a cite abhūvan

original: RV_07.061.06.1{03} samu vāṃ yajñaṃ mahayaṃ namobhirhuve vāṃ mitrāvaruṇā sabādhaḥ
analyzed: samu vām yajñam mahayam namobhiḥ huve vām mitrāvaruṇā sabādhas

original: RV_07.061.06.2{03} pra vāṃ manmāny ṛcase navāni kṛtāni brahma jujuṣannimāni
analyzed: pra vām manmāni ṛcase navāni kṛtāni brahma jujuṣan imāni

original: RV_07.061.07.1{03} iyaṃ deva purohitir...
analyzed: iyam deva purohitiḥ

original: RV_07.062.01.1{04} ut sūryo bṛhadarcīṃṣyaśret puru viśvā janima mānuṣāṇām
analyzed: ud sūryaḥ bṛhat arcīṃṣi aśret puru viśvā janima mānuṣāṇām

original: RV_07.062.01.2{04} samo divā dadṛśe rocamānaḥ kratvā kṛtaḥ sukṛtaḥkartṛbhirbhūt
analyzed: samaḥ divā dadṛśe rocamānaḥ kratvā kṛtaḥ su kṛtaḥ kartṛbhiḥ bhūt

original: RV_07.062.02.1{04} sa sūrya prati puro na ud gā ebhiḥ stomebhiretaśebhirevaiḥ
analyzed: sa sūrya prati puras naḥ ud gāḥ ebhiḥ stomebhiḥ etaśebhiḥ evaiḥ

original: RV_07.062.02.2{04} pra no mitrāya varuṇāya voco 'nāgaso aryamṇe agnaye ca
analyzed: pra naḥ mitrāya varuṇāya vocaḥ nāgasaḥ aryamṇe agnaye ca

original: RV_07.062.03.1{04} vi naḥ sahasraṃ śurudho radantv ṛtāvāno varuṇo mitro agniḥ
analyzed: vi naḥ sahasram śurudhaḥ radantu ṛtāvānaḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ agniḥ

original: RV_07.062.03.2{04} yachantu candrā upamaṃ no arkamā naḥ kāmaṃ pūpurantustavānāḥ
analyzed: yacchantu candrāḥ upamam naḥ arkam ā naḥ kāmam

original: RV_07.062.04.1{04} dyāvābhūmī adite trāsīthāṃ no ye vāṃ jajñuḥ sujanimāna ṛṣve
analyzed: dyāvābhūmī adite trāsīthām naḥ ye vām jajñuḥ su janimānaḥ ṛṣve

original: RV_07.062.04.2{04} mā heḷe bhūma varuṇasya vāyormā mitrasya priyatamasya nṛṇām
analyzed: mā heḍe bhūma varuṇasya vāyoḥ mā mitrasya priyatamasya nṛṇām

original: RV_07.062.05.1{04} pra bāhavā sisṛtaṃ jīvase na ā no gavyūtimukṣataṃ ghṛtena
analyzed: pra bāhū sisṛtam jīvase naḥ ā naḥ gavyūtim ukṣatam ghṛtena

original: RV_07.062.05.2{04} ā no jane śravayataṃ yuvānā śrutaṃ me mitrāvaruṇā havemā
analyzed: ā naḥ jane śravayatam yuvānā śrutam me mitrāvaruṇā havā imā

original: RV_07.062.06.1{04} nū mitro varuṇo aryamā nastmane tokāya varivo dadhantu
analyzed: nu mitraḥ varuṇaḥ aryamā nastmane tokāya varivaḥ dadhantu

original: RV_07.062.06.2{04} sugā no viśvā supathāni santu yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: sugā naḥ viśvā su pathāni santu yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.063.01.1{05} ud veti subhago viśvacakṣāḥ sādhāraṇaḥ sūryo mānuṣāṇām
analyzed: ud veti subhagaḥ viśva cakṣāḥ sādhāraṇaḥ sūryaḥ mānuṣāṇām

original: RV_07.063.01.2{05} cakṣurmitrasya varuṇasya devaścarmeva yaḥ samavivyak tamāṃsi
analyzed: cakṣuḥ mitrasya varuṇasya devaḥ carma iva yaḥ samavivyak tamāṃsi

original: RV_07.063.02.1{05} ud veti prasavītā janānāṃ mahān keturarṇavaḥ sūryasya
analyzed: ud veti prasavītā janānām mahān ketuḥ arṇavaḥ sūryasya

original: RV_07.063.02.2{05} samānaṃ cakraṃ paryāvivṛtsan yadetaśo vahati dhūrṣu yuktaḥ
analyzed: samānam cakram paryāvivṛtsan yat etaśaḥ vahati dhūrṣu yuktaḥ

original: RV_07.063.03.1{05} vibhrājamāna uṣasāmupasthād rebhairudetyanumadyamānaḥ
analyzed: vibhrājamānaḥ uṣasām upasthāt rebhaiḥ udeti anumadyamānaḥ

original: RV_07.063.03.2{05} eṣa me devaḥ savitā cachanda yaḥ samānaṃ na praminātidhāma
analyzed: eṣa me devaḥ savitā cachanda yaḥ samānam na pramināti dhāma

original: RV_07.063.04.1{05} divo rukma urucakṣā udeti dūrearthastaraṇirbhrājamānaḥ
analyzed: divaḥ rukmaḥ uru cakṣāḥ udeti dūrearthaḥ taraṇiḥ bhrājamānaḥ

original: RV_07.063.04.2{05} nūnaṃ janāḥ sūryeṇa prasūtā ayannarthāni kṛṇavannapāṃsi
analyzed: nūnam janāḥ sūryeṇa prasūtāḥ ayan arthāni kṛṇavan napāṃsi

original: RV_07.063.05.1{05} yatrā cakruramṛtā gātumasmai śyeno na dīyannanveti pāthaḥ
analyzed: yatra cakruḥ amṛtāḥ gātum asmai śyenaḥ na dīyan anveti pāthaḥ

original: RV_07.063.05.2{05} prati vāṃ sūra udite vidhema namobhirmitrāvaruṇota havyaiḥ
analyzed: prati vām sūre udite vidhema namobhiḥ mitrāvaruṇā uta havyaiḥ

original: RV_07.063.06.1{05} nū mitro varuṇo aryamā ...
analyzed: nu mitraḥ varuṇaḥ aryamā

original: RV_07.064.01.1{06} divi kṣayantā rajasaḥ pṛthivyāṃ pra vāṃ ghṛtasya nirṇijodadīran
analyzed: divi kṣayantā rajasaḥ pṛthivyām pra vām ghṛtasya nirṇijā udadīran

original: RV_07.064.01.2{06} havyaṃ no mitro aryamā sujāto rājā sukṣatro varuṇo juṣanta
analyzed: havyam naḥ mitraḥ aryamā su jātaḥ rājā su kṣatraḥ varuṇaḥ juṣanta

original: RV_07.064.02.1{06} ā rājānā maha ṛtasya gopā sindhupatī kṣatriyā yātamarvāk
analyzed: ā rājānā mahaḥ ṛtasya gopā sindhu patī kṣatriyā yātam arvāk

original: RV_07.064.02.2{06} iḷāṃ no mitrāvaruṇota vṛṣṭimava diva invataṃ jīradānū
analyzed: iḍām naḥ mitrāvaruṇā uta vṛṣṭim ava divaḥ invatam jīra dānū

original: RV_07.064.03.1{06} mitrastan no varuṇo devo aryaḥ pra sādhiṣṭhebhiḥ pathibhirnayantu
analyzed: mitraḥ tat naḥ varuṇaḥ devaḥ aryaḥ pra sādhiṣṭhebhiḥ pathibhiḥ nayantu

original: RV_07.064.03.2{06} bravad yathā na ādariḥ sudāsa iṣā madema saha devagopāḥ
analyzed: bravat yathā naḥ ādariḥ sudāse iṣā madema saha deva gopāḥ

original: RV_07.064.04.1{06} yo vāṃ gartaṃ manasā takṣadetamūrdhvāṃ dhītiṃ kṛṇavad dhārayacca
analyzed: yaḥ vām gartam manasā takṣat etam ūrdhvām dhītim kṛṇavat dhārayat ca

original: RV_07.064.04.2{06} ukṣethāṃ mitrāvaruṇā ghṛtena tā rājānāsukṣitīstarpayethām
analyzed: ukṣethām mitrāvaruṇā ghṛtena tāḥ rājānāḥ asu kṣitīḥ tarpayethām

original: RV_07.064.05.1{06} eṣa stomo varuṇa mitra tubhyaṃ somaḥ śukro na vāyave 'yāmi
analyzed: eṣa stomaḥ varuṇa mitra tubhyam somaḥ śukraḥ na vāyave yāmi

original: RV_07.064.05.2{06} aviṣṭaṃ dhiyo jigṛtaṃ puramdhīryūyaṃ pāta
analyzed: aviṣṭam dhiyaḥ jigṛtam puram dhīḥ yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.065.01.1{07} prati vāṃ sūra udite sūktairmitraṃ huve varuṇaṃ pūtadakṣam
analyzed: prati vām sūre udite sūktaiḥ mitram huve varuṇam pūta dakṣam

original: RV_07.065.01.2{07} yayorasuryamakṣitaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ viśvasya yāmannācitā jigatnu
analyzed: yayoḥ asuryam akṣitam jyeṣṭham viśvasya yāman ācitā jigatnu

original: RV_07.065.02.1{07} tā hi devānāmasurā tāvaryā tā naḥ kṣitīḥ karatamūrjayantīḥ
analyzed: tā hi devānām asurā tāvaryā tā naḥ kṣitīḥ karatam ūrjayantīḥ

original: RV_07.065.02.2{07} aśyāma mitrāvaruṇā vayaṃ vāṃ dyāvā ca yatra pīpayannahā ca
analyzed: aśyāma mitrāvaruṇā vayam vām dyāvā ca yatra pīpayan ahā ca

original: RV_07.065.03.1{07} tā bhūripāśāvanṛtasya setū duratyetū ripave martyāya
analyzed: tāḥ bhūri pāśau anṛtasya setū duratyetū ripave martyāya

original: RV_07.065.03.2{07} ṛtasya mitrāvaruṇā pathā vāmapo na nāvā duritā tarema
analyzed: ṛtasya mitrāvaruṇā pathā vām apaḥ na nāvā duritā tarema

original: RV_07.065.04.1{07} ā no mitrāvaruṇā havyajuṣṭiṃ ghṛtairgavyūtimukṣatamiḷābhiḥ
analyzed: ā naḥ mitrāvaruṇāḥ havya juṣṭim ghṛtaiḥ gavyūtim ukṣatam iḷābhiḥ

original: RV_07.065.04.2{07} prati vāmatra varamā janāya pṛṇītamudno divyasya cāroḥ
analyzed: prati vām atra varamā janāya pṛṇītam udnaḥ divyasya cāroḥ

original: RV_07.065.05.1{07} eṣa stomo varuṇa mitra ...
analyzed: eṣa stomaḥ varuṇa mitra

original: RV_07.066.01.1{08} pra mitrayorvaruṇayoḥ stomo na etu śūṣyaḥ
analyzed: pra mitrayoḥ varuṇayoḥ stomaḥ naḥ etu śūṣyaḥ

original: RV_07.066.01.2{08} namasvān tuvijātayoḥ
analyzed: namasvān tuvi jātayoḥ

original: RV_07.066.02.1{08} yā dhārayanta devāḥ sudakṣā dakṣapitarā
analyzed: yā dhārayanta devāḥ su dakṣā dakṣa pitarā

original: RV_07.066.02.2{08} asuryāya pramahasā
analyzed: asuryāya pramahasā

original: RV_07.066.03.1{08} tā na stipā tanūpā varuṇa jaritṝṇām
analyzed: tā naḥ stipā tanū pā varuṇa jaritṝṇām

original: RV_07.066.03.2{08} mitra sādhayataṃ dhiyaḥ
analyzed: mitra sādhayatam dhiyaḥ

original: RV_07.066.04.1{08} yadadya sūra udite 'nāgā mitro aryamā
analyzed: yat adya sūre udite nāgāḥ mitraḥ aryamā

original: RV_07.066.04.2{08} suvāti savitābhagaḥ
analyzed: suvāti savitā abhagaḥ

original: RV_07.066.05.1{08} suprāvīrastu sa kṣayaḥ pra nu yāman sudānavaḥ
analyzed: su prāvīraḥ tu sa kṣayaḥ pra nu yāman sudānavaḥ

original: RV_07.066.05.2{08} ye no aṃho 'tipiprati
analyzed: ye naḥ aṃhaḥ tipiprati

original: RV_07.066.06.1{09} uta svarājo aditiradabdhasya vratasya ye
analyzed: uta sva rājaḥ aditiḥ adabdhasya vratasya ye

original: RV_07.066.06.2{09} maho rājāna īśate
analyzed: mahaḥ rājānaḥ īśate

original: RV_07.066.07.1{09} prati vāṃ sūra udite mitraṃ gṛṇīṣe varuṇam
analyzed: prati vām sūre udite mitram gṛṇīṣe varuṇam

original: RV_07.066.07.2{09} aryamaṇaṃriśādasam
analyzed: aryamaṇam riśādasam

original: RV_07.066.08.1{09} rāyā hiraṇyayā matiriyamavṛkāya śavase
analyzed: rāyā hiraṇyayā matiḥ iyam avṛkāya śavase

original: RV_07.066.08.2{09} iyaṃ viprāmedhasātaye
analyzed: iyam viprā medha sātaye

original: RV_07.066.09.1{09} te syāma deva varuṇa te mitra sūribhiḥ saha
analyzed: te syāma deva varuṇa te mitra sūribhiḥ saha

original: RV_07.066.09.2{09} iṣaṃ svaśca dhīmahi
analyzed: iṣam svar ca dhīmahi

original: RV_07.066.10.1{09} bahavaḥ sūracakṣaso 'gnijihvā ṛtāvṛdhaḥ
analyzed: bahavaḥ sūra cakṣasaḥ gni jihvāḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ

original: RV_07.066.10.2{09} trīṇi ye yemurvidathāni dhītibhirviśvāni paribhūtibhiḥ
analyzed: trīṇi ye yemuḥ vidathāni dhītibhiḥ viśvāni paribhūtibhiḥ

original: RV_07.066.11.1{10} vi ye dadhuḥ śaradaṃ māsamādaharyajñamaktuṃ cād ṛcam
analyzed: vi ye dadhuḥ śaradam māsam āt aharyajñam aktum ca āt ṛcam

original: RV_07.066.11.2{10} anāpyaṃ varuṇo mitro aryamā kṣatraṃ rājāna āśata
analyzed: an āpyam varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā kṣatram rājānaḥ āśata

original: RV_07.066.12.1{10} tad vo adya manāmahe sūktaiḥ sūra udite
analyzed: tat vaḥ adya manāmahe sūktaiḥ sūre udite

original: RV_07.066.12.2{10} yadohate varuṇo mitro aryamā yūyam ṛtasya rathyaḥ
analyzed: yadā ūhate varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā yūyam ṛtasya rathyaḥ

original: RV_07.066.13.1{10} ṛtāvāna ṛtajātā ṛtāvṛdho ghorāso anṛtadviṣaḥ
analyzed: ṛtāvānaḥ ṛta jātāḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ ghorāsaḥ anṛta dviṣaḥ

original: RV_07.066.13.2{10} teṣāṃvaḥ sumne suchardiṣṭame naraḥ syāma ye ca sūrayaḥ
analyzed: teṣām vaḥ sumne su chardiṣṭame naraḥ syāma ye ca sūrayaḥ

original: RV_07.066.14.1{10} udu tyad darśataṃ vapurdiva eti pratihvare
analyzed: udu tyad darśatam vapuḥ divaḥ eti pratihvare

original: RV_07.066.14.2{10} yadīmāśurvahati deva etaśo viśvasmai cakṣase aram
analyzed: yadi imā āśuḥ vahati devaḥ etaśaḥ viśvasmai cakṣase aram

original: RV_07.066.15.1{10} śīrṣṇaḥ-śīrṣṇo jagatastasthuṣas patiṃ samayā viśvamā rajaḥ
analyzed: śīrṣṇaḥ śīrṣṇaḥ jagataḥ tasthuṣaḥ patim samayā viśvamā rajaḥ

original: RV_07.066.15.2{10} sapta svasāraḥ suvitāya sūryaṃ vahanti harito rathe
analyzed: sapta svasāraḥ suvitāya sūryam vahanti haritaḥ rathe

original: RV_07.066.16.1{11} taccakṣurdevahitaṃ śukramuccarat
analyzed: tat cakṣuḥ deva hitam śukram uccarat

original: RV_07.066.16.2{11} paśyema śaradaḥ śataṃ jīvema śaradaḥ śatam
analyzed: paśyema śaradaḥ śatam jīvema śaradaḥ śatam

original: RV_07.066.17.1{11} kāvyebhiradābhyā yātaṃ varuṇa dyumat
analyzed: kāvyebhiḥ adābhyā yātam varuṇa dyumat

original: RV_07.066.17.2{11} mitraśca somapītaye
analyzed: mitraḥ ca soma pītaye

original: RV_07.066.18.1{11} divo dhāmabhirvaruṇa mitraścā yātamadruhā
analyzed: divaḥ dhāmabhiḥ varuṇa mitraścā yātam adruhā

original: RV_07.066.18.2{11} pibataṃ somamātujī
analyzed: pibatam soma mātujī

original: RV_07.066.19.1{11} ā yātaṃ mitrāvaruṇā juṣāṇāvāhutiṃ narā
analyzed: ā yātam mitrāvaruṇā juṣāṇau āhutim narā

original: RV_07.066.19.2{11} pātaṃ somam ṛtāvṛdhā
analyzed: pātam somam ṛtāvṛdhā

original: RV_07.067.01.1{12} prati vāṃ rathaṃ nṛpatī jaradhyai haviṣmatā manasā yajñiyena
analyzed: prati vām ratham nṛpatī jaradhyai haviṣmatā manasā yajñiyena

original: RV_07.067.01.2{12} yo vāṃ dūto na dhiṣṇyāvajīgarachā sūnurna pitarā vivakmi
analyzed: yaḥ vām dūtaḥ na dhiṣṇya avajīgarathā sūnuḥ na pitarā vivakmi

original: RV_07.067.02.1{12} aśocyagniḥ samidhāno asme upo adṛśran tamasaścidantāḥ
analyzed: aśoci agniḥ samidhānaḥ asme upa u adṛśran tamasaḥ cit antāḥ

original: RV_07.067.02.2{12} aceti keturuṣasaḥ purastācchriye divo duhiturjāyamānaḥ
analyzed: aceti ketuḥ uṣasaḥ purastāt śriye divaḥ duhituḥ jāyamānaḥ

original: RV_07.067.03.1{12} abhi vāṃ nūnamaśvinā suhotā stomaiḥ siṣakti nāsatyā vivakvān
analyzed: abhi vām nūnam aśvinā su hotā stomaiḥ siṣakti nāsatyāḥ vivakvān

original: RV_07.067.03.2{12} pūrvībhiryātaṃ pathyābhirarvāk svarvidā vasumatā rathena
