analyzed: pūrvībhiḥ yātam pathyābhiḥ arvāk svarvidā vasumatā rathena

original: RV_07.067.04.1{12} avorvāṃ nūnamaśvinā yuvākurhuve yad vāṃ sute mādhvīvasūyuḥ
analyzed: ava urvām nūnam aśvinā yuvākuḥ huve yat vām sute mādhvīvasūyuḥ

original: RV_07.067.04.2{12} ā vāṃ vahantu sthavirāso aśvāḥ pibātho asmesuṣutā madhūni
analyzed: ā vām vahantu sthavirāsaḥ aśvāḥ pibāthaḥ asmesuṣutā madhūni

original: RV_07.067.05.1{12} prācīmu devāśvinā dhiyaṃ me 'mṛdhrāṃ sātaye kṛtaṃ vasūyum
analyzed: prācīm u devā aśvinā dhiyam me mṛdhrām sātaye kṛtam vasūyum

original: RV_07.067.05.2{12} viśvā aviṣṭaṃ vāja ā purandhīstā naḥ śaktaṃ śacīpatī śacībhiḥ
analyzed: viśvāḥ aviṣṭam vāje ā purandhīḥ tāḥ naḥ śaktam śacīpatī śacībhiḥ

original: RV_07.067.06.1{13} aviṣṭaṃ dhīṣvaśvinā na āsu prajāvad reto ahrayaṃ no astu
analyzed: aviṣṭam dhīṣu aśvinā naḥ āsu prajāvat retaḥ ahrayam naḥ astu

original: RV_07.067.06.2{13} ā vāṃ toke tanaye tūtujānāḥ suratnāso devavītiṃgamema
analyzed: ā vām toke tanaye tūtujānāḥ su ratnāsaḥ deva vītiṃgamema

original: RV_07.067.07.1{13} eṣa sya vāṃ pūrvagatveva sakhye nidhirhito mādhvī rāto asme
analyzed: eṣa sya vām pūrva gatvā iva sakhye nidhiḥ hitaḥ mādhvī rātaḥ asme

original: RV_07.067.07.2{13} aheḷatā manasā yātamarvāgaśnantā havyaṃ mānuṣīṣu vikṣu
analyzed: a heḍatā manasā yātam arvāk aśnantā havyam mānuṣīṣu vikṣu

original: RV_07.067.08.1{13} ekasmin yoge bhuraṇā samāne pari vāṃ sapta sravato ratho gāt
analyzed: ekasmin yoge bhuraṇā samāne pari vām sapta sravataḥ rathaḥ gāt

original: RV_07.067.08.2{13} na vāyanti subhvo devayuktā ye vāṃ dhūrṣu taraṇayovahanti
analyzed: na vāyanti su bhvaḥ deva yuktāḥ ye vām dhūrṣu taraṇayaḥ vahanti

original: RV_07.067.09.1{13} asaścatā maghavadbhyo hi bhūtaṃ ye rāyā maghadeyaṃ junanti
analyzed: asaścatā maghavadbhyaḥ hi bhūtam ye rāyā magha deyam junanti

original: RV_07.067.09.2{13} pra ye bandhuṃ sūnṛtābhistirante gavyā pṛñcanto aśvyā maghāni
analyzed: pra ye bandhum sūnṛtābhiḥ tirante gavyā pṛñcantaḥ aśvyā maghāni

original: RV_07.067.10.1{13} nū me havamā śṛṇutaṃ yuvānā yāsiṣṭaṃ vartiraśvināvirāvat
analyzed: nu me havam ā śṛṇutam yuvānā yāsiṣṭam vartiḥ aśvinā virāvat

original: RV_07.067.10.2{13} dhattaṃ ratnāni jarataṃ ca sūrīn yūyaṃ pāta .. .
analyzed: dhattam ratnāni jaratam ca sūrīn yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.068.01.1{14} ā śubhrā yātamaśvinā svaśvā giro dasrā jujuṣāṇā yuvākoḥ
analyzed: ā śubhrā yātam aśvinā su aśvā giraḥ dasrā jujuṣāṇā yuvākoḥ

original: RV_07.068.01.2{14} havyāni ca pratibhṛtā vītaṃ naḥ
analyzed: havyāni ca pratibhṛtā vītam naḥ

original: RV_07.068.02.1{14} pra vāmandhāṃsi madyānyasthuraraṃ gantaṃ haviṣo vītaye me
analyzed: pra vām andhāṃsi madyāni asthuḥ aram gantam haviṣaḥ vītaye me

original: RV_07.068.02.2{14} tiro aryo havanāni śrutaṃ naḥ
analyzed: tiras aryaḥ havanāni śrutam naḥ

original: RV_07.068.03.1{14} pra vāṃ ratho manojavā iyarti tiro rajāṃsyaśvinā śatotiḥ
analyzed: pra vām rathaḥ manaḥ javāḥ iyarti tiras rajāṃsi aśvinā śata ūtiḥ

original: RV_07.068.03.2{14} asmabhyaṃ sūryāvasū iyānaḥ
analyzed: asmabhyam sūryāvasū iyānaḥ

original: RV_07.068.04.1{14} ayaṃ ha yad vāṃ devayā u adrirūrdhvo vivakti somasud yuvabhyām
analyzed: ayam ha yat vām deva yāḥ u adriḥ ūrdhvaḥ vivakti soma sut yuvabhyām

original: RV_07.068.04.2{14} ā valgū vipro vavṛtīta havyaiḥ
analyzed: ā valgū vipraḥ havyaiḥ

original: RV_07.068.05.1{14} citraṃ ha yad vāṃ bhojanaṃ nvasti nyatraye mahiṣvantaṃ yuyotam
analyzed: citram ha yat vām bhojanam nu asti nyatraye mahiṣvantam yuyotam

original: RV_07.068.05.2{14} yo vāmomānaṃ dadhate priyaḥ san
analyzed: yaḥ vāmomānam dadhate priyaḥ san

original: RV_07.068.06.1{15} uta tyad vāṃ jurate aśvinā bhūccyavānāya pratītyaṃ havirde
analyzed: uta tyad vām jurate aśvinā bhūt cyavānāya pratītyam haviḥ de

original: RV_07.068.06.2{15} adhi yad varpa itaūti dhatthaḥ
analyzed: adhi yat varpaḥ itaūti dhatthaḥ

original: RV_07.068.07.1{15} uta tyaṃ bhujyumaśvinā sakhāyo madhye jahurdurevāsaḥ samudre
analyzed: uta tyam bhujyum aśvinā sakhāyaḥ madhye jahuḥ durevāsaḥ samudre

original: RV_07.068.07.2{15} nirīṃ parṣadarāvā yo yuvākuḥ
analyzed: niḥ īm parṣadarāvā yaḥ yuvākuḥ

original: RV_07.068.08.1{15} vṛkāya cijjasamānāya śaktamuta śrutaṃ śayave hūyamānā
analyzed: vṛkāya cit jasamānāya śaktam uta śrutam śayave hūyamānā

original: RV_07.068.08.2{15} yāvaghnyāmapinvatamapo na staryaṃ cicchaktyaśvināśacībhiḥ
analyzed: yau aghnyām apinvatam apaḥ naḥ staryam cit śakti aśvinā aśacībhiḥ

original: RV_07.068.09.1{15} eṣa sya kārurjarate sūktairagre budhāna uṣasāṃ sumanmā
analyzed: eṣa sya kāruḥ jarate sūktaiḥ agre budhānaḥ uṣasām su manmā

original: RV_07.068.09.2{15} iṣā taṃ vardhadaghnyā payobhiryūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: iṣā tam vardhat aghnyā payobhiḥ yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.069.01.1{16} ā vāṃ ratho rodasī badbadhāno hiraṇyayo vṛṣabhiryātvaśvaiḥ
analyzed: ā vām rathaḥ rodasī badbadhānaḥ hiraṇyayaḥ vṛṣabhiḥ yātu aśvaiḥ

original: RV_07.069.01.2{16} ghṛtavartaniḥ pavibhī rucāna iṣāṃ voḷhā nṛpatirvājinīvān
analyzed: ghṛta vartaniḥ pavibhiḥ rucānaḥ iṣām voḷhā nṛpatiḥ vājinīvān

original: RV_07.069.02.1{16} sa paprathāno abhi pañca bhūmā trivandhuro manasā yātu yuktaḥ
analyzed: sa paprathānaḥ abhi pañca bhūmā tri vandhuraḥ manasā yātu yuktaḥ

original: RV_07.069.02.2{16} viśo yena gachatho devayantīḥ kutrā cid yāmamaśvinā dadhānā
analyzed: viśaḥ yena gacchathaḥ devayantīḥ kutra cit yāmam aśvinā dadhānā

original: RV_07.069.03.1{16} svaśvā yaśasā yātamarvāg dasrā nidhiṃ madhumantaṃ pibāthaḥ
analyzed: su aśvā yaśasā yātam arvāk dasrā nidhim madhumantam pibāthaḥ

original: RV_07.069.03.2{16} vi vāṃ ratho vadhvā yādamāno 'ntān divo bādhate vartanibhyām
analyzed: vi vām rathaḥ vadhvā yādamānaḥ ntān divaḥ bādhate vartanibhyām

original: RV_07.069.04.1{16} yuvoḥ śriyaṃ pari yoṣāvṛṇīta sūro duhitā paritakmyāyām
analyzed: yuvoḥ śriyam pari yoṣā vṛṇīta sūraḥ duhitā paritakmyāyām

original: RV_07.069.04.2{16} yad devayantamavathaḥ śacībhiḥ pari ghraṃsamomanā vāṃ vayo gāt
analyzed: yat devayantam avathaḥ śacībhiḥ pari ghraṃsam omanā vām vayaḥ gāt

original: RV_07.069.05.1{16} yo ha sya vāṃ rathirā vasta usrā ratho yujānaḥ pariyātivartiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ha sya vām rathirā usrā rathaḥ yujānaḥ pariyāti vartiḥ

original: RV_07.069.05.2{16} tena naḥ śaṃ yoruṣaso vyuṣṭau nyaśvinā vahataṃ yajñe asmin
analyzed: tena naḥ śam yā uruṣasaḥ vyuṣṭau ni aśvinā vahatam yajñe asmin

original: RV_07.069.06.1{16} narā gaureva vidyutaṃ tṛṣāṇāsmākamadya savanopa yātam
analyzed: narā gaurā iva vidyutam tṛṣāṇā asmākam adya savanā upa yātam

original: RV_07.069.06.2{16} purutrā hi vāṃ matibhirhavante mā vāmanye ni yaman devayantaḥ
analyzed: purutrā hi vām matibhiḥ havante mā vāmanye ni yaman devayantaḥ

original: RV_07.069.07.1{16} yuvaṃ bhujyumavaviddhaṃ samudra udūhathurarṇaso asridhānaiḥ
analyzed: yuvam bhujyum avaviddham samudre udūhathuḥ arṇasaḥ a sridhānaiḥ

original: RV_07.069.07.2{16} patatribhiraśramairavyathibhirdaṃsanābhiraśvinā pārayantā
analyzed: patatribhiḥ aśramaiḥ avyathibhiḥ daṃsanābhiḥ aśvinā pārayantā

original: RV_07.069.08.1{16} nū me havamā śṛṇutaṃ yuvānā ...
analyzed: nu me havamā śṛṇutam yuvānā

original: RV_07.070.01.1{17} ā viśvavārāśvinā gataṃ naḥ pra tat sthānamavāci vāṃ pṛthivyām
analyzed: ā viśva vārā aśvinā gatam naḥ pra tat sthānam avāci vām pṛthivyām

original: RV_07.070.01.2{17} aśvo na vājī śunapṛṣṭho asthādā yat sedathurdhruvase na yonim
analyzed: aśvaḥ na vājī śuna pṛṣṭhaḥ asthāt ā yat sedathuḥ dhruvase na yonim

original: RV_07.070.02.1{17} siṣakti sā vāṃ sumatiścaniṣṭhātāpi gharmo manuṣo duroṇe
analyzed: siṣakti sā vām sumatiḥ caniṣṭhā atāpi gharmaḥ manuṣaḥ duroṇe

original: RV_07.070.02.2{17} yo vāṃ samudrān saritaḥ pipartyetagvā cin na suyujā yujānaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ vām samudrān saritaḥ piparti etagvā cit na su yujā yujānaḥ

original: RV_07.070.03.1{17} yāni sthānānyaśvinā dadhāthe divo yahvīṣvoṣadhīṣu vikṣu
analyzed: yāni sthānāni aśvinā dadhāthe divaḥ yahvīṣu oṣadhīṣu vikṣu

original: RV_07.070.03.2{17} ni parvatasya mūrdhani sadanteṣaṃ janāya dāśuṣevahantā
analyzed: ni parvatasya mūrdhani sadantā iṣam janāya dāśuṣe iva hantā

original: RV_07.070.04.1{17} caniṣṭaṃ devā oṣadhīṣvapsu yad yogyā aśnavaithe ṛṣīṇām
analyzed: caniṣṭam devau oṣadhīṣu apsu yat yogyā aśnavaithe ṛṣīṇām

original: RV_07.070.04.2{17} purūṇi ratnā dadhatau nyasme anu pūrvāṇi cakhyathuryugāni
analyzed: purūṇi ratnā dadhatau nyasme anu pūrvāṇi cakhyathuḥ yugāni

original: RV_07.070.05.1{17} śuśruvāṃsā cidaśvinā purūṇyabhi brahmāṇi cakṣāthe ṛṣīṇām
analyzed: śuśruvāṃsā cit aśvinā purūṇi abhi brahmāṇi cakṣāthe ṛṣīṇām

original: RV_07.070.05.2{17} prati pra yātaṃ varamā janāyāsme vāmastu sumatiścaniṣṭhā
analyzed: prati pra yātam varamā janāya asme vām astu sumatiḥ caniṣṭhā

original: RV_07.070.06.1{17} yo vāṃ yajño nāsatyā haviṣmān kṛtabrahmā samaryo bhavāti
analyzed: yaḥ vām yajñaḥ nāsatyāḥ haviṣmān kṛta brahmā samaryaḥ bhavāti

original: RV_07.070.06.2{17} upa pra yātaṃ varamā vasiṣṭhamimā brahmāṇy ṛcyante yuvabhyām
analyzed: upa pra yātam varamā vasiṣṭham imā brahmāṇi ṛcyante yuvabhyām

original: RV_07.070.07.1{17} iyaṃ manīṣā iyamaśvinā gīrimāṃ suvṛktiṃ vṛṣaṇā juṣethām
analyzed: iyam manīṣā iyam aśvinā gīḥ imām suvṛktim vṛṣaṇā juṣethām

original: RV_07.070.07.2{17} imā brahmāṇi yuvayūnyagman yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: imā brahmāṇi yuvayūni agman yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.071.01.1{18} apa svasuruṣaso nag jihīte riṇakti kṛṣṇīraruṣāya panthām
analyzed: apa svasuḥ uṣasaḥ nak jihīte riṇakti kṛṣṇīḥ aruṣāya panthām

original: RV_07.071.01.2{18} aśvāmaghā gomaghā vāṃ huvema divā naktaṃ śarumasmad yuyotam
analyzed: aśvāmaghāḥ go maghāḥ vām huvema divā naktam śarum asmat yuyotam

original: RV_07.071.02.1{18} upāyātaṃ dāśuṣe martyāya rathena vāmamaśvinā vahantā
analyzed: upāyātam dāśuṣe martyāya rathena vāmam aśvinā vahantā

original: RV_07.071.02.2{18} yuyutamasmadanirāmamīvāṃ divā naktaṃ mādhvī trāsithāṃ naḥ
analyzed: yuyutam asmad anirām amīvām divā naktam mādhvī trāsithām naḥ

original: RV_07.071.03.1{18} ā vāṃ rathamavamasyāṃ vyuṣṭau sumnāyavo vṛṣaṇo vartayantu
analyzed: ā vām ratham avamasyām vyuṣṭau sumnāyavaḥ vṛṣaṇaḥ vartayantu

original: RV_07.071.03.2{18} syūmagabhastim ṛtayugbhiraśvairāśvinā vasumantaṃ vahethām
analyzed: syūma gabhastim ṛta yugbhiḥ aśvaiḥ āśvinā vasumantam vahethām

original: RV_07.071.04.1{18} yo vāṃ ratho nṛpatī asti voḷhā trivandhuro vasumānusrayāmā
analyzed: yaḥ vām rathaḥ nṛpatī asti voḍhā tri vandhuraḥ vasumān usra yāmā

original: RV_07.071.04.2{18} ā na enā nāsatyopa yātamabhi yad vāṃ viśvapsnyo jigāti
analyzed: ā naḥ enā nāsatyā upa yātam abhi yat vām viśvapsnyaḥ jigāti

original: RV_07.071.05.1{18} yuvaṃ cyavānaṃ jaraso 'mumuktaṃ ni pedava ūhathurāśumaśvam
analyzed: yuvam cyavānam jarasaḥ mumuktam ni pedavaḥ ūhathuḥ āśum aśvam

original: RV_07.071.05.2{18} niraṃhasastamasa spartamatriṃ ni jāhuṣaṃ śithire dhātamantaḥ
analyzed: niraṃhasaḥ tamasaḥ spartam atrim ni jāhuṣam śithire dhātam antar

original: RV_07.071.06.1{18} iyaṃ manīṣā iyamaśvinā gīr...
analyzed: iyam manīṣā iyam aśvinā gīḥ

original: RV_07.072.01.1{19} ā gomatā nāsatyā rathenāśvāvatā puruścandreṇa yātam
analyzed: ā gomatā nāsatyā rathena aśvāvatā puru ścandreṇa yātam

original: RV_07.072.01.2{19} abhi vāṃ viśvā niyutaḥ sacante spārhayā śriyā tanvā śubhānā
analyzed: abhi vām viśvāḥ niyutaḥ sacante spārhayā śriyā tanvā śubhānā

original: RV_07.072.02.1{19} ā no devebhirupa yātamarvāk sajoṣasā nāsatyā rathena
analyzed: ā naḥ devebhiḥ upa yātam arvāk sajoṣasā nāsatyā rathena

original: RV_07.072.02.2{19} yuvorhi naḥ sakhyā pitryāṇi samāno bandhuruta tasya vittam
analyzed: yuvoḥ hi naḥ sakhyā pitryāṇi samānaḥ bandhuḥ uta tasya vittam

original: RV_07.072.03.1{19} udu stomāso aśvinorabudhrañ jāmi brahmāṇyuṣasaśca devīḥ
analyzed: udu stomāsaḥ aśvinoḥ abudhram jāmi brahmāṇi uṣasaḥ ca devīḥ

original: RV_07.072.03.2{19} āvivāsan rodasī dhiṣṇyeme achā vipro nāsatyā vivakti
analyzed: āvivāsan rodasī dhiṣṇyā ime achā vipraḥ nāsatyā vivakti

original: RV_07.072.04.1{19} vi ceduchantyaśvinā uṣāsaḥ pra vāṃ brahmāṇi kāravo bharante
analyzed: vi ced ucchanti aśvinau uṣāsaḥ pra vām brahmāṇi kāravaḥ bharante

original: RV_07.072.04.2{19} ūrdhvaṃ bhānuṃ savitā devo aśred bṛhadagnayaḥ samidhā jarante
analyzed: ūrdhvam bhānum savitā devaḥ aśret bṛhat agnayaḥ samidhā jarante

original: RV_07.072.05.1{19} ā paścātān nāsatyā purastādāśvinā yātamadharādudaktāt
analyzed: ā paścātāt nāsatyā purastāt āśvinā yātam adharāt udaktāt

original: RV_07.072.05.2{19} ā viśvataḥ pāñcajanyena rāyā yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: ā viśvatas pāñcajanyena rāyā yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.073.01.1{20} atāriṣma tamasas pāramasya prati stomaṃ devayanto dadhānāḥ
analyzed: atāriṣma tamasaḥ pāramasya prati stomam devayantaḥ dadhānāḥ

original: RV_07.073.01.2{20} purudaṃsā purutamā purājāmartyā havate aśvinā gīḥ
analyzed: purudaṃsā purutamā purājā amartyā havate aśvinā gīḥ

original: RV_07.073.02.1{20} nyu priyo manuṣaḥ sādi hotā nāsatyā yo yajate vandate ca
analyzed: niḥ priyaḥ manuṣaḥ sādi hotā nāsatyā yaḥ yajate vandate ca

original: RV_07.073.02.2{20} aśnītaṃ madhvo aśvinā upāka ā vāṃ voce vidatheṣu prayasvān
analyzed: aśnītam madhvaḥ aśvinau upāke ā vām voce vidatheṣu prayasvān

original: RV_07.073.03.1{20} ahema yajñaṃ pathāmurāṇā imāṃ suvṛktiṃ vṛṣaṇā juṣethām
analyzed: ahema yajñam pathā amurāṇāḥ imām suvṛktim vṛṣaṇā juṣethām

original: RV_07.073.03.2{20} śruṣṭīveva preṣito vāmabodhi prati stomairjaramāṇo vasiṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: śruṣṭīvā iva preṣitaḥ vāma bodhi prati stomaiḥ jaramāṇaḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_07.073.04.1{20} upa tyā vahnī gamato viśaṃ no rakṣohaṇā sambhṛtā vīḷupāṇī
analyzed: upa tyā vahnī gamataḥ viśam naḥ rakṣaḥ haṇā sambhṛtā vīḍu pāṇī

original: RV_07.073.04.2{20} samandhāṃsyagmata matsarāṇi mā no mardhiṣṭamā gataṃ śivena
analyzed: sam andhāṃsi agmata matsarāṇi mā naḥ mardhiṣṭama ā gatam śivena

original: RV_07.073.05.1{20} ā paścātān nāsatyā purastād ...
analyzed: ā paścātāt nāsatyā purastāt

original: RV_07.074.01.1{21} imā u vāṃ diviṣṭaya usrā havante aśvinā
analyzed: imāḥ u vām diviṣṭayaḥ usrā havante aśvinā

original: RV_07.074.01.2{21} ayaṃ vāmahve 'vase śacīvasū viśaṃ-viśaṃ hi gachathaḥ
analyzed: ayam vām mahve vase śacī vasū viśam viśam hi gachathaḥ

original: RV_07.074.02.1{21} yuvaṃ citraṃ dadathurbhojanaṃ narā codethāṃ sūnṛtāvate
analyzed: yuvam citram dadathuḥ bhojanam narā codethām sūnṛtāvate

original: RV_07.074.02.2{21} arvāg rathaṃ samanasā ni yachataṃ pibataṃ somyaṃ madhu
analyzed: arvāk ratham samanasā ni yacchatam pibatam somyam madhu

original: RV_07.074.03.1{21} ā yātamupa bhūṣataṃ madhvaḥ pibatamaśvinā
analyzed: ā yātam upa bhūṣatam madhvaḥ pibatam aśvinā

original: RV_07.074.03.2{21} dugdhaṃ payovṛṣaṇā jenyāvasū mā no mardhiṣṭamā gatam
analyzed: dugdham payaḥ vṛṣaṇā jenyāvasū mā naḥ mardhiṣṭamā gatam

original: RV_07.074.04.1{21} aśvāso ye vāmupa dāśuṣo gṛhaṃ yuvāṃ dīyanti bibhrataḥ
analyzed: aśvāsaḥ ye vām upa dāśuṣaḥ gṛham yuvām dīyanti bibhrataḥ

original: RV_07.074.04.2{21} makṣūyubhirnarā hayebhiraśvinā devā yātamasmayū
analyzed: makṣūyubhiḥ narā hayebhiḥ aśvinā devā yātamasmayū

original: RV_07.074.05.1{21} adhā ha yanto aśvinā pṛkṣaḥ sacanta sūrayaḥ
analyzed: adhā ha yantaḥ aśvinā pṛkṣaḥ sacanta sūrayaḥ

original: RV_07.074.05.2{21} tā yaṃsato maghavadbhyo dhruvaṃ yaśaśchardirasmabhyaṃ nāsatyā
analyzed: tā yaṃsataḥ maghavadbhyaḥ dhruvam yaśaḥ chardiḥ asmabhyam nāsatyā

original: RV_07.074.06.1{21} pra ye yayuravṛkāso rathā iva nṛpātāro janānām
analyzed: pra ye yayuḥ avṛkāsaḥ rathāḥ iva nṛ pātāraḥ janānām

original: RV_07.074.06.2{21} uta svena śavasā śūśuvurnara uta kṣiyanti sukṣitim
analyzed: uta svena śavasā śūśuvuḥ naraḥ uta kṣiyanti su kṣitim

original: RV_07.075.01.1{22} vyuṣā āvo divijā ṛtenāviṣkṛṇvānā mahimānamāgāt
analyzed: vyuṣāḥ āvaḥ divijāḥ ṛtena āviṣkṛṇvānā mahimānam āgāt

original: RV_07.075.01.2{22} apa druhastama āvarajuṣṭamaṅgirastamā pathyā ajīgaḥ
analyzed: apa druhastamaḥ ā vara juṣṭam aṅgirastamā pathyāḥ ajīgaḥ

original: RV_07.075.02.1{22} mahe no adya suvitāya bodhyuṣo mahe saubhagāya pra yandhi
analyzed: mahe naḥ adya suvitāya bodhi uṣaḥ mahe saubhagāya pra yandhi

original: RV_07.075.02.2{22} citraṃ rayiṃ yaśasaṃ dhehyasme devi marteṣu mānuṣi śravasyum
analyzed: citram rayim yaśasam dhehi asme devi marteṣu mānuṣi śravasyum

original: RV_07.075.03.1{22} ete tye bhānavo darśatāyāścitrā uṣaso amṛtāsa āguḥ
analyzed: ete tye bhānavaḥ darśatāyāḥ citrāḥ uṣasaḥ amṛtāsaḥ āguḥ

original: RV_07.075.03.2{22} janayanto daivyāni vratānyāpṛṇanto antarikṣā vyasthuḥ
analyzed: janayantaḥ daivyāni vratāni āpṛṇantaḥ antarikṣā vyasthuḥ

original: RV_07.075.04.1{22} eṣā syā yujānā parākāt pañca kṣitīḥ pari sadyo jigāti
analyzed: eṣā syā yujānā parākāt pañca kṣitīḥ pari sadyas jigāti

original: RV_07.075.04.2{22} abhipaśyantī vayunā janānāṃ divo duhitā bhuvanasyapatnī
analyzed: abhipaśyantī vayunā janānām divaḥ duhitā bhuvanasya patnī

original: RV_07.075.05.1{22} vājinīvatī sūryasya yoṣā citrāmaghā rāya īśe vasūnām
analyzed: vājinīvatī sūryasya yoṣā citrāmaghā rāyaḥ īśe vasūnām

original: RV_07.075.05.2{22} ṛṣiṣṭutā jarayantī maghonyuṣā uchati vahnibhirgṛṇānā
analyzed: ṛṣiṣṭutā jarayantī maghonī uṣāḥ uchati vahnibhiḥ gṛṇānā

original: RV_07.075.06.1{22} prati dyutānāmaruṣāso aśvāścitrā adṛśrannuṣasaṃ vahantaḥ
analyzed: prati dyutānām aruṣāsaḥ aśvāḥ citrāḥ adṛśran uṣasam vahantaḥ

original: RV_07.075.06.2{22} yāti śubhrā viśvapiśā rathena dadhāti ratnaṃvidhate janāya
analyzed: yāti śubhrā viśva piśā rathena dadhāti ratnam vidhate janāya

original: RV_07.075.07.1{22} satyā satyebhirmahatī mahadbhirdevī devebhiryajatā yajatraiḥ
analyzed: satyā satyebhiḥ mahatī mahadbhiḥ devī devebhiḥ yajatā yajatraiḥ

original: RV_07.075.07.2{22} rujad dṛḷhāni dadadusriyāṇāṃ prati gāva uṣasaṃ vāvaśanta
analyzed: rujat dṛḷhāni dadat usriyāṇām prati gāvaḥ uṣasam vāvaśanta

original: RV_07.075.08.1{22} nū no gomad vīravad dhehi ratnamuṣo aśvāvad purubhojo asme
analyzed: nu naḥ gomat vīravat dhehi ratna muṣaḥ aśvāvat puru bhojaḥ asme

original: RV_07.075.08.2{22} mā no barhiḥ puruṣatā nide karyūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: mā naḥ barhiḥ puruṣa tā nide karyūyam pāta

original: RV_07.076.01.1{23} udu jyotiramṛtaṃ viśvajanyaṃ viśvānaraḥ savitā devo aśret
analyzed: udu jyotiḥ amṛtam viśvajanyam viśvānaraḥ savitā devaḥ aśret

original: RV_07.076.01.2{23} kratvā devānāmajaniṣṭa cakṣurāvirakarbhuvanaṃviśvamuṣāḥ
analyzed: kratvā devānām ajaniṣṭa cakṣuḥ āvirakaḥ bhuvanam viśva muṣāḥ

original: RV_07.076.02.1{23} pra me panthā devayānā adṛśrannamardhanto vasubhiriṣkṛtāsaḥ
analyzed: pra me panthāḥ deva yānāḥ adṛśran amardhantaḥ vasubhiḥ iṣkṛtāsaḥ

original: RV_07.076.02.2{23} abhūdu keturuṣasaḥ purastāt pratīcyāgādadhi harmyebhyaḥ
analyzed: abhūt u ketuḥ uṣasaḥ purastāt pratīcyā agāt adhi harmyebhyaḥ

original: RV_07.076.03.1{23} tānīdahāni bahulānyāsan yā prācīnamuditā sūryasya
analyzed: tāni id ahāni bahulāni āsan yā prācīna muditā sūryasya

original: RV_07.076.03.2{23} yataḥ pari jāra ivācarantyuṣo dadṛkṣe na punaryatīva
analyzed: yatas pari jāre iva ācarantī uṣaḥ dadṛkṣe na punar yatī iva

original: RV_07.076.04.1{23} ta id devānāṃ sadhamāda āsannṛtāvānaḥ kavayaḥ pūrvyāsaḥ
analyzed: te id devānām sadhamādaḥ āsan ṛtāvānaḥ kavayaḥ pūrvyāsaḥ

original: RV_07.076.04.2{23} gūḷhaṃ jyotiḥ pitaro anvavindan satyamantrā ajanayannuṣāsam
analyzed: gūḍham jyotiḥ pitaraḥ anvavindan satya mantrāḥ ajanayan uṣāsam

original: RV_07.076.05.1{23} samāna ūrve adhi saṃgatāsaḥ saṃ jānate na yatante mithaste
analyzed: samāne ūrve adhi saṃgatāsaḥ sam jānate na yatante mithas te

original: RV_07.076.05.2{23} te devānāṃ na minanti vratānyamardhanto vasubhiryādamānāḥ
analyzed: te devānām na minanti vratāni amardhantaḥ vasubhiḥ yādamānāḥ

original: RV_07.076.06.1{23} prati tvā stomairīḷate vasiṣṭhā uṣarbudhaḥ subhage tuṣṭuvāṃsaḥ
analyzed: prati tvā stomaiḥ īḍate vasiṣṭhāḥ uṣarbudhaḥ subhage tuṣṭuvāṃsaḥ

original: RV_07.076.06.2{23} gavāṃ netrī vājapatnī na uchoṣaḥ sujāte prathamā jarasva
analyzed: gavām netrī vāja patnī naḥ ucha uṣaḥ sujāte prathamā jarasva

original: RV_07.076.07.1{23} eṣā netrī rādhasaḥ sūnṛtānāmuṣā uchantī ribhyate vasiṣṭhaiḥ
analyzed: eṣā netrī rādhasaḥ sūnṛtānām uṣāḥ uchantī ribhyate vasiṣṭhaiḥ

original: RV_07.076.07.2{23} dīrghaśrutaṃ rayimasme dadhānā yūyaṃ pāta . ..
analyzed: dīrgha śrutam rayim asme dadhānāḥ yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.077.01.1{24} upo ruruce yuvatirna yoṣā viśvaṃ jīvaṃ prasuvantī carāyai
analyzed: upa u ruruce yuvatiḥ na yoṣā viśvam jīvam prasuvantī carāyai

original: RV_07.077.01.2{24} abhūdagniḥ samidhe mānuṣāṇāmakarjyotirbādhamānā tamāṃsi
analyzed: abhūt agniḥ samidhe mānuṣāṇām akaḥ jyotiḥ bādhamānā tamāṃsi

original: RV_07.077.02.1{24} viśvaṃ pratīcī saprathā udasthād ruśad vāso bibhratīśukramaśvait
analyzed: viśvam pratīcī saprathāḥ udasthāt ruśat vāsaḥ bibhratī śukram aśvait

original: RV_07.077.02.2{24} hiraṇyavarṇā sudṛśīkasandṛg gavāṃ mātānetryahnāmaroci
analyzed: hiraṇya varṇā su dṛśīka sandṛś gavām mātā netrī ahnām aroci

original: RV_07.077.03.1{24} devānāṃ cakṣuḥ subhagā vahantī śvetaṃ nayantī sudṛśīkamaśvam
analyzed: devānām cakṣuḥ subhagā vahantī śvetam nayantī su dṛśīkam aśvam

original: RV_07.077.03.2{24} uṣā adarśi raśmibhirvyaktā citrāmaghā viśvamanu prabhūtā
analyzed: uṣāḥ adarśi raśmibhiḥ vyaktā citrāmaghā viśvam anu prabhūtā

original: RV_07.077.04.1{24} antivāmā dūre amitramuchorvīṃ gavyūtimabhayaṃ kṛdhī naḥ
analyzed: antivāmā dūre amitra mucha urvīm gavyūtim abhayam kṛdhī naḥ

original: RV_07.077.04.2{24} yāvaya dveṣa ā bharā vasūni codaya rādho gṛṇate maghoni
analyzed: yāvaya dveṣaḥ ā bhara vasūni codaya rādhaḥ gṛṇate maghoni

original: RV_07.077.05.1{24} asme śreṣṭhebhirbhānubhirvi bhāhyuṣo devi pratirantī na āyuḥ
analyzed: asme śreṣṭhebhiḥ bhānubhiḥ vi bhāhi uṣaḥ devi pratirantī naḥ āyuḥ

original: RV_07.077.05.2{24} iṣaṃ ca no dadhatī viśvavāre gomadaśvāvad rathavacca rādhaḥ
analyzed: iṣam ca naḥ dadhatī viśva vāre gomat aśvāvat rathavat ca rādhaḥ

original: RV_07.077.06.1{24} yāṃ tvā divo duhitarvardhayantyuṣaḥ sujāte matibhirvasiṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: yām tvā divaḥ duhitar vardhayanti uṣaḥ sujāte matibhiḥ vasiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_07.077.06.2{24} sāsmāsu dhā rayim ṛṣvaṃ bṛhantaṃ yūyaṃ pāta .. .
analyzed: sā asmāsu dhāḥ rayim ṛṣvam bṛhantam yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.078.01.1{25} prati ketavaḥ prathamā adṛśrannūrdhvā asyā añjayo vi śrayante
analyzed: prati ketavaḥ prathamāḥ adṛśran ūrdhvāḥ asyāḥ añjayaḥ vi śrayante

original: RV_07.078.01.2{25} uṣo arvācā bṛhatā rathena jyotiṣmatā vāmamasmabhyaṃ vakṣi
analyzed: uṣaḥ arvācā bṛhatā rathena jyotiṣmatā vāmam asmabhyam vakṣi

original: RV_07.078.02.1{25} prati ṣīmagnirjarate samiddhaḥ prati viprāso matibhirgṛṇantaḥ
analyzed: prati sīm agniḥ jarate samiddhaḥ prati viprāsaḥ matibhiḥ gṛṇantaḥ

original: RV_07.078.02.2{25} uṣā yāti jyotiṣā bādhamānā viśvā tamāṃsi duritāpa devī
analyzed: uṣāḥ yāti jyotiṣā bādhamānā viśvā tamāṃsi duritā apa devī

original: RV_07.078.03.1{25} etā u tyāḥ pratyadṛśran purastājjyotiryachantīruṣasovibhātīḥ
analyzed: etāḥ u tyāḥ pratyadṛśran purastāt jyotiḥ yachantīḥ uṣasaḥ vibhātīḥ

original: RV_07.078.03.2{25} ajījanan sūryaṃ yajñamagnimapācīnaṃ tamo agādajuṣṭam
analyzed: ajījanan sūryam yajñam agnim apācīnam tamaḥ agāt ajuṣṭam

original: RV_07.078.04.1{25} aceti divo duhitā maghonī viśve paśyantyuṣasaṃ vibhātīm
analyzed: aceti divaḥ duhitā maghonī viśve paśyanti uṣasam vibhātīm

original: RV_07.078.04.2{25} āsthād rathaṃ svadhayā yujyamānamā yamaśvāsaḥ suyujo vahanti
analyzed: āsthāt ratham svadhayā yujyamānamā ā yama śvāsaḥ su yujaḥ vahanti

original: RV_07.078.05.1{25} prati tvādya sumanaso budhantāsmākāso maghavāno vayaṃ ca
analyzed: prati tvā adya sumanasaḥ budhanta asmākāsaḥ maghavānaḥ vayam ca

original: RV_07.078.05.2{25} tilvilāyadhvamuṣaso vibhātīryūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: tilvilāyadhvam uṣasaḥ vibhātīḥ yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.079.01.1{26} vyuṣā āvaḥ pathyā janānāṃ pañca kṣitīrmānuṣīrbodhayantī
analyzed: vyuṣāḥ āvaḥ pathyāḥ janānām pañca kṣitīḥ mānuṣīḥ bodhayantī

original: RV_07.079.01.2{26} susandṛgbhirukṣabhirbhānumaśred vi sūryo rodasī cakṣasāvaḥ
analyzed: su sandṛgbhiḥ ukṣabhiḥ bhānum aśret vi sūryaḥ rodasī cakṣasā avaḥ

original: RV_07.079.02.1{26} vyañjate divo anteṣvaktūn viśo na yuktā uṣaso yatante
analyzed: vyañjate divaḥ anteṣu aktūn viśaḥ na yuktāḥ uṣasaḥ yatante

original: RV_07.079.02.2{26} saṃ te gāvastama ā vartayanti jyotiryachanti saviteva bāhū
analyzed: sam te gāvaḥ tamaḥ ā vartayanti jyotiḥ yacchanti savitā iva bāhū

original: RV_07.079.03.1{26} abhūduṣā indratamā maghonyajījanat suvitāya śravāṃsi
analyzed: abhūt uṣāḥ indratamā maghonī ajījanat suvitāya śravāṃsi

original: RV_07.079.03.2{26} vi divo devī duhitā dadhātyaṅgirastamā sukṛte vasūni
analyzed: vi divaḥ devī duhitā dadhāti aṅgirastamā su kṛte vasūni

original: RV_07.079.04.1{26} tāvaduṣo rādho asmabhyaṃ rāsva yāvat stotṛbhyo arado gṛṇānā
analyzed: tāvat uṣaḥ rādhaḥ asmabhyam rāsva yāvat stotṛbhyaḥ aradaḥ gṛṇānā

original: RV_07.079.04.2{26} yāṃ tvā jajñurvṛṣabhasyā raveṇa vi dṛḷhasya duro adreraurṇoḥ
analyzed: yām tvā jajñuḥ vṛṣabhasya raveṇa vi dṛḷhasya duraḥ adreḥ aurṇoḥ

original: RV_07.079.05.1{26} devaṃ-devaṃ rādhase codayantyasmadryak sūnṛtā īrayantī
analyzed: devam devam rādhase codayantī asmadryak sūnṛtāḥ īrayantī

original: RV_07.079.05.2{26} vyuchantī naḥ sanaye dhiyo dhā yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: vyuchantī naḥ sanaye dhiyaḥ dhāḥ yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.080.01.1{27} prati stomebhiruṣasaṃ vasiṣṭhā gīrbhirviprāsaḥ prathamā abudhran
analyzed: prati stomebhiḥ uṣasam vasiṣṭhāḥ gīrbhiḥ viprāsaḥ prathamāḥ abudhran

original: RV_07.080.01.2{27} vivartayantīṃ rajasī samante āviṣkṛṇvatīṃ bhuvanāni viśvā
analyzed: vivartayantīm rajasī samante āviṣkṛṇvatīm bhuvanāni viśvā

original: RV_07.080.02.1{27} eṣā syā navyamāyurdadhānā gūḍhvī tamo jyotiṣoṣāabodhi
analyzed: eṣā syā navyam āyuḥ dadhānā gūḍhvī tamaḥ jyotiṣā uṣā abodhi

original: RV_07.080.02.2{27} agra eti yuvatirahrayāṇā prācikitat sūryaṃ yajñamagnim
analyzed: agre eti yuvatiḥ ahrayāṇā prācikitat sūryam yajñam agnim

original: RV_07.080.03.1{27} aśvāvatīrgomatīrna uṣāso ...
analyzed: aśvāvatīḥ gomatīḥ naḥ uṣāsaḥ

original: RV_07.081.01.1{01} pratyu adarśyāyatyuchantī duhitā divaḥ
analyzed: prati u adarśyā āyatī uchantī duhitā divaḥ

original: RV_07.081.01.2{01} apo mahi vyayati cakṣase tamo jyotiṣ kṛṇoti sūnarī
analyzed: apa u mahi vyayati cakṣase tamaḥ jyotiḥ kṛṇoti sūnarī

original: RV_07.081.02.1{01} udusriyāḥ sṛjate sūryaḥ sacānudyan nakṣatramarcivat
analyzed: udusriyāḥ sṛjate sūryaḥ sacā an udyan nakṣatram arcivat

original: RV_07.081.02.2{01} taveduṣo vyuṣi sūryasya ca saṃ bhaktena gamemahi
analyzed: tava īduṣaḥ vyuṣi sūryasya ca sam bhaktena gamemahi

original: RV_07.081.03.1{01} prati tvā duhitardiva uṣo jīrā abhutsmahi
analyzed: prati tvā duhitar divaḥ uṣaḥ jīrāḥ abhutsmahi

original: RV_07.081.03.2{01} yā vahasi puruspārhaṃ vananvati ratnaṃ na dāśuṣe mayaḥ
analyzed: yā vahasi puruspārham vananvati ratnam na dāśuṣe mayaḥ

original: RV_07.081.04.1{01} uchantī yā kṛṇoṣi maṃhanā mahi prakhyai devi svardṛśe
analyzed: uchantī yā kṛṇoṣi maṃhanā mahi devi svar dṛśe

original: RV_07.081.04.2{01} tasyāste ratnabhāja īmahe vayaṃ syāma māturna sūnavaḥ
analyzed: tasyāḥ te ratna bhājaḥ īmahe vayam syāma mātuḥ na sūnavaḥ

original: RV_07.081.05.1{01} taccitraṃ rādha ā bharoṣo yad dīrghaśruttamam
analyzed: tat citram rādhaḥ ā bhara uṣaḥ yat dīrghaśruttamam

original: RV_07.081.05.2{01} yat tedivo duhitarmartabhojanaṃ tad rāsva bhunajāmahai
analyzed: yat tedivaḥ duhitar marta bhojanam tat rāsva bhunajāmahai

original: RV_07.081.06.1{01} śravaḥ sūribhyo amṛtaṃ vasutvanaṃ vājānasmabhyaṃ gomataḥ
analyzed: śravaḥ sūribhyaḥ amṛtam vasutvanam vājān asmabhyam gomataḥ

original: RV_07.081.06.2{01} codayitrī maghonaḥ sūnṛtāvatyuṣā uchadapa sridhaḥ
analyzed: codayitrī maghonaḥ sūnṛtāvatī uṣāḥ uchat apa sridhaḥ

original: RV_07.082.01.1{02} indrāvaruṇā yuvamadhvarāya no viśe janāya mahi śarma yachatam
analyzed: indrāvaruṇā yuvam adhvarāya naḥ viśe janāya mahi śarma yacchatam

original: RV_07.082.01.2{02} dīrghaprayajyumati yo vanuṣyati vayaṃ jayema pṛtanāsu dūḍhyaḥ
analyzed: dīrghaprayajyumati yaḥ vanuṣyati vayam jayema pṛtanāsu dūḍhyaḥ

original: RV_07.082.02.1{02} samrāḷ anyaḥ svarāḷ anya ucyate vāṃ mahāntāvindrāvaruṇā mahāvasū
analyzed: samrāj anyaḥ svarāj anyaḥ ucyate vām mahāntau indrāvaruṇā mahā vasū

original: RV_07.082.02.2{02} viśve devāsaḥ parame vyomani saṃ vāmojovṛṣaṇā saṃ balaṃ dadhuḥ
analyzed: viśve devāsaḥ parame vyomani sam vām ojaḥ vṛṣaṇā sam balam

original: RV_07.082.03.1{02} anvapāṃ khānyatṛntamojasā sūryamairayataṃ divi prabhu
analyzed: anu apām khāni atṛntam ojasā sūryam airayatam divi prabhu
m

original: RV_07.082.03.2{02} indrāvaruṇā made asya māyino 'pinvatamapitaḥ pinvataṃ dhiyaḥ
analyzed: indrāvaruṇā made asya māyinaḥ pinvatam apitaḥ pinvatam dhiyaḥ

original: RV_07.082.04.1{02} yuvāmid yutsu pṛtanāsu vahnayo yuvāṃ kṣemasya prasave mitajñavaḥ
analyzed: yuvām id yutsu pṛtanāsu vahnayaḥ yuvām kṣemasya prasave mitajñavaḥ

original: RV_07.082.04.2{02} īśānā vasva ubhayasya kārava indrāvaruṇā suhavā havāmahe
analyzed: īśānā vasvaḥ ubhayasya kāravaḥ indrāvaruṇā su havā havāmahe

original: RV_07.082.05.1{02} indrāvaruṇā yadimāni cakrathurviśvā jātāni bhuvanasyamajmanā
analyzed: indrāvaruṇāḥ yat imāni cakrathuḥ viśvā jātāni bhuvanasya majmanā

original: RV_07.082.05.2{02} kṣemeṇa mitro varuṇaṃ duvasyati marudbhirugraḥ śubhamanya īyate
analyzed: kṣemeṇa mitraḥ varuṇam duvasyati marudbhiḥ ugraḥ śubham anyaḥ īyate

original: RV_07.082.06.1{03} mahe śulkāya varuṇasya nu tviṣa ojo mimāte dhruvamasya yat svam
analyzed: mahe śulkāya varuṇasya nu tviṣe ojaḥ mimāte dhruvam asya yat svam

original: RV_07.082.06.2{03} ajāmimanyaḥ śnathayantamātirad dabhrebhiranyaḥ pra vṛṇoti bhūyasaḥ
analyzed: ajāmim anyaḥ śnathayantam ātirat dabhrebhiḥ anyaḥ pra vṛṇoti bhūyasaḥ

original: RV_07.082.07.1{03} na tamaṃho na duritāni martyamindrāvaruṇā na tapaḥ kutaścana
analyzed: na tam aṃhaḥ na duritāni martyam indrāvaruṇā na tapaḥ kutaścana

original: RV_07.082.07.2{03} yasya devā gachatho vītho adhvaraṃ na taṃ martasya naśate parihvṛtiḥ
analyzed: yasya devā gachathaḥ vīthaḥ adhvaram na tam martasya naśate parihvṛtiḥ

original: RV_07.082.08.1{03} arvāṃ narā daivyenāvasā gataṃ śṛṇutaṃ havaṃ yadi me jujoṣathaḥ
analyzed: arvām narā daivyena avasā gatam śṛṇutam havam yadi me jujoṣathaḥ

original: RV_07.082.08.2{03} yuvorhi sakhyamuta vā yadāpyaṃ mārḍīkamindrāvaruṇā ni yachatam
analyzed: yuvoḥ hi sakhyam uta vā yat āpyam mārḍīkam indrāvaruṇā ni yacchatam

original: RV_07.082.09.1{03} asmākamindrāvaruṇā bhare-bhare puroyodhā bhavataṃ kṛṣṭyojasā
analyzed: asmākam indrāvaruṇā bharebhare puras yodhā bhavatam kṛṣṭi ojasā

original: RV_07.082.09.2{03} yad vāṃ havanta ubhaye adha spṛdhi narastokasya tanayasya sātiṣu
analyzed: yat vām havante ubhaye adha spṛdhi nara stokasya tanayasya sātiṣu

original: RV_07.082.10.1{03} asme indro varuṇo mitro aryamā dyumnaṃ yachantu mahi śarmasaprathaḥ
analyzed: asme indraḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā dyumnam yacchantu mahi śarma saprathaḥ

original: RV_07.082.10.2{03} avadhraṃ jyotiraditer{ṛ}tāvṛdho devasya ślokaṃ saviturmanāmahe
analyzed: avadhram jyotiḥ aditeḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ devasya ślokam savituḥ manāmahe

original: RV_07.083.01.1{04} yuvāṃ narā paśyamānāsa āpyaṃ prācā gavyantaḥ pṛthuparśavo yayuḥ
analyzed: yuvām narā paśyamānāsaḥ āpyam prācā gavyantaḥ pṛthu parśavaḥ yayuḥ

original: RV_07.083.01.2{04} dāsā ca vṛtrā hatamāryāṇi ca sudāsamindrāvaruṇāvasāvatam
analyzed: dāsā ca vṛtrā hatam āryāṇi ca sudāsam indrāvaruṇā avasā avatam

original: RV_07.083.02.1{04} yatrā naraḥ samayante kṛtadhvajo yasminnājā bhavati kiṃcana priyam
analyzed: yatrā naraḥ kṛta dhvajaḥ yasmin ājā bhavati kiṃcana priyam

original: RV_07.083.02.2{04} yatrā bhayante bhuvanā svardṛśastatrā na indrāvaruṇādhi vocatam
analyzed: yatra bhayante bhuvanā svar dṛśaḥ tatra naḥ indrāvaruṇā adhi vocatam

original: RV_07.083.03.1{04} saṃ bhūmyā antā dhvasirā adṛkṣatendrāvaruṇā divi ghoṣaāruhat
analyzed: sam bhūmyāḥ antāḥ dhvasirāḥ adṛkṣata indrāvaruṇā divi ghoṣaḥ āruhat

original: RV_07.083.03.2{04} asthurjanānāmupa māmarātayo 'rvāgavasā havanaśrutā gatam
analyzed: asthuḥ janānām upa mām arātayaḥ rvāc avasā havana śrutā gatam

original: RV_07.083.04.1{04} indrāvaruṇā vadhanābhiraprati bhedaṃ vanvantā pra sudāsamāvatam
analyzed: indrāvaruṇā vadhanābhiḥ aprati bhedam vanvantā pra sudāsam āvatam

original: RV_07.083.04.2{04} brahmāṇyeṣāṃ śṛṇutaṃ havīmani satyā tṛtsūnāmabhavat purohitiḥ
analyzed: brahmāṇi eṣām śṛṇutam havīmani satyā tṛtsūnām abhavat purohitiḥ

original: RV_07.083.05.1{04} indrāvaruṇāvabhyā tapanti māghānyaryo vanuṣāmarātayaḥ
analyzed: indrāvaruṇau abhyā tapanti mā aghāni aryaḥ vanuṣām arātayaḥ

original: RV_07.083.05.2{04} yuvaṃ hi vasva ubhayasya rājatho 'dha smā no 'vataṃ pārye divi
analyzed: yuvam hi vasvaḥ ubhayasya rājathaḥ dha smā naḥ vatam pārye divi

original: RV_07.083.06.1{05} yuvāṃ havanta ubhayāsa ājiṣvindraṃ ca vasvo varuṇaṃ casātaye
analyzed: yuvām havante ubhayāsaḥ ājiṣu indram ca vasvaḥ varuṇam casātaye

original: RV_07.083.06.2{05} yatra rājabhirdaśabhirnibādhitaṃ pra sudāsamāvataṃ tṛtsubhiḥ saha
analyzed: yatra rājabhiḥ daśabhiḥ nibādhitam pra sudāsam āvatam tṛtsubhiḥ saha

original: RV_07.083.07.1{05} daśa rājānaḥ samitā ayajyavaḥ sudāsamindrāvaruṇā na yuyudhuḥ
analyzed: daśa rājānaḥ samitāḥ ayajyavaḥ sudāsam indrāvaruṇā na yuyudhuḥ

original: RV_07.083.07.2{05} satyā nṛṇāmadmasadāmupastutirdevā eṣāmabhavan devahūtiṣu
analyzed: satyā nṛṇām admasadām upastutiḥ devāḥ eṣām abhavan deva hūtiṣu

original: RV_07.083.08.1{05} dāśarājñe pariyattāya viśvataḥ sudāsa indrāvaruṇāvaśikṣatam
analyzed: dāśarājñe pariyattāya viśvatas sudāse indrāvaruṇau aśikṣatam

original: RV_07.083.08.2{05} śvityañco yatra namasā kapardino dhiyā dhīvanto asapanta tṛtsavaḥ
analyzed: śvityañcaḥ yatra namasā kapardinaḥ dhiyā dhīvantaḥ asapanta tṛtsavaḥ

original: RV_07.083.09.1{05} vṛtrāṇyanyaḥ samitheṣu jighnate vratānyanyo abhi rakṣate sadā
analyzed: vṛtrāṇi anyaḥ samitheṣu jighnate vratāni anyaḥ abhi rakṣate sadā

original: RV_07.083.09.2{05} havāmahe vāṃ vṛṣaṇā suvṛktibhirasme indrāvaruṇaā śarma yachatam
analyzed: havāmahe vām vṛṣaṇā suvṛktibhiḥ asme indrāvaruṇaā śarma yacchatam

original: RV_07.083.10.1{05} asme indro varuṇo mitro ...
analyzed: asme indraḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ

original: RV_07.084.01.1{06} ā vāṃ rājānāvadhvare vavṛtyāṃ havyebhirindrāvaruṇā namobhiḥ
analyzed: ā vām rājānau adhvare vavṛtyām havyebhiḥ indrāvaruṇāḥ namobhiḥ

original: RV_07.084.01.2{06} pra vāṃ ghṛtācī bāhvordadhānā pari tmanā viṣurūpā jigāti
analyzed: pra vām ghṛtācī bāhvoḥ dadhānā pari tmanā viṣurūpā jigāti

original: RV_07.084.02.1{06} yuvo rāṣṭraṃ bṛhadinvati dyauryau setṛbhirarajjubhiḥ sinīthaḥ
analyzed: yuvoḥ rāṣṭram bṛhadinvati dyauḥ yau setṛbhiḥ a rajjubhiḥ sinīthaḥ

original: RV_07.084.02.2{06} pari no heḷo varuṇasya vṛjyā uruṃ na indraḥ kṛṇavadu lokam
analyzed: pari naḥ heḍaḥ varuṇasya vṛjyāḥ urum naḥ indraḥ kṛṇavatu lokam

original: RV_07.084.03.1{06} kṛtaṃ no yajñaṃ vidatheṣu cāruṃ kṛtaṃ brahmāṇi sūriṣupraśastā
analyzed: kṛtam naḥ yajñam vidatheṣu cārum kṛtam brahmāṇi sūriṣu praśastā

original: RV_07.084.03.2{06} upo rayirdevajūto na etu pra ṇaḥ spārhābhirūtibhistiretam
analyzed: upa u rayiḥ deva jūtaḥ naḥ etu pra naḥ spārhābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ tiretam

original: RV_07.084.04.1{06} asme indrāvaruṇā viśvavāraṃ rayiṃ dhattaṃ vasumantaṃ purukṣum
analyzed: asme indrāvaruṇāḥ viśva vāram rayim dhattam vasumantam purukṣum

original: RV_07.084.04.2{06} pra ya ādityo anṛtā minātyamitā śūro dayate vasūni
analyzed: pra yaḥ ādityaḥ anṛtā mināti amitā śūraḥ dayate vasūni

original: RV_07.084.05.1{06} iyamindraṃ varuṇamaṣṭa me gīḥ prāvat toke tanaye tūtujānā
analyzed: iyam indram varuṇam aṣṭa me gīḥ prāvat toke tanaye tūtujānā

original: RV_07.084.05.2{06} suratnāso devavītiṃ gamema yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: su ratnāsaḥ deva vītim gamema yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.085.01.1{07} punīṣe vāmarakṣasaṃ manīṣāṃ somamindrāya varuṇāya juhvat
analyzed: punīṣe vāmarakṣasam manīṣām somam indrāya varuṇāya juhvat

original: RV_07.085.01.2{07} ghṛtapratīkāmuṣasaṃ na devīṃ tā no yāmannuruṣyatāmabhīke
analyzed: ghṛta pratīkām uṣasam na devīm tāḥ naḥ yāman uruṣyatām abhīke

original: RV_07.085.02.1{07} spardhante vā u devahūye atra yeṣu dhvajeṣu didyavaḥ patanti
analyzed: spardhante vai u deva hūye atra yeṣu dhvajeṣu didyavaḥ patanti

original: RV_07.085.02.2{07} yuvaṃ tānindrāvaruṇāvamitrān hataṃ parācaḥ śarvā viṣūcaḥ
analyzed: yuvam tān indrāvaruṇau amitrān hatam parācaḥ śarvā viṣūcaḥ

original: RV_07.085.03.1{07} āpaścid dhi svayaśasaḥ sadassu devīrindraṃ varuṇaṃ devatā dhuḥ
analyzed: āpaḥ cit hi sva yaśasaḥ sadassu devīḥ indram varuṇam devatāḥ dhuḥ

original: RV_07.085.03.2{07} kṛṣṭīranyo dhārayati praviktā vṛtrāṇyanyo apratīni hanti
analyzed: kṛṣṭīḥ anyaḥ dhārayati praviktāḥ vṛtrāṇi anyaḥ apratīni hanti

original: RV_07.085.04.1{07} sa sukratur{ṛ}tacidastu hotā ya āditya śavasā vāṃ namasvān
analyzed: sa sukratuḥ ṛta cit astu hotā yaḥ āditya śavasā vām namasvān

original: RV_07.085.04.2{07} āvavartadavase vāṃ haviṣmānasadit sa suvitāya prayasvān
analyzed: āvavartat avase vām haviṣmān asadit sa suvitāya prayasvān

original: RV_07.085.05.1{07} iyamindraṃ varuṇamaṣṭa me gīḥ ...
analyzed: iyam indram varuṇam aṣṭa me gīḥ

original: RV_07.086.01.1{08} dhīrā tvasya mahinā janūṃṣi vi yastastambha rodasī cidurvī
analyzed: dhīrā tvasya mahinā janūṃṣi vi yastastambha rodasī cit urvī

original: RV_07.086.01.2{08} pra nākam ṛṣvaṃ nunude bṛhantaṃ dvitā nakṣatrampaprathacca bhūma
analyzed: pra nākam ṛṣvam nunude bṛhantam dvitā nakṣatram paprathat ca bhūma

original: RV_07.086.02.1{08} uta svayā tanvā saṃ vade tat kadā nvantarvaruṇe bhuvāni
analyzed: uta svayā tanvā sam vade tat kadā nu antarvaruṇe bhuvāni

original: RV_07.086.02.2{08} kiṃ me havyamahṛṇāno juṣeta kadā mṛḷīkaṃ sumanā abhi khyam
analyzed: kim me havyam a hṛṇānaḥ juṣeta kadā mṛḷīkam sumanāḥ abhi khyam

original: RV_07.086.03.1{08} pṛche tadeno varuṇa didṛkṣūpo emi cikituṣo vipṛcham
analyzed: pṛcche tat enaḥ varuṇa didṛkṣu upa u emi cikituṣaḥ vipṛcham

original: RV_07.086.03.2{08} samānamin me kavayaścidāhurayaṃ ha tubhyaṃ varuṇo hṛṇīte
analyzed: samānam id me kavayaḥ cit āhuḥ ayam ha tubhyam varuṇaḥ hṛṇīte

original: RV_07.086.04.1{08} kimāga āsa varuṇa jyeṣṭhaṃ yat stotāraṃ jighāṃsasi sakhāyam
analyzed: kim āgaḥ āsa varuṇa jyeṣṭham yat stotāram jighāṃsasi sakhāyam

original: RV_07.086.04.2{08} pra tan me voco dūḷabha svadhāvo 'va tvānenā namasā tura iyām
analyzed: pra tat me vocaḥ dūḍabha svadhāvas va tvā anena namasā turaḥ iyām

original: RV_07.086.05.1{08} ava drugdhāni pitryā sṛjā no 'va yā vayaṃ cakṛmā tanūbhiḥ
analyzed: ava drugdhāni pitryā sṛja naḥ va yā vayam cakṛma tanūbhiḥ

original: RV_07.086.05.2{08} ava rājan paśutṛpaṃ na tāyuṃ sṛjā vatsaṃ na dāmno vasiṣṭham
analyzed: ava rājan paśutṛpam na tāyum sṛja vatsam na dāmnaḥ vasiṣṭham

original: RV_07.086.06.1{08} na sa svo dakṣo varuṇa dhrutiḥ sā surā manyurvibhīdakoacittiḥ
analyzed: na sa svaḥ dakṣaḥ varuṇa dhrutiḥ sā surā manyuḥ vibhīdakā acittiḥ

original: RV_07.086.06.2{08} asti jyāyān kanīyasa upāre svapnaścanedanṛtasya prayotā
analyzed: asti jyāyān kanīyasaḥ upa āre svapnaḥ cana id anṛtasya prayotā

original: RV_07.086.07.1{08} araṃ dāso na mīḷhuṣe karāṇyahaṃ devāya bhūrṇaye 'nāgāḥ
analyzed: aram dāsaḥ na mīḍhuṣe karāṇi aham devāya bhūrṇaye nāgāḥ

original: RV_07.086.07.2{08} acetayadacito devo aryo gṛtsaṃ rāye kavitaro junāti
analyzed: acetayat acitaḥ devaḥ aryaḥ gṛtsam rāye kavitaraḥ junāti

original: RV_07.086.08.1{08} ayaṃ su tubhyaṃ varuṇa svadhāvo hṛdi stoma upaśritaścidastu
analyzed: ayam su tubhyam varuṇa svadhāvas hṛdi stomaḥ upaśritaḥ cit astu

original: RV_07.086.08.2{08} śaṃ naḥ kṣeme śamu yoge no astu yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: śam naḥ kṣeme śamu yoge naḥ astu yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.087.01.1{09} radat patho varuṇaḥ sūryāya prārṇāṃsi samudriyā nadīnām
analyzed: radat pathaḥ varuṇaḥ sūryāya pra arṇāṃsi samudriyā nadīnām

original: RV_07.087.01.2{09} sargo na sṛṣṭo arvatīr{ṛ}tāyañcakāra mahīravanīrahabhyaḥ
analyzed: sargaḥ na sṛṣṭaḥ arvatīḥ ṛtāyan cakāra mahī ravanī rahabhyaḥ

original: RV_07.087.02.1{09} ātmā te vāto raja ā navīnot paśurna bhūrṇiryavase sasavān
analyzed: ātmā te vātaḥ rajaḥ ā navīnot paśuḥ na bhūrṇiḥ yavase sasavān

original: RV_07.087.02.2{09} antarmahī bṛhatī rodasīme viśvā te dhāma varuṇa priyāṇi
analyzed: antar mahī bṛhatī rodasī ime viśvā te dhāma varuṇa priyāṇi

original: RV_07.087.03.1{09} pari spaśo varuṇasya smadiṣṭā ubhe paśyanti rodasī sumeke
analyzed: pari spaśaḥ varuṇasya smadiṣṭāḥ ubhe paśyanti rodasī sumeke

original: RV_07.087.03.2{09} ṛtāvānaḥ kavayo yajñadhīrāḥ pracetaso ya iṣayanta manma
analyzed: ṛtāvānaḥ kavayaḥ yajña dhīrāḥ pracetasaḥ ye iṣayanta manma

original: RV_07.087.04.1{09} uvāca me varuṇo medhirāya triḥ sapta nāmāghnyā bibharti
analyzed: uvāca me varuṇaḥ medhirāya tris sapta nāma aghnyā bibharti

original: RV_07.087.04.2{09} vidvān padasya guhyā na vocad yugāya vipra uparāya śikṣan
analyzed: vidvān padasya guhyā na vocat yugāya vipraḥ uparāya śikṣan

original: RV_07.087.05.1{09} tisro dyāvo nihitā antarasmin tisro bhūmīruparāḥ ṣaḍvidhānāḥ
analyzed: tisraḥ dyāvaḥ nihitāḥ antarasmin tisraḥ bhūmīḥ uparāḥ ṣaṣ vidhānāḥ

original: RV_07.087.05.2{09} gṛtso rājā varuṇaścakra etaṃ divi preṅkhaṃhiraṇyayaṃ śubhe kam
analyzed: gṛtsaḥ rājā varuṇaḥ cakre etam divi preṅkham hiraṇyayam śubhe kam

original: RV_07.087.06.1{09} ava sindhuṃ varuṇo dyauriva sthād drapso na śveto mṛgastuviṣmān
analyzed: ava sindhum varuṇaḥ dyauḥ iva sthāt drapsaḥ na śvetaḥ mṛgaḥ tuviṣmān

original: RV_07.087.06.2{09} gambhīraśaṃso rajaso vimānaḥ supārakṣatraḥ sato asya rājā
analyzed: gambhīra śaṃsaḥ rajasaḥ vimānaḥ su pāra kṣatraḥ sataḥ asya rājā

original: RV_07.087.07.1{09} yo mṛḷayāti cakruṣe cidāgo vayaṃ syāma varuṇe anāgāḥ
analyzed: yaḥ mṛḍayāti cakruṣe cit āgaḥ vayam syāma varuṇe anāgāḥ

original: RV_07.087.07.2{09} anu vratānyaditer{ṛ}dhanto yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: anu vratāni aditeḥ ṛdhantaḥ yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.088.01.1{10} pra śundhyuvaṃ varuṇāya preṣṭhāṃ matiṃ vasiṣṭha mīḷhuṣe bharasva
analyzed: pra śundhyuvam varuṇāya preṣṭhām matim vasiṣṭha mīḍhuṣe bharasva

original: RV_07.088.01.2{10} ya īmarvāñcaṃ karate yajatraṃ sahasrāmaghaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ bṛhantam
analyzed: yaḥ īm arvāñcam karate yajatram sahasrāmagham vṛṣaṇam bṛhantam

original: RV_07.088.02.1{10} adhā nvasya sandṛśaṃ jaganvānagneranīkaṃ varuṇasya maṃsi
analyzed: adhā nu asya sandṛśam jaganvān agneḥ anīkam varuṇasya maṃsi

original: RV_07.088.02.2{10} svaryadaśmannadhipā u andho 'bhi mā vapurdṛśaye ninīyāt
analyzed: svaryat aśman adhipāḥ u andhaḥ bhi mā vapuḥ dṛśaye ninīyāt

original: RV_07.088.03.1{10} ā yad ruhāva varuṇaśca nāvaṃ pra yat samudramīrayāvamadhyam
analyzed: ā yat ruhāva varuṇaḥ ca nāvam pra yat samudram īrayāvamadhyam

original: RV_07.088.03.2{10} adhi yadapāṃ snubhiścarāva pra preṅkha īṅkhayāvahai śubhe kam
analyzed: adhi yat apām snubhiḥ carāva pra preṅkhe īṅkhayāvahai śubhe kam

original: RV_07.088.04.1{10} vasiṣṭhaṃ ha varuṇo nāvyādhād ṛṣiṃ cakāra svapā mahobhiḥ
analyzed: vasiṣṭham ha varuṇaḥ na avyā adhāt ṛṣim cakāra su apāḥ mahobhiḥ

original: RV_07.088.04.2{10} stotāraṃ vipraḥ sudinatve ahnāṃ yān nu dyāvastatanan yāduṣāsaḥ
analyzed: stotāram vipraḥ sudina tve ahnām yāt nu dyāvaḥ tatanan yāduṣāsaḥ

original: RV_07.088.05.1{10} kva tyāni nau sakhyā babhūvuḥ sacāvahe yadavṛkaṃ purā cit
analyzed: kva tyāni nau sakhyā babhūvuḥ sacāvahe yadavṛkam purā cit

original: RV_07.088.05.2{10} bṛhantaṃ mānaṃ varuṇa svadhāvaḥ sahasradvāraṃ jagamā gṛhaṃ te
analyzed: bṛhantam mānam varuṇa svadhāvas sahasra dvāram jagama gṛham te

original: RV_07.088.06.1{10} ya āpirnityo varuṇa priyaḥ san tvāmāgāṃsi kṛṇavat sakhā te
analyzed: yaḥ āpiḥ nityaḥ varuṇa priyaḥ san tvām āgāṃsi kṛṇavat sakhā te

original: RV_07.088.06.2{10} mā ta enasvanto yakṣin bhujema yandhi ṣmā vipra stuvate varūtham
analyzed: mā te enasvantaḥ yakṣin bhujema yandhi sma vipra stuvate varūtham

original: RV_07.088.07.1{10} dhruvāsu tvāsu kṣitiṣu kṣiyanto vyasmat pāśaṃ varuṇomumocat
analyzed: dhruvāsu tvā āsu kṣitiṣu kṣiyantaḥ vi asmat pāśam varuṇaḥ umumocat

original: RV_07.088.07.2{10} avo vanvānā aditerupasthād yūyaṃ pāta
analyzed: avaḥ vanvānāḥ aditeḥ upasthāt yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.089.01.1{11} mo ṣu varuṇa mṛnmayaṃ gṛhaṃ rājannahaṃ gamam
analyzed: mā u su varuṇa mṛd mayam gṛham rājan aham gamam

original: RV_07.089.01.2{11} mṛḷā sukṣatra mṛḷaya
analyzed: mṛḷa su kṣatra mṛḍaya

original: RV_07.089.02.1{11} yademi prasphuranniva dṛtirna dhmāto adrivaḥ
analyzed: yat emi prasphuran iva dṛtiḥ na dhmātaḥ adrivas
mṛḍa s m

original: RV_07.089.03.1{11} kratvaḥ samaha dīnatā pratīpaṃ jagamā śuce
analyzed: kratvaḥ samaha dīna tā pratīpam jagama śuce
mṛḍa s m

original: RV_07.089.04.1{11} apāṃ madhye tasthivāṃsaṃ tṛṣṇāvidajjaritāram
analyzed: apām madhye tasthivāṃsam tṛṣṇā vidat jaritāram
mṛḍa s m

original: RV_07.089.05.1{11} yat kiṃ cedaṃ varuṇa daivye jane 'bhidrohaṃ manuṣyāścarāmasi
analyzed: yat kim ca idam varuṇa daivye jane bhidroham manuṣyāḥ carāmasi

original: RV_07.089.05.2{11} acittī yat tava dharmā yuyopima mā nastasmādenaso deva rīriṣaḥ
analyzed: acittī yat tava dharmā yuyopima mā naḥ tasmāt enasaḥ deva rīriṣaḥ

original: RV_07.090.01.1{12} pra vīrayā śucayo dadrire vāmadhvaryubhirmadhumantaḥ sutāsaḥ
analyzed: pra vīrayā śucayaḥ dadrire vām adhvaryubhiḥ madhumantaḥ sutāsaḥ

original: RV_07.090.01.2{12} vaha vāyo niyuto yāhyachā pibā sutasyāndhaso madāya
analyzed: vaha vāyo niyutaḥ yāhi achā pibā sutasya andhasaḥ madāya

original: RV_07.090.02.1{12} īśānāya prahutiṃ yasta ānaṭ chuciṃ somaṃ śucipāstubhyaṃ vāyo
analyzed: īśānāya prahutim yaḥ te ānaṭ śucim somam śuci pāstubhyam vāyo

original: RV_07.090.02.2{12} kṛṇoṣi taṃ martyeṣu praśastaṃ jāto-jāto jāyate vājyasya
analyzed: kṛṇoṣi tam martyeṣu praśastam jātaḥ jātaḥ jāyate vājyasya

original: RV_07.090.03.1{12} rāye nu yaṃ jajñatū rodasīme rāye devī dhiṣaṇā dhāti devam
analyzed: rāye nu yam jajñatuḥ rodasī ime rāye devī dhiṣaṇā dhāti devam

original: RV_07.090.03.2{12} adha vāyuṃ niyutaḥ saścata svā uta śvetaṃ vasudhitiṃ nireke
analyzed: adha vāyum niyutaḥ saścata svāḥ uta śvetam vasu dhitim nireke

original: RV_07.090.04.1{12} uchannuṣasaḥ sudinā ariprā uru jyotirvividurdīdhyānāḥ
analyzed: uchan uṣasaḥ su dināḥ ariprāḥ uru jyotiḥ vividuḥ dīdhyānāḥ

original: RV_07.090.04.2{12} gavyaṃ cidūrvamuśijo vi vavrusteṣāmanu pradivaḥ sasrurāpaḥ
analyzed: gavyam cit ūrvam uśijaḥ vi vavruḥ teṣām anu pradivaḥ sasruḥ āpaḥ

original: RV_07.090.05.1{12} te satyena manasā dīdhyānāḥ svena yuktāsaḥ kratunā vahanti
analyzed: te satyena manasā dīdhyānāḥ svena yuktāsaḥ kratunā vahanti

original: RV_07.090.05.2{12} indravāyū vīravāhaṃ rathaṃ vāmīśānayorabhi pṛkṣaḥ sacante
analyzed: indra vāyū vīra vāham ratham vāmi īśānayoḥ abhi pṛkṣaḥ sacante

original: RV_07.090.06.1{12} īśānāso ye dadhate svarṇo gobhiraśvebhirvasubhirhiraṇyaiḥ
analyzed: īśānāsaḥ ye dadhate svarṇaḥ gobhiḥ aśvebhiḥ vasubhiḥ hiraṇyaiḥ

original: RV_07.090.06.2{12} indravāyū sūrayo viśvamāyurarvadbhirvīraiḥ pṛtanāsu sahyuḥ
analyzed: indra vāyū sūrayaḥ viśva māyuḥ arvadbhiḥ vīraiḥ pṛtanāsu sahyuḥ

original: RV_07.090.07.1{12} arvanto na śravaso bhikṣamāṇā indravāyū suṣṭutibhirvasiṣṭhāḥ
analyzed: arvantaḥ na śravasaḥ bhikṣamāṇāḥ indra vāyū suṣṭutibhiḥ vasiṣṭhāḥ

original: RV_07.090.07.2{12} vājayantaḥ svavase huvema yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: vājayantaḥ su avase huvema yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.091.01.1{13} kuvidaṅga namasā ye vṛdhāsaḥ purā devā anavadyāsa āsan
analyzed: kuvidaṅga namasā ye vṛdhāsaḥ purā devāḥ anavadyāsaḥ āsan

original: RV_07.091.01.2{13} te vāyave manave bādhitāyāvāsayannuṣasaṃ sūryeṇa
analyzed: te vāyave manave bādhitāya avāsayan uṣasam sūryeṇa

original: RV_07.091.02.1{13} uśantā dūtā na dabhāya gopā māsaśca pāthaḥ śaradaśca pūrvīḥ
analyzed: uśantā dūtā na dabhāya gopā māsaḥ ca pāthaḥ śaradaḥ ca pūrvīḥ

original: RV_07.091.02.2{13} indravāyū suṣṭutirvāmiyānā mārḍīkamīṭṭe suvitaṃ ca navyam
analyzed: indra vāyū suṣṭutiḥ vāmiyānā mārḍīkam īṭṭe suvitam ca navyam

original: RV_07.091.03.1{13} pīvoannān rayivṛdhaḥ sumedhāḥ śvetaḥ siṣakti niyutāmabhiśrīḥ
analyzed: pīvaḥ annān rayivṛdhaḥ sumedhāḥ śvetaḥ siṣakti niyutām abhiśrīḥ

original: RV_07.091.03.2{13} te vāyave samanaso vi tasthurviśven naraḥ svapatyāni cakruḥ
analyzed: te vāyave samanasaḥ vi tasthuḥ viśvāḥ id naraḥ su apatyāni cakruḥ

original: RV_07.091.04.1{13} yāvat tarastanvo yāvadojo yāvan naraścakṣasā dīdhyānāḥ
analyzed: yāvat taraḥ tanvaḥ yāvat ojaḥ yāvat naraḥ cakṣasā dīdhyānāḥ

original: RV_07.091.04.2{13} śuciṃ somaṃ śucipā pātamasme indravāyū sadatambarhiredam
analyzed: śucim somam śuci pā pātam asme indra vāyū sadatam barhirā idam

original: RV_07.091.05.1{13} niyuvānā niyuta spārhavīrā indravOi P-ū̆amarvākāū0709113052 idaṃ hi vāṃ prabhṛtaṃ madhvo agramadha prīṇānā vimumuktamasme
analyzed: niyuvānā niyutaḥ spārha vīrāḥ indravoi idam hi vām prabhṛtam madhvaḥ agram adha prīṇānā vimumuktam asme

original: RV_07.091.06.1{13} yā vāṃ śataṃ niyuto yāḥ sahasramindravāyū viśvavārāḥ sacante
analyzed: yāḥ vām śatam niyutaḥ yāḥ sahasram indra vāyū viśva vārāḥ sacante

original: RV_07.091.06.2{13} ābhiryātaṃ suvidatrābhirarvāk pātaṃ narāpratibhṛtasya madhvaḥ
analyzed: ābhiḥ yātam suvidatrābhiḥ arvāk pātam narā a pratibhṛtasya madhvaḥ

original: RV_07.091.07.1{13} arvanto na śravaso ...
analyzed: arvantaḥ na śravasaḥ

original: RV_07.092.01.1{14} ā vāyo bhūṣa śucipā upa naḥ sahasraṃ te niyuto viśvavāra
analyzed: ā vāyo bhūṣa śuci pāḥ upa naḥ sahasram te niyutaḥ viśva vāra

original: RV_07.092.01.2{14} upo te andho madyamayāmi yasya deva dadhiṣe pūrvapeyam
analyzed: upa u te andhaḥ madyam ayāmi yasya deva dadhiṣe pūrvapeyam

original: RV_07.092.02.1{14} pra sotā jīro adhvareṣvasthāt somamindrāya vāyave pibadhyai
analyzed: pra sotā jīraḥ adhvareṣu asthāt somam indrāya vāyave pibadhyai

original: RV_07.092.02.2{14} pra yad vāṃ madhvo agriyaṃ bharantyadhvaryavo devayantaḥ śacībhiḥ
analyzed: pra yat vām madhvaḥ agriyam bharanti adhvaryavaḥ devayantaḥ śacībhiḥ

original: RV_07.092.03.1{14} pra yābhiryāsi dāśvāṃsamachā niyudbhirvāyaviṣṭayeduroṇe
analyzed: pra yābhiḥ yāsi dāśvāṃsam achā niyudbhiḥ vāyaviṣṭayet uroṇe

original: RV_07.092.03.2{14} ni no rayiṃ subhojasaṃ yuvasva ni vīraṃ gavyamaśvyaṃ ca rādhaḥ
analyzed: ni naḥ rayim su bhojasam yuvasva ni vīram gavyam aśvyam ca rādhaḥ

original: RV_07.092.04.1{14} ye vāyava indramādanāsa ādevāso nitośanāso aryaḥ
analyzed: ye vāyavaḥ indra mādanāsaḥ ādevāsaḥ nitośanāsaḥ aryaḥ

original: RV_07.092.04.2{14} ghnanto vṛtrāṇi sūribhiḥ ṣyāma sāsahvāṃso yudhā nṛbhiramitrān
analyzed: ghnantaḥ vṛtrāṇi sūribhiḥ syāma sāsahvāṃsaḥ yudhā nṛbhiḥ amitrān

original: RV_07.092.05.1{14} ā no niyudbhiḥ śatinībhiradhvaraṃ sahasriṇībhirupa yāhi yajñam
analyzed: ā naḥ niyudbhiḥ śatinībhiḥ adhvaram sahasriṇībhiḥ upa yāhi yajñam

original: RV_07.092.05.2{14} vāyo asmin savane mādayasva yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: vāyo asmin savane mādayasva yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.093.01.1{15} śuciṃ nu stomaṃ navajātamadyendrāgnī vṛtrahaṇā juṣethām
analyzed: śucim nu stomam nava jātam adya indra agnī vṛtra haṇā juṣethām

original: RV_07.093.01.2{15} ubhā hi vāṃ suhavā johavīmi tā vājaṃ sadya uśatedheṣṭhā
analyzed: ubhā hi vām su havā johavīmi tā vājam sadyas uśatā idheṣṭhā

original: RV_07.093.02.1{15} tā sānasī śavasānā hi bhūtaṃ sākaṃvṛdhā śavasā śūśuvāṃsā
analyzed: tā sānasī śavasānā hi bhūtam sākaṃvṛdhā śavasā śūśuvāṃsā

original: RV_07.093.02.2{15} kṣayantau rāyo yavasasya bhūreḥ pṛṅktaṃ vājasya sthavirasya ghṛṣveḥ
analyzed: kṣayantau rāyaḥ yavasasya bhūreḥ pṛṅktam vājasya sthavirasya ghṛṣveḥ

original: RV_07.093.03.1{15} upo ha yad vidathaṃ vājino gurdhībhirviprāḥ pramatimichamānāḥ
analyzed: upa u ha yat vidatham vājinaḥ gurdhībhiḥ viprāḥ pramatim ichamānāḥ

original: RV_07.093.03.2{15} arvanto na kāṣṭhāṃ nakṣamāṇā indrāgnī johuvato naraste
analyzed: arvantaḥ na kāṣṭhām nakṣamāṇāḥ indra agnī johuvataḥ naraḥ te

original: RV_07.093.04.1{15} gīrbhirvipraḥ pramatimichamāna īṭṭe rayiṃ yaśasaṃ pūrvabhājam
analyzed: gīrbhiḥ vipraḥ pramatim icchamānaḥ īṭṭe rayim yaśasam pūrvabhājam

original: RV_07.093.04.2{15} indrāgnī vṛtrahaṇā suvajrā pra no navyebhistirataṃ deṣṇaiḥ
analyzed: indra agnī vṛtra haṇā su vajrā pra naḥ navyebhiḥ tiratam deṣṇaiḥ

original: RV_07.093.05.1{15} saṃ yan mahī mithatī spardhamāne tanūrucā śūrasātā yataite
analyzed: sam yat mahī mithatī spardhamāne tanūrucā śūrasātā yataite

original: RV_07.093.05.2{15} adevayuṃ vidathe devayubhiḥ satrā hataṃ somasutā janena
analyzed: adevayum vidathe devayubhiḥ satrā hatam soma sutā janena

original: RV_07.093.06.1{16} imāmu ṣu somasutimupa na endrāgnī saumanasāya yātam
analyzed: imām u su soma sutim upa naḥ ā indra agnī saumanasāya yātam

original: RV_07.093.06.2{16} nū cid dhi parimamnāthe asmānā vāṃ śaśvadbhirvavṛtīya vājaiḥ
analyzed: nu cit hi parimamnāthe asmānā vām śaśvadbhiḥ vavṛtīya vājaiḥ

original: RV_07.093.07.1{16} so agna enā namasā samiddho 'chā mitraṃ varuṇamindraṃ voceḥ
analyzed: saḥ agne enā namasā samiddhaḥ cha mitram varuṇam indram voceḥ

original: RV_07.093.07.2{16} yat sīmāgaścakṛmā tat su mṛḷa tadaryamāditiḥśiśrathantu
analyzed: yat sīmā agaścakṛma tat su mṛḷa tat aryamā aditiḥ śiśrathantu

original: RV_07.093.08.1{16} etā agna āśuṣāṇāsa iṣṭīryuvoḥ sacābhyaśyāma vājān
analyzed: etāḥ agne āśuṣāṇāsaḥ iṣṭīḥ yuvoḥ sacā abhyaśyāma vājān

original: RV_07.093.08.2{16} mendro no viṣṇurmarutaḥ pari khyan yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: mā indraḥ naḥ viṣṇuḥ marutaḥ pari khyan yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.094.01.1{17} iyaṃ vāmasya manmana indrāgnī pūrvyastutiḥ
analyzed: iyam vām asya manmanaḥ indra agnī pūrvya stutiḥ

original: RV_07.094.01.2{17} abhrād vṛṣṭirivājani
analyzed: abhrāt vṛṣṭiḥ iva ajani

original: RV_07.094.02.1{17} śṛṇutaṃ jariturhavamindrāgnī vanataṃ giraḥ
analyzed: śṛṇutam jarituḥ havam indra agnī vanatam giraḥ

original: RV_07.094.02.2{17} īśānāpipyataṃ dhiyaḥ
analyzed: īśānā apipyatam dhiyaḥ

original: RV_07.094.03.1{17} mā pāpatvāya no narendrāgnī mābhiśastaye
analyzed: mā pāpa tvāya naḥ nara indra agnī mā abhiśastaye

original: RV_07.094.03.2{17} mā no rīradhataṃ nide
analyzed: mā naḥ rīradhatam nide

original: RV_07.094.04.1{17} indre agnā namo bṛhat suvṛktimerayāmahe
analyzed: indre agnā namaḥ bṛhat suvṛktim erayāmahe

original: RV_07.094.04.2{17} dhiyā dhenā avasyavaḥ
analyzed: dhiyā dhenāḥ avasyavaḥ

original: RV_07.094.05.1{17} tā hi śaśvanta īḷata itthā viprāsa ūtaye
analyzed: tā hi śaśvantaḥ īḍate itthā viprāsaḥ ūtaye

original: RV_07.094.05.2{17} sabādho vājasātaye
analyzed: sabādhaḥ vājasātaye

original: RV_07.094.06.1{17} tā vāṃ gīrbhirvipanyavaḥ prayasvanto havāmahe
analyzed: tā vām gīrbhiḥ vipanyavaḥ prayasvantaḥ havāmahe

original: RV_07.094.06.2{17} medhasātā saniṣyavaḥ
analyzed: medha sātā saniṣyavaḥ

original: RV_07.094.07.1{18} indrāgnī avasā gatamasmabhyaṃ carṣaṇīsahā
analyzed: indra agnī avasā gatam asmabhyam carṣaṇī sahā

original: RV_07.094.07.2{18} mā no duḥśaṃsa īśata
analyzed: mā naḥ duḥśaṃsaḥ īśata

original: RV_07.094.08.1{18} mā kasya no araruṣo dhūrtiḥ praṇaṃ martyasya
analyzed: mā kasya naḥ a raruṣaḥ dhūrtiḥ praṇam martyasya

original: RV_07.094.08.2{18} indrāgnīśarma yachatam
analyzed: indra agnīśarma yacchatam

original: RV_07.094.09.1{18} gomad dhiraṇyavad vasu yad vāmaśvāvadīmahe
analyzed: gomat hiraṇyavat vasu yat vām aśva avadīmahe

original: RV_07.094.09.2{18} indrāgnītad vanemahi
analyzed: indra agnītat vanemahi

original: RV_07.094.10.1{18} yat soma ā sute nara indrāgnī ajohavuḥ
analyzed: yat some ā sute naraḥ indra agnī ajohavuḥ

original: RV_07.094.10.2{18} saptīvantā saparyavaḥ
analyzed: saptīvantā saparyavaḥ

original: RV_07.094.11.1{18} ukthebhirvṛtrahantamā yā mandānā cidā girā
analyzed: ukthebhiḥ vṛtra hantamā yā mandānā cidā girā

original: RV_07.094.11.2{18} āṅgūṣairāvivāsataḥ
analyzed: āṅgūṣaiḥ āvivāsataḥ

original: RV_07.094.12.1{18} tāvid duḥśaṃsaṃ martyaṃ durvidvāṃsaṃ rakṣasvinam
analyzed: tau id duḥśaṃsam martyam durvidvāṃsam rakṣasvinam

original: RV_07.094.12.2{18} ābhogaṃ hanmanā hatamudadhiṃ hanmanā hatam
analyzed: ābhogam hanmanā hatam udadhim hanmanā hatam

original: RV_07.095.01.1{19} pra kṣodasā dhāyasā sasra eṣā sarasvatī dharuṇamāyasī pūḥ
analyzed: pra kṣodasā dhāyasā sasre eṣā sarasvatī dharuṇam āyasī pūḥ

original: RV_07.095.01.2{19} prabābadhānā rathyeva yāti viśvā apo mahinā sindhuranyāḥ
analyzed: prabābadhānā rathyā iva yāti viśvāḥ apaḥ mahinā sindhuḥ anyāḥ

original: RV_07.095.02.1{19} ekācetat sarasvatī nadīnāṃ śuciryatī giribhya ā samudrāt
analyzed: ekā acetat sarasvatī nadīnām śuciḥ yatī giribhyaḥ ā samudrāt

original: RV_07.095.02.2{19} rāyaścetantī bhuvanasya bhūrerghṛtaṃ payo duduhe nāhuṣāya
analyzed: rāyaḥ cetantī bhuvanasya bhūreḥ ghṛtam payaḥ duduhe nāhuṣāya

original: RV_07.095.03.1{19} sa vāvṛdhe naryo yoṣaṇāsu vṛṣā śiśurvṛṣabho yajñiyāsu
analyzed: sa vāvṛdhe naryaḥ yoṣaṇāsu vṛṣā śiśuḥ vṛṣabhaḥ yajñiyāsu

original: RV_07.095.03.2{19} sa vājinaṃ maghavadbhyo dadhāti vi sātaye tanvaṃ māmṛjīta
analyzed: sa vājinam maghavadbhyaḥ dadhāti vi sātaye tanvam māmṛjīta

original: RV_07.095.04.1{19} uta syā naḥ sarasvatī juṣāṇopa śravat subhagā yajṇe asmin
analyzed: uta syā naḥ sarasvatī juṣāṇā upa śravat subhagā yajṇe asmin

original: RV_07.095.04.2{19} mitajñubhirnamasyairiyānā rāyā yujā ciduttarā sakhibhyaḥ
analyzed: mitajñubhiḥ namasyaiḥ iyānā rāyā yujā cit uttarā sakhibhyaḥ

original: RV_07.095.05.1{19} imā juhvānā yuṣmadā namobhiḥ prati stomaṃ sarasvati juṣasva
analyzed: imā juhvānā yuṣmadā namobhiḥ prati stomam sarasvati juṣasva

original: RV_07.095.05.2{19} tava śarman priyatame dadhānā upa stheyāma śaraṇaṃ na vṛkṣam
analyzed: tava śarman priyatame dadhānāḥ upa stheyāma śaraṇam na vṛkṣam

original: RV_07.095.06.1{19} ayamu te sarasvati vasiṣṭho dvārāv ṛtasya subhage vyāvaḥ
analyzed: ayam u te sarasvati vasiṣṭhaḥ dvārau ṛtasya subhage vyāvaḥ

original: RV_07.095.06.2{19} vardha śubhre stuvate rāsi vājān yūyaṃ pāta ...
analyzed: vardha śubhre stuvate rāsi vājān yūyam pāta

original: RV_07.096.01.1{20} bṛhadu gāyiṣe vaco 'suryā nadīnām
analyzed: bṛhatu gāyiṣe vacaḥ suryā nadīnām

original: RV_07.096.01.2{20} sarasvatīmin mahayāsuvṛktibhiḥ stomairvasiṣṭha rodasī
analyzed: sarasvatīm id mahaya asuvṛktibhiḥ stomaiḥ vasiṣṭha rodasī

original: RV_07.096.02.1{20} ubhe yat te mahinā śubhre andhasī adhikṣiyanti pūravaḥ
analyzed: ubhe yat te mahinā śubhre andhasī adhikṣiyanti pūravaḥ

original: RV_07.096.02.2{20} sā no bodhyavitrī marutsakhā coda rādho maghonām
analyzed: sā naḥ bodhi avitrī marut sakhā coda rādhaḥ maghonām

original: RV_07.096.03.1{20} bhadramid bhadrā kṛṇavat sarasvatyakavārī cetati vājinīvatī
analyzed: bhadram id bhadrā kṛṇavat sarasvatī akavārī cetati vājinīvatī

original: RV_07.096.03.2{20} gṛṇānā jamadagnivat stuvānā ca vasiṣṭhavat
analyzed: gṛṇānā jamadagni vat stuvānā ca vasiṣṭha vat

original: RV_07.096.04.1{20} janīyanto nvagravaḥ putrīyantaḥ sudānavaḥ
analyzed: janīyantaḥ nu agravaḥ putrīyantaḥ sudānavaḥ

original: RV_07.096.04.2{20} sarasvantaṃ havāmahe
analyzed: sarasvantam havāmahe

original: RV_07.096.05.1{20} ye te sarasva ūrmayo madhumanto ghṛtaścutaḥ
analyzed: ye te sarasvas ūrmayaḥ madhumantaḥ ghṛtaścutaḥ

original: RV_07.096.05.2{20} tebhirno 'vitā bhava
analyzed: tebhiḥ naḥ vitā bhava

original: RV_07.096.06.1{20} pīpivāṃsaṃ sarasvata stanaṃ yo viśvadarṣataḥ
analyzed: pīpivāṃsam sarasvataḥ stanam yaḥ viśva darṣataḥ

original: RV_07.096.06.2{20} bhakṣīmahi prajāmiṣam
analyzed: bhakṣīmahi prajā āmiṣam

original: RV_07.097.01.1 yajñe divo nṛṣadane pṛthivyā naro yatra devayavo madanti
analyzed: yajñe divaḥ nṛṣadane pṛthivyāḥ naraḥ yatra devayavaḥ madanti

original: RV_07.097.01.2 indrāya yatra savanāni sunve gaman madāya prathamaṃ vayaś ca
analyzed: indrāya yatra savanāni sunve gamat madāya prathamam vayaḥ ca

original: RV_07.097.02.1 ā daivyā vṛṇīmahe 'vāṃsi bṛhaspatir no maha ā sakhāyaḥ
analyzed: ā daivyā vṛṇīmahe vāṃsi bṛhaspatiḥ naḥ mahaḥ ā sakhāyaḥ

original: RV_07.097.02.2 yathā bhavema mīḷhuṣe anāgā yo no dātā parāvataḥ piteva
analyzed: yathā bhavema mīḍhuṣe anāgāḥ yaḥ naḥ dātā parāvataḥ pitā iva

original: RV_07.097.03.1 tam u jyeṣṭhaṃ namasā havirbhiḥ suśevam brahmaṇas patiṃ gṛṇīṣe
analyzed: tam u jyeṣṭham namasā havirbhiḥ su śevam brahmaṇaḥ patim gṛṇīṣe

original: RV_07.097.03.2 indraṃ śloko mahi daivyaḥ siṣaktu yo brahmaṇo devakṛtasya rājā
analyzed: indram ślokaḥ mahi daivyaḥ siṣaktu yaḥ brahmaṇaḥ deva kṛtasya rājā

original: RV_07.097.04.1 sa ā no yoniṃ sadatu preṣṭho bṛhaspatir viśvavāro yo asti
analyzed: saḥ ā naḥ yonim sadatu preṣṭhaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ viśva vāraḥ yaḥ asti

original: RV_07.097.04.2 kāmo rāyaḥ suvīryasya taṃ dāt parṣan no ati saścato ariṣṭān
analyzed: kāmaḥ rāyaḥ su vīryasya tam dāt parṣat naḥ ati saścataḥ ariṣṭān

original: RV_07.097.05.1 tam ā no arkam amṛtāya juṣṭam ime dhāsur amṛtāsaḥ purājāḥ
analyzed: tam ā naḥ arkam amṛtāya juṣṭam ime dhāsuḥ amṛtāsaḥ purājāḥ

original: RV_07.097.05.2 śucikrandaṃ yajatam pastyṛnām bṛhaspatim anarvāṇaṃ huvema
analyzed: śuci krandam yajatam pastyṛnām bṛhaspatim anarvāṇam huvema

original: RV_07.097.06.1 taṃ śagmāso aruṣāso aśvā bṛhaspatiṃ sahavāho vahanti
analyzed: tam śagmāsaḥ aruṣāsaḥ aśvāḥ bṛhaspatim sahavāhaḥ vahanti

original: RV_07.097.06.2 sahaś cid yasya nīlavat sadhasthaṃ nabho na rūpam aruṣaṃ vasānāḥ
analyzed: sahaḥ cit yasya nīlavat sadhastham nabhaḥ na rūpam aruṣam vasānāḥ

original: RV_07.097.07.1 sa hi śuciḥ śatapatraḥ sa śundhyur hiraṇyavāśīr iṣiraḥ svarṣāḥ
analyzed: sa hi śuciḥ śata patraḥ sa śundhyuḥ hiraṇya vāśīḥ iṣiraḥ svarṣāḥ

original: RV_07.097.07.2 bṛhaspatiḥ sa svāveśa ṛṣvaḥ purū sakhibhya āsutiṃ kariṣṭhaḥ
analyzed: bṛhaspatiḥ sa su āveśaḥ ṛṣvaḥ purū sakhibhyaḥ āsutim kariṣṭhaḥ

original: RV_07.097.08.1 devī devasya rodasī janitrī bṛhaspatiṃ vāvṛdhatur mahitvā
analyzed: devī devasya rodasī janitrī bṛhaspatim vāvṛdhatuḥ mahitvā

original: RV_07.097.08.2 dakṣāyyāya dakṣatā sakhāyaḥ karad brahmaṇe sutarā sugādhā
analyzed: dakṣāyyāya dakṣatā sakhāyaḥ karat brahmaṇe sutarā su gādhā

original: RV_07.097.09.1 iyaṃ vām brahmaṇas pate suvṛktir brahmendrāya vajriṇe akāri
analyzed: iyam vām brahmaṇaḥ pate suvṛktiḥ brahma indrāya vajriṇe akāri

original: RV_07.097.09.2 aviṣṭaṃ dhiyo jigṛtam puraṃdhīr jajastam aryo vanuṣām arātīḥ
analyzed: aviṣṭam dhiyaḥ jigṛtam puraṃdhīḥ jajastam aryaḥ vanuṣām arātīḥ

original: RV_07.097.10.1 bṛhaspate yuvam indraś ca vasvo divyasyeśāthe uta pārthivasya
analyzed: bṛhaspate yuvam indraḥ ca vasvaḥ divyasya īśāthe uta pārthivasya

original: RV_07.097.10.2 dhattaṃ rayiṃ stuvate kīraye cid yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
analyzed: dhattam rayim stuvate kīraye cit yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_07.098.01.1 adhvaryavo 'ruṇaṃ dugdham aṃśuṃ juhotana vṛṣabhāya kṣitīnām
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ ruṇam dugdham aṃśum juhotana vṛṣabhāya kṣitīnām

original: RV_07.098.01.2 gaurād vedīyāṃ avapānam indro viśvāhed yāti sutasomam ichan
analyzed: gaurāt vedīyān avapānam indraḥ viśvāhā id yāti suta somam ichan

original: RV_07.098.02.1 yad dadhiṣe pradivi cārv annaṃ dive-dive pītim id asya vakṣi
analyzed: yat dadhiṣe pradivi cāru annam dive dive pītim id asya vakṣi

original: RV_07.098.02.2 uta hṛdota manasā juṣāṇa uśann indra prasthitān pāhi somān
analyzed: uta hṛdā uta manasā juṣāṇaḥ uśan indra prasthitān pāhi somān

original: RV_07.098.03.1 jajñānaḥ somaṃ sahase papātha pra te mātā mahimānam uvāca
analyzed: jajñānaḥ somam sahase papātha pra te mātā mahimānam uvāca

original: RV_07.098.03.2 endra paprāthorv antarikṣaṃ yudhā devebhyo varivaś cakartha
analyzed: ā indra paprātha uru antarikṣam yudhā devebhyaḥ varivaḥ cakartha

original: RV_07.098.04.1 yad yodhayā mahato manyamānān sākṣāma tān bāhubhiḥ śāśadānān
analyzed: yat yodhayā mahataḥ manyamānān sākṣāma tān bāhubhiḥ śāśadānān

original: RV_07.098.04.2 yad vā nṛbhir vṛta indrābhiyudhyās taṃ tvayājiṃ sauśravasaṃ jayema
analyzed: yat vā nṛbhiḥ vṛtaḥ indra abhiyudhyāḥ tam tvayā ājim sauśravasam jayema

original: RV_07.098.05.1 prendrasya vocam prathamā kṛtāni pra nūtanā maghavā yā cakāra
analyzed: pra indrasya vocam prathamā kṛtāni pra nūtanā maghavā yā cakāra

original: RV_07.098.05.2 yaded adevīr asahiṣṭa māyā athābhavat kevalaḥ somo asya
analyzed: yadā id adevīḥ asahiṣṭa māyāḥ atha abhavat kevalaḥ somaḥ asya

original: RV_07.098.06.1 tavedaṃ viśvam abhitaḥ paśavyaṃ yat paśyasi cakṣasā sūryasya
analyzed: tava idam viśvam abhitas paśavyam yat paśyasi cakṣasā sūryasya

original: RV_07.098.06.2 gavām asi gopatir eka indra bhakṣīmahi te prayatasya vasvaḥ
analyzed: gavām asi go patiḥ ekaḥ indra bhakṣīmahi te prayatasya vasvaḥ

original: RV_07.098.07.1 bṛhaspate yuvam indraś ca vasvo divyasyeśāthe uta pārthivasya
analyzed: bṛhaspate yuvam indraḥ ca vasvaḥ divyasya īśāthe uta pārthivasya

original: RV_07.098.07.2 dhattaṃ rayiṃ stuvate kīraye cid yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
analyzed: dhattam rayim stuvate kīraye cit yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_07.099.01.1 paro mātrayā tanvṛ vṛdhāna na te mahitvam anv aśnuvanti
analyzed: paras mātrayā tanvṛ vṛdhāna na te mahitvam anu aśnuvanti

original: RV_07.099.01.2 ubhe te vidma rajasī pṛthivyā viṣṇo deva tvam paramasya vitse
analyzed: ubhe te vidma rajasī pṛthivyāḥ viṣṇo deva tvam paramasya vitse

original: RV_07.099.02.1 na te viṣṇo jāyamāno na jāto deva mahimnaḥ param antam āpa
analyzed: na te viṣṇo jāyamānaḥ na jātaḥ deva mahimnaḥ param antam āpa

original: RV_07.099.02.2 ud astabhnā nākam ṛṣvam bṛhantaṃ dādhartha prācīṃ kakubham pṛthivyāḥ
analyzed: ud astabhnāḥ nākam ṛṣvam bṛhantam dādhartha prācīm kakubham pṛthivyāḥ

original: RV_07.099.03.1 irāvatī dhenumatī hi bhūtaṃ sūyavasinī manuṣe daśasyā
analyzed: irāvatī dhenumatī hi bhūtam sūyavasinī manuṣe daśasyā

original: RV_07.099.03.2 vy astabhnā rodasī viṣṇav ete dādhartha pṛthivīm abhito mayūkhaiḥ
analyzed: vi astabhnāḥ rodasī viṣṇo ete dādhartha pṛthivīm abhitas mayūkhaiḥ

original: RV_07.099.04.1 uruṃ yajñāya cakrathur ulokaṃ janayantā sūryam uṣāsam agnim
analyzed: urum yajñāya cakrathuḥ ulokam janayantā sūryam uṣāsam agnim

original: RV_07.099.04.2 dāsasya cid vṛṣaśiprasya māyā jaghnathur narā pṛtanājyeṣu
analyzed: dāsasya cit vṛṣaśiprasya māyāḥ jaghnathuḥ narā pṛtanājyeṣu

original: RV_07.090.05.1 indrāviṣṇū dṛṃhitāḥ śambarasya nava puro navatiṃ ca śnathiṣṭam
analyzed: indrāviṣṇū dṛṃhitāḥ śambarasya nava puraḥ navatim ca śnathiṣṭam

original: RV_07.099.05.2 śataṃ varcinaḥ sahasraṃ ca sākaṃ hatho apraty asurasya vīrān
analyzed: śatam varcinaḥ sahasram ca sākam hathaḥ aprati asurasya vīrān

original: RV_07.099.06.1 iyam manīṣā bṛhatī bṛhantorukramā tavasā vardhayantī
analyzed: iyam manīṣā bṛhatī bṛhantā uru kramā tavasā vardhayantī

original: RV_07.099.06.2 rare vāṃ stomaṃ vidatheṣu viṣṇo pinvatam iṣo vṛjaneṣv indra
analyzed: rare vām stomam vidatheṣu viṣṇo pinvatam iṣaḥ vṛjaneṣu indra

original: RV_07.099.07.1 vaṣaṭ te viṣṇav āsa ā kṛṇomi tan me juṣasva śipiviṣṭa havyam
analyzed: vaṣaṭ te viṣṇo āsaḥ ā kṛṇomi tat me juṣasva śipiviṣṭa havyam

original: RV_07.099.07.2 vardhantu tvā suṣṭutayo giro me yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
analyzed: vardhantu tvā suṣṭutayaḥ giraḥ me yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_07.100.01.1 nū marto dayate saniṣyan yo viṣṇava urugāyāya dāśat
analyzed: nu martaḥ dayate saniṣyan yaḥ viṣṇave urugāyāya dāśat

original: RV_07.100.01.2 pra yaḥ satrācā manasā yajāta etāvantaṃ naryam āvivāsāt
analyzed: pra yaḥ satrācā manasā yajāte etāvantam naryam āvivāsāt

original: RV_07.100.02.1 tvaṃ viṣṇo sumatiṃ viśvajanyām aprayutām evayāvo matiṃ dāḥ
analyzed: tvam viṣṇo sumatim viśvajanyām aprayutām evayāvaḥ matim dāḥ

original: RV_07.100.02.2 parco yathā naḥ suvitasya bhūrer aśvāvataḥ puruścandrasya rāyaḥ
analyzed: parcaḥ yathā naḥ suvitasya bhūreḥ aśvāvataḥ puru ścandrasya rāyaḥ

original: RV_07.100.03.1 trir devaḥ pṛthivīm eṣa etāṃ vi cakrame śatarcasam mahitvā
analyzed: tris devaḥ pṛthivīm eṣaḥ etām vi cakrame śatarcasam mahitvā

original: RV_07.100.03.2 pra viṣṇur astu tavasas tavīyān tveṣaṃ hy asya sthavirasya nāma
analyzed: pra viṣṇuḥ astu tavasaḥ tavīyān tveṣam hi asya sthavirasya nāma

original: RV_07.100.04.1 vi cakrame pṛthivīm eṣa etāṃ kṣetrāya viṣṇur manuṣe daśasyan
analyzed: vi cakrame pṛthivīm eṣaḥ etām kṣetrāya viṣṇuḥ manuṣe daśasyan

original: RV_07.100.04.2 dhruvāso asya kīrayo janāsa urukṣitiṃ sujanimā cakāra
analyzed: dhruvāsaḥ asya kīrayaḥ janāsaḥ uru kṣitim su janimā cakāra

original: RV_07.100.05.1 pra tat te adya śipiviṣṭa nāmāryaḥ śaṃsāmi vayunāni vidvān
analyzed: pra tat te adya śipiviṣṭa nāma aryaḥ śaṃsāmi vayunāni vidvān

original: RV_07.100.05.2 taṃ tvā gṛṇāmi tavasam atavyān kṣayantam asya rajasaḥ parāke
analyzed: tam tvā gṛṇāmi tavasam a tavyān kṣayantam asya rajasaḥ parāke

original: RV_07.100.06.1 kim it te viṣṇo paricakṣyam bhūt pra yad vavakṣe śipiviṣṭo asmi
analyzed: kim id te viṣṇo paricakṣyam bhūt pra yat vavakṣe śipiviṣṭaḥ asmi

original: RV_07.100.06.2 mā varpo asmad apa gūha etad yad anyarūpaḥ samithe babhūtha
analyzed: mā varpaḥ asmat apa gūha etat yat anya rūpaḥ samithe babhūtha

original: RV_07.100.07.1 vaṣaṭ te viṣṇav āsa ā kṛṇomi tan me juṣasva śipiviṣṭa havyam
analyzed: vaṣaṭ te viṣṇo āsaḥ ā kṛṇomi tat me juṣasva śipiviṣṭa havyam

original: RV_07.100.07.2 vardhantu tvā suṣṭutayo giro me yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
analyzed: vardhantu tvā suṣṭutayaḥ giraḥ me yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_07.101.01.1 tisro vācaḥ pra vada jyotiragrā yā etad duhre madhudogham ūdhaḥ
analyzed: tisraḥ vācaḥ pra vada jyotiḥ agrāḥ yāḥ etat duhre madhu dogham ūdhaḥ

original: RV_07.101.01.2 sa vatsaṃ kṛṇvan garbham oṣadhīnāṃ sadyo jāto vṛṣabho roravīti
analyzed: sa vatsam kṛṇvan garbham oṣadhīnām sadyas jātaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti

original: RV_07.101.02.1 yo vardhana oṣadhīnāṃ yo apāṃ yo viśvasya jagato deva īśe
analyzed: yaḥ vardhanaḥ oṣadhīnām yaḥ apām yaḥ viśvasya jagataḥ devaḥ īśe

original: RV_07.101.02.2 sa tridhātu śaraṇaṃ śarma yaṃsat trivartu jyotiḥ svabhiṣṭy asme
analyzed: sa tri dhātu śaraṇam śarma yaṃsat trivartu jyotiḥ su abhiṣṭi asme

original: RV_07.101.03.1 starīr u tvad bhavati sūta u tvad yathāvaśaṃ tanvaṃ cakra eṣaḥ
analyzed: starīḥ u tvat bhavati sūte u tvat yathāvaśam tanvam cakre eṣaḥ

original: RV_07.101.03.2 pituḥ payaḥ prati gṛbhṇāti mātā tena pitā vardhate tena putraḥ
analyzed: pituḥ payaḥ prati gṛbhṇāti mātā tena pitā vardhate tena putraḥ

original: RV_07.101.04.1 yasmin viśvāni bhuvanāni tasthus tisro dyāvas tredhā sasrur āpaḥ
analyzed: yasmin viśvāni bhuvanāni tasthuḥ tisraḥ dyāvaḥ tredhā sasruḥ āpaḥ

original: RV_07.101.04.2 trayaḥ kośāsa upasecanāso madhva ścotanty abhito virapśam
analyzed: trayaḥ kośāsaḥ upasecanāsaḥ madhvaḥ ścotanti abhitas virapśam

original: RV_07.101.05.1 idaṃ vacaḥ parjanyāya svarāje hṛdo astv antaraṃ taj jujoṣat
analyzed: idam vacaḥ parjanyāya sva rāje hṛdaḥ astu antaram tat jujoṣat

original: RV_07.101.05.2 mayobhuvo vṛṣṭayaḥ santv asme supippalā oṣadhīr devagopāḥ
analyzed: mayobhuvaḥ vṛṣṭayaḥ santu asme su pippalāḥ oṣadhīḥ deva gopāḥ

original: RV_07.101.06.1 sa retodhā vṛṣabhaḥ śaśvatīnāṃ tasminn ātmā jagatas tasthuṣaś ca
analyzed: sa retaḥ dhāḥ vṛṣabhaḥ śaśvatīnām tasmin ātmā jagataḥ tasthuṣaḥ ca

original: RV_07.101.06.2 tan ma ṛtam pātu śataśāradāya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ
analyzed: tat me ṛtam pātu śata śāradāya yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: RV_07.102.01.1{02} parjanyāya pra gāyata divas putrāya mīḷhuṣe
analyzed: parjanyāya pra gāyata divas putrāya mīḍhuṣe

original: RV_07.102.01.2{02} sa no yavasamichatu
analyzed: sa naḥ yavasam ichatu

original: RV_07.102.02.1{02} yo garbhamoṣadhīnāṃ gavāṃ kṛṇotyarvatām
analyzed: yaḥ garbham oṣadhīnām gavām kṛṇoti arvatām

original: RV_07.102.02.2{02} parjanyaḥpuruṣīṇām
analyzed: parjanyaḥ puruṣīṇām

original: RV_07.102.03.1{02} tasmā idāsye havirjuhotā madhumattamam
analyzed: tasmai idā āsye haviḥ juhota madhumattamam

original: RV_07.102.03.2{02} iḷāṃ naḥ saṃyataṃ karat
analyzed: iḷām naḥ saṃyatam karat

original: RV_07.103.01.1{03} saṃvatsaraṃ śaśayānā brāhmaṇā vratacāriṇaḥ
analyzed: saṃvatsaram śaśayānāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ vrata cāriṇaḥ

original: RV_07.103.01.2{03} vācaṃ parjanyajinvitāṃ pra maṇḍūkā avādiṣuḥ
analyzed: vācam parjanya jinvitām pra maṇḍūkāḥ avādiṣuḥ

original: RV_07.103.02.1{03} divyā āpo abhi yadenamāyan dṛtiṃ na śuṣkaṃ sarasī śayānam
analyzed: divyāḥ āpaḥ abhi yat enam āyan dṛtim na śuṣkam sarasī śayānam

original: RV_07.103.02.2{03} gavāmaha na māyurvatsinīnāṃ maṇdūkānāṃ vagnuratrā sameti
analyzed: gavām aha na māyuḥ vatsinīnām maṇdūkānām vagnuḥ atrā sameti

original: RV_07.103.03.1{03} yadīmenānuśato abhyavarṣīt tṛṣyāvataḥ prāvṛṣyāgatāyām
analyzed: yadi imena anuśataḥ abhyavarṣīt tṛṣyāvataḥ prāvṛṣi āgatāyām

original: RV_07.103.03.2{03} akhkhalīkṛtyā pitaraṃ na putro anyo anyamupa vadantameti
analyzed: akhkhalīkṛtya pitaram na putraḥ anyaḥ anyam upa vadantam eti

original: RV_07.103.04.1{03} anyo anyamanu gṛbhṇātyenorapāṃ prasarge yadamandiṣātām
analyzed: anyaḥ anyam anu gṛbhṇāti enoḥ apām prasarge yat amandiṣātām

original: RV_07.103.04.2{03} maṇḍūko yadabhivṛṣṭaḥ kaniṣkan pṛṣniḥ sampṛṅkte haritena vācam
analyzed: maṇḍūkaḥ yat abhivṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣniḥ sampṛṅkte haritena vācam

original: RV_07.103.05.1{03} yadeṣāmanyo anyasya vācaṃ śāktasyeva vadati śikṣamāṇaḥ
analyzed: yat eṣām anyaḥ anyasya vācam śāktasya iva vadati śikṣamāṇaḥ

original: RV_07.103.05.2{03} sarvaṃ tadeṣāṃ samṛdheva parva yat suvāco vadathanādhyapsu
analyzed: sarvam tat eṣām samṛdhā iva parva yat su vācaḥ vadathana adhi apsu

original: RV_07.103.06.1{04} gomāyureko ajamāyurekaḥ pṛśnireko harita eka eṣām
analyzed: go māyuḥ ekaḥ aja māyuḥ ekaḥ pṛśniḥ ekaḥ haritaḥ ekaḥ eṣām

original: RV_07.103.06.2{04} samānaṃ nāma bibhrato virūpāḥ purutrā vācaṃ pipiśurvadantaḥ
analyzed: samānam nāma bibhrataḥ virūpāḥ purutrā vācam pipiśuḥ vadantaḥ

original: RV_07.103.07.1{04} brāhmaṇāso atirātre na some saro na pūrṇamabhito vadantaḥ
analyzed: brāhmaṇāsaḥ atirātre na some saraḥ na pūrṇam abhitas vadantaḥ

original: RV_07.103.07.2{04} saṃvatsarasya tadahaḥ pari ṣṭha yan maṇḍūkāḥ prāvṛṣīṇaṃ babhūva
analyzed: saṃvatsarasya tat ahar pari stha yat maṇḍūkāḥ prāvṛṣīṇam babhūva

original: RV_07.103.08.1{04} brāhmaṇāsaḥ somino vācamakrata brahma kṛṇvantaḥ parivatsarīṇam
analyzed: brāhmaṇāsaḥ sominaḥ vācam akrata brahma kṛṇvantaḥ parivatsarīṇam

original: RV_07.103.08.2{04} adhvaryavo gharmiṇaḥ siṣvidānā āvirbhavanti guhyā na ke cit
analyzed: adhvaryavaḥ gharmiṇaḥ siṣvidānāḥ āvirbhavanti guhyāḥ na ke cit

original: RV_07.103.09.1{04} devahitiṃ jugupurdvādaśasya ṛtuṃ naro na pra minantyete
analyzed: deva hitim jugupuḥ dvādaśasya ṛtum naraḥ na pra minanti ete

original: RV_07.103.09.2{04} saṃvatsare prāvṛṣyāgatāyāṃ taptā gharmā aśnuvate visargam
analyzed: saṃvatsare prāvṛṣi āgatāyām taptāḥ gharmāḥ aśnuvate visargam

original: RV_07.103.10.1{04} gomāyuradādajamāyuradāt pṛśniradād dharito no vasūni
analyzed: go māyuḥ adāt aja māyuḥ adāt pṛśniḥ adāt haritaḥ naḥ vasūni

original: RV_07.103.10.2{04} gavāṃ maṇḍūkā dadataḥ śatāni sahasrasāve pra tiranta āyuḥ
analyzed: gavām maṇḍūkāḥ dadataḥ śatāni sahasrasāve pra tirante āyuḥ

original: RV_07.104.01.1{05} indrāsomā tapataṃ rakṣa ubjataṃ nyarpayataṃ vṛṣaṇā tamovṛdhaḥ
analyzed: indrāsomā tapatam rakṣaḥ ubjatam nyarpayatam vṛṣaṇā tamaḥ vṛdhaḥ

original: RV_07.104.01.2{05} parā sṛṇītamacito nyoṣataṃ hataṃ nudethāṃ ni śiśītamatriṇaḥ
analyzed: parā sṛṇītam acitaḥ nyoṣatam hatam nudethām ni śiśītam atriṇaḥ

original: RV_07.104.02.1{05} indrāsomā samaghaśaṃsamabhyaghaṃ tapuryayastu caruragnivāniva
analyzed: indrāsomā samagha śaṃsam abhyagham tapuḥ yayaḥ tu caruḥ agnivān iva

original: RV_07.104.02.2{05} brahmadviṣe kravyāde ghoracakṣase dveṣo dhattamanavāyaṃ kimīdine
analyzed: brahma dviṣe kravya ade ghora cakṣase dveṣaḥ dhattam anavāyam kimīdine

original: RV_07.104.03.1{05} indrāsomā duṣkṛto vavre antaranārambhaṇe tamasi pra vidhyatam
analyzed: indrāsomā duṣkṛtaḥ vavre antar an ārambhaṇe tamasi pra vidhyatam

original: RV_07.104.03.2{05} yathā nātaḥ punarekaścanodayat tad vāmastu sahase manyumacchavaḥ
analyzed: yathā na atas punar ekaḥ cana udayat tat vām astu sahase manyumat śavaḥ

original: RV_07.104.04.1{05} indrāsomā vartayataṃ divo vadhaṃ saṃ pṛthivyā aghaśaṃsāya tarhaṇam
analyzed: indrāsomā vartayatam divaḥ vadham sam pṛthivyāḥ agha śaṃsāya tarhaṇam

original: RV_07.104.04.2{05} ut takṣataṃ svaryaṃ parvatebhyo yena rakṣo vāvṛdhānaṃ nijūrvathaḥ
analyzed: ud takṣatam svaryam parvatebhyaḥ yena rakṣaḥ vāvṛdhānam nijūrvathaḥ

original: RV_07.104.05.1{05} indrāsomā vartayataṃ divas paryagnitaptebhiryuvamaśmahanmabhiḥ
analyzed: indrāsomā vartayatam divaḥ paryagni taptebhiḥ yuvam aśma hanmabhiḥ

original: RV_07.104.05.2{05} tapurvadhebhirajarebhiratriṇo ni parśāne vidhyataṃ yantu nisvaram
analyzed: tapuḥ vadhebhiḥ ajarebhiḥ atriṇaḥ ni parśāne vidhyatam yantu nisvaram

original: RV_07.104.06.1{06} indrāsomā pari vāṃ bhūtu viśvata iyaṃ matiḥ kakṣyāśvevavājinā
analyzed: indrāsomā pari vām bhūtu viśvatas iyam matiḥ kakṣyā aśveva vājinā

original: RV_07.104.06.2{06} yāṃ vāṃ hotrāṃ parihinomi medhayemā brahmāṇi nṛpatīva jinvatam
analyzed: yām vām hotrām parihinomi medhayā imā brahmāṇi nṛpatī iva jinvatam

original: RV_07.104.07.1{06} prati smarethāṃ tujayadbhirevairhataṃ druho rakṣaso bhaṅgurāvataḥ
analyzed: prati smarethām tujayadbhiḥ evaiḥ hatam druhaḥ rakṣasaḥ bhaṅgurāvataḥ

original: RV_07.104.07.2{06} indrāsomā duṣkṛte mā sugaṃ bhūd yo naḥ kadācidabhidāsati druhā
analyzed: indrāsomāḥ duṣkṛte mā sugam bhūt yaḥ naḥ kadācid abhidāsati druhā

original: RV_07.104.08.1{06} yo mā pākena manasā carantamabhicaṣṭe anṛtebhirvacobhiḥ
analyzed: yaḥ mā pākena manasā carantam abhicaṣṭe anṛtebhiḥ vacobhiḥ

original: RV_07.104.08.2{06} āpa iva kāśinā saṃgṛbhītā asannastvāsata indra vaktā
analyzed: āpaḥ iva kāśinā saṃgṛbhītāḥ asannaḥ tu asataḥ indra vaktā

original: RV_07.104.09.1{06} ye pākaśaṃsaṃ viharanta evairye vā bhadraṃ dūṣayanti svadhābhiḥ
analyzed: ye pāka śaṃsam viharante evaiḥ ye vā bhadram dūṣayanti svadhābhiḥ

original: RV_07.104.09.2{06} ahaye vā tān pradadātu soma ā vā dadhātu nir{ṛ}terupasthe
analyzed: ahaye vā tān pradadātu somaḥ ā vā dadhātu nirṛteḥ upasthe

original: RV_07.104.10.1{06} yo no rasaṃ dipsati pitvo agne yo aśvānāṃ yo gavāṃ yastanūnām
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ rasam dipsati pitvaḥ agne yaḥ aśvānām yaḥ gavām yaḥ tanūnām

original: RV_07.104.10.2{06} ripu stena steyakṛd dabhrametu ni ṣa hīyatāntanvā tanā ca
analyzed: ripuḥ stenaḥ steya kṛt dabhrametu ni sa hīyatā antanvā tanā ca

original: RV_07.104.11.1{07} paraḥ so astu tanvā tanā ca tisraḥ pṛthivīradho astu viśvāḥ
analyzed: paras saḥ astu tanvā tanā ca tisraḥ pṛthivīradhaḥ astu viśvāḥ

original: RV_07.104.11.2{07} prati śuṣyatu yaśo asya devā yo no divā dipsati yaśca naktam
analyzed: prati śuṣyatu yaśaḥ asya devāḥ yaḥ naḥ divā dipsati yaḥ ca naktam

original: RV_07.104.12.1{07} suvijñānaṃ cikituṣe janāya saccāsacca vacasī paspṛdhāte
analyzed: su vijñānam cikituṣe janāya sat ca asat ca vacasī paspṛdhāte

original: RV_07.104.12.2{07} tayoryat satyaṃ yatarad ṛjīyastadit somo 'vati hantyāsat
analyzed: tayoḥ yat satyam yatarad ṛjīyaḥ tat id somaḥ vati hanti asat

original: RV_07.104.13.1{07} nā vā u somo vṛjinaṃ hinoti na kṣatriyaṃ mithuyā dhārayantam
analyzed: na vai u somaḥ vṛjinam hinoti na kṣatriyam mithuyā dhārayantam

original: RV_07.104.13.2{07} hanti rakṣo hantyāsad vadantamubhāvindrasya prasitau śayāte
analyzed: hanti rakṣaḥ hanti asat vadantam ubhau indrasya prasitau śayāte

original: RV_07.104.14.1{07} yadi vāhamanṛtadeva āsa moghaṃ vā devānapyūhe agne
analyzed: yadi vā aham anṛta devaḥ āsa mogham vā devān api ūhe agne

original: RV_07.104.14.2{07} kimasmabhyaṃ jātavedo hṛṇīṣe droghavācaste nir{ṛ}thaṃ sacantām
analyzed: kim asmabhyam jātavedaḥ hṛṇīṣe drogha vācaḥ te nirṛtham sacantām

original: RV_07.104.15.1{07} adyā murīya yadi yātudhāno asmi yadi vāyustatapa pūruṣasya
analyzed: adya murīya yadi yātudhānaḥ asmi yadi vā āyuḥ tatapa pūruṣasya

original: RV_07.104.15.2{07} adhā sa vīrairdaśabhirvi yūyā yo mā moghaṃ yātudhānetyāha
analyzed: adha sa vīraiḥ daśabhiḥ vi yūyāḥ yaḥ mā mogham yātudhāna iti āha

original: RV_07.104.16.1{08} yo māyātuṃ yātudhānetyāha yo vā rakṣāḥ śucirasmītyāha
analyzed: yaḥ mā a yātum yātudhāna iti āha yaḥ vā rakṣāḥ śuciḥ asmi iti āha

original: RV_07.104.16.2{08} indrastaṃ hantu mahatā vadhena viśvasya jantoradhamas padīṣṭa
analyzed: indraḥ tam hantu mahatā vadhena viśvasya jantoḥ adhamaḥ padīṣṭa

original: RV_07.104.17.1{08} pra yā jigāti khargaleva naktamapa druhā tanvaṃ gūhamānā
analyzed: pra yā jigāti khargalā iva naktam apa druhā tanvam gūhamānā

original: RV_07.104.17.2{08} vavrānanantānava sā padīṣṭa grāvāṇo ghnantu rakṣasa upabdaiḥ
analyzed: vavrān anantān ava sā padīṣṭa grāvāṇaḥ ghnantu rakṣasaḥ upabdaiḥ

original: RV_07.104.18.1{08} vi tiṣṭhadhvaṃ maruto vikṣvichata gṛbhāyata rakṣasaḥ saṃ pinaṣṭana
analyzed: vi tiṣṭhadhvam marutaḥ vikṣvichata gṛbhāyata rakṣasaḥ sam pinaṣṭana

original: RV_07.104.18.2{08} vayo ye bhūtvī patayanti naktabhirye vā ripo dadhire deve adhvare
analyzed: vayaḥ ye bhūtvī patayanti naktabhiḥ ye vā ripaḥ dadhire deve adhvare

original: RV_07.104.19.1{08} pra vartaya divo aśmānamindra somaśitaṃ maghavan saṃ śiśādhi
analyzed: pra vartaya divaḥ aśmānam indra soma śitam maghavan sam śiśādhi

original: RV_07.104.19.2{08} prāktādapāktādadharādudaktādabhi jahi rakṣasaḥparvatena
analyzed: prāktāt apāktāt adharāt udaktāt abhi jahi rakṣasaḥ parvatena

original: RV_07.104.20.1{08} eta u tye patayanti śvayātava indraṃ dipsanti dipsavo 'dābhyam
analyzed: ete u tye patayanti śvayātavaḥ indram dipsanti dipsavaḥ dābhyam

original: RV_07.104.20.2{08} śiśīte śakraḥ piśunebhyo vadhaṃ nūnaṃ sṛjadaśaniṃ yātumadbhyaḥ
analyzed: śiśīte śakraḥ piśunebhyaḥ vadham nūnam sṛjat aśanim yātumadbhyaḥ

original: RV_07.104.21.1{09} indro yātūnāmabhavat parāśaro havirmathīnāmabhyāvivāsatām
analyzed: indraḥ yātūnām abhavat parāśaraḥ havirmathīnām abhyāvivāsatām

original: RV_07.104.21.2{09} abhīdu śakraḥ paraśuryathā vanaṃ pātreva bhindan sata eti rakṣasaḥ
analyzed: abhīdu śakraḥ paraśuḥ yathā vanam pātrā iva bhindan satas eti rakṣasaḥ

original: RV_07.104.22.1{09} ulūkayātuṃ śuśulūkayātuṃ jahi śvayātumuta kokayātum
analyzed: ulūka yātum śuśulūka yātum jahi śva yātum uta koka yātum

original: RV_07.104.22.2{09} suparṇayātumuta gṛdhrayātuṃ dṛṣadeva pra mṛṇa rakṣa indra
analyzed: suparṇa yātum uta gṛdhra yātum dṛṣadā iva pra mṛṇa rakṣaḥ indra

original: RV_07.104.23.1{09} mā no rakṣo abhi naḍ yātumāvatāmapochatu mithunā yā kimīdinā
analyzed: mā naḥ rakṣaḥ abhi naṭ yātumāvatām apochatu mithunā yā kimīdinā

original: RV_07.104.23.2{09} pṛthivī naḥ pārthivāt pātvaṃhaso 'ntarikṣaṃ divyāt pātvasmān
analyzed: pṛthivī naḥ pārthivāt pātu aṃhasaḥ ntarikṣam divyāt pātu asmān

original: RV_07.104.24.1{09} indra jahi pumāṃsaṃ yātudhānamuta striyaṃ māyayā śāśadānām
analyzed: indra jahi pumāṃsam yātudhānam uta striyam māyayā śāśadānām

original: RV_07.104.24.2{09} vigrīvāso mūradevā ṛdantu mā te dṛśaṃ sūryamuccarantam
analyzed: vigrīvāsaḥ mūradevāḥ ṛdantu mā te dṛśam sūryam uccarantam

original: RV_07.104.25.1{09} prati cakṣva vi cakṣvendraśca soma jāgṛtam
analyzed: prati cakṣva vi cakṣva indraḥ ca soma jāgṛtam

original: RV_07.104.25.2{09} rakṣobhyo vadhamasyatamaśaniṃ yātumadbhyaḥ
analyzed: rakṣobhyaḥ vadham asyatam aśanim yātumadbhyaḥ
